anādimadhyāntam anantapāraṃ susūkṣmam avyaktajagatsusāram harīndrabrahmādibhir āsamagraṃ praṇamya vakṣye vṛṣasārasaṃgraham

vasiṣṭhāya ] viśiṣṭhāya
viṃśatślo° ] viṃśaślo° viśaślo°
aṣṭādaśasahasrāṇi tena sārasvatāya tu sārasvatas tridhāmāya sahasradaśa sapta ca
°dhāmāya ] omitted
ṣoḍaśānāṃ sahasrāṇi bharadvājāya vai tataḥ
bhara° ] bhāra°
daśa pañcasahasrāṇi trivṛṣāya abhāṣata
abhāṣata ] aUNCLbhāṣata/UNCL abhāṣataḥ
caturdaśasahasrāṇi antarīkṣāya vai tataḥ trayyāruṇiṃ sahasrāṇi trayodaśa abhāṣata
trayyāruṇiṃ ] tryaiyāruṇi traiyāruṇi
abhāṣata ] abhāṣataḥ svabhāvata hy{ }abhāṣata
trayyāruṇis tu viprendro dhanaṃjayam abhāṣata
viprendro ] viprenda
°bhāṣata ] °bhāṣataḥ
dvādaśāni sahasrāṇi saṃkṣipya punar abravīt
kṛtaṃjayāya samprāpto dhanaṃjayamahāmuniḥ kṛtaṃjayād dvijaśreṣṭha ṛṇaṃjayamahātmane
°śreṣṭha ] °śreṣṭho
ṛṇaṃjaya° ] ṛṇaṃjāya°
ṛṇañjayāt punaḥ prāpto gautamāya maharṣiṇe
prāpto ] prāptau
gautamāc ca bharadvājas tasmād dharmadvatāya tu
bharadvāja° ] bharadvāra°
dharmadvatāya ] damyāddamāya
rājaśravās tataḥ prāptaḥ somaśuṣmāya vai tataḥ
rājaśravās ] rājaśrava
somaśuṣmāt tataḥ prāptas tṛṇabindus tu bho dvija
°śuṣmāt{ }ta° ] °śuṣmā ta°
prāptas{ }tṛ° ] prāUNCLpta tṛ/UNCL°
bho ] omitted
tṛṇabindus tu vṛkṣāya vṛkṣaḥ śaktim abhāṣata
abhāṣata ] abhāṣataḥ
śaktiḥ parāśaraṃ prāha jātūkarṇāya vai tataḥ
jātū° ] jatu° tu°
dvaipāyanaṃ tu provāca jātūkarṇo maharṣiṇam
dvaipāyanaṃ tu ] dvaipāyanas{ }tu dvaipāyanāya
jātūkarṇo maharṣiṇam ] jatukarṇo maharṣiṇam jatukarṇā maharṣiṇaḥ jakarṇo maharṣiṇaṃ jatukarṇamaharṣiṇā
romaharṣāya samprāpto dvaipāyanamahāmuniḥ
°muniḥ ] °muni
romaharṣāya provāca putrāyāmitabuddhaye
°harṣāya ] °harṣaṇāya
daśadve ca sahasrāṇi purāṇaṃ samprakāśitam
purāṇaṃ samprakāśitam ] purāṇa samprakāśitāṃ
mānuṣāṇāṃ hitārthāya kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
mānuṣāṇāṃ ] manuṣāṇāṃ
°cchasi ] °cchasīti
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe brahmāṇḍasaṃkhyā nāmādhyāyaḥ prathamaḥ
nāmādhyāyaḥ prathamaḥ ] nāma prathamo 'dhyāya
vigatarāga uvāca
śrutaṃ mayā janāgreṇa brahmāṇḍasya tu nirṇayam pramāṇaṃ varṇarūpaṃ ca saṃkhyā tasya samāsataḥ
śivāṇḍeti tvayā prokto brahmāṇḍālayakīrtitaḥ
brahmāṇḍā° ] brahmāṇḍa
kīdṛśaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ jñeyaṃ pramāṇaṃ tasya vā kati
kasya vā layanaṃ jñeyaṃ pramāṇaṃ vātra vāsinaḥ
layanaṃ ] lakṣaṇaṃ
kā vā tatra prajā jñeyā ko vā tatra prajāpatiḥ
prajā jñeyā ] pra
anarthayajña uvāca
śivāṇḍalakṣaṇaṃ vipra na tvaṃ praṣṭum ihārhasi
na tvaṃ ] tatvaṃ
devatair api kā śaktir jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvataḥ
śaktir ] śakti
agamyagamanaṃ guhyaṃ guhyād api samṛddhidam
samṛddhidam ] samuddhitam
na prabhur netaras tatra na daṇḍo na ca daṇḍakaḥ
daṇḍo ] daṇḍyā
! na satyo nānṛtas tatra śuśīlo no duḥśīlavān
tatra ] tatrā
no ] *
nānṛjur na ca dambhitvaṃ na tṛṣṇā na ca īrṣyatā
nānṛjur ] nāṛjur
īrṣyatā ] irṣyatā
na krodho na ca lobho 'sti na māno 'sti na sūcakaḥ
sūcakaḥ ] sūyakaḥ sūyaka steyakaḥ
īrṣyā dveṣo na tatrāsti na śaṭho na ca matsaraḥ
matsaraḥ ] matsarāḥ
na vyādhir na jarās tatra na śoko 'sti na viklavaḥ
viklavaḥ ] viklava
nādhamaḥ puruṣas tatra nottamo na ca madhyamaḥ
notkṛṣṭo mānavas tasmin striyaś caiva śivālaye
mānavas ] m
na nindā na praśaṃsāsti matsarī piśuno na ca
praśaṃsāsti ] praśaṃsāś{ }ca
garvadarpaṃ na tatrāsti krūramāyādikaṃ tathā yācamāno na tatrāsti dātā caiva na vidyate
anarthī vraja tatrasthaḥ kalpavṛkṣasamāśritaḥ na karmaṇā priyas tatra na kaliḥ kalaho na ca
karma nā° ] karma na karmaṇā
kaliḥ ] kali
dvāparo na ca na tretā kṛtaś cāpi na vidyate
tretā ] tretrā
manvantaraṃ na tatrāsti kalpaś caiva na vidyate
ābhūtasamplavaṃ nāsti brahmarātriṃdivaṃ tathā
ābhūta° ] āhūta°
brahmarātriṃdivaṃ ] brahmarātridivan brahmarātridivas
na janmamaraṇaṃ tatra āpadaṃ nāpnuyāt kvacit
janmamaraṇaṃ ] janmaraṇaṃ
āpadaṃ ] apadaṃ
na ca sāyāśavaddho 'sti rāgamoho na vidyate
°vaddho ] °vṛddho
°moho ] °mohaṃ
na devā nāsurās tatra na yakṣoragarākṣasāḥ
na bhūtā na piśācāś ca gandharvo ṛṣayas tathā tārā grahaṃ na tatrāsti nāgakiṃnaragāruḍam
na japo nāhnikas tatra nāgnihotrī na yajñakṛt
japo ] jayo
na vrataṃ na tapaś caiva na tīrthaṃ narakaṃ tathā
tīrthaṃ ] tiryan
tasyeśānasya devasya aiśvaryaguṇavistaram api varṣaśatenāpi śakyaṃ vaktuṃ na kenacit
hareccha prabhavāḥ sarve paryāyeṇa bravīmi te
hareccha prabhavāḥ ] harecchāprabhavā
devamānuṣavarjyāni vṛkṣagulmalatādayaḥ
varjyāni ] vajjñāni
parārdhadviguṇotsedhā vistaraṃ ca tathāvidhā
°guṇotsedhā ] °guṇocchedhā °guṇācchredhā
anekākārapuṣpāṇi phalāni ca manoharam
anye kāñcanavṛkṣāṇi maṇivṛkṣyāṇy athāpare
anye ] bahu°
pravālamaṇighaṇṭāś ca padmarāgaruhāni ca
°ruhāni ] °sahāni
svādumūlaphalāskandalatāviṭapapādapāḥ
svādu° ] svādhu°
kāmarūpāś ca te sarve kāmadāḥ kāmabhāṣiṇaḥ
tatra vipra prajāḥ sarve anantaguṇasāgarāḥ tulyarūpabalāḥ sarve sūryāyutasamaprabhāḥ
°bālāḥ ] °varāḥ
parārdhadvayavistāraṃ parārdhadvayam āyatam parārdhadvaya vikṣepā yojanānāṃ dvijottama
vikṣepā ] vijñeyā
aiśvaryatvaṃ na saṃkhyāsti balaśaktiś ca bho dvija
bala° ] tava
adhordhvo na ca saṃkhyāsti na tiryak ceti kaścana
tiryak ] tiryañ
śivāṇḍasya ca vistāram āyāmaṃ ca na vedmy aham ! bhogam akṣayas tatraiva janmamṛtyur na vidyate
bhogam{ }akṣayas ] bhogamayās{ }tu
śivāṇḍamadhyam āśritya gokṣīrasadṛśaprabhāḥ
prabhāḥ ] prabhā
parārdhaparakoṭīnām īśānānāṃ smṛtālayaḥ
smṛtālayaḥ ] smṛtālayā
bālasūryaprabhā sarve jñeyās tatpuruṣālaye
ālaye ] ālayaṃ
parārdhaparakoṭīnāṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśam āśritāḥ
bhinnāñjanaprabhāḥ sarve dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritāḥ
°prabhās ] °prabhā
diśam ] diśim
parārdhaparakoṭīnām aghorālayam āśritāḥ
āśritāḥ ] āśritā
kundenduhimaśailābhāḥ paścimāṃ diśam āśritāḥ
āśritāḥ ] āśritā

kuṅkumodakasaṃkāśā uttarāṃ diśam āśritāḥ
diśam ] diśim
parārdhaparakotīnāṃ vāmadevālayaḥ smṛtaḥ

kalāḥ ] kalā
catuṣkalāḥ ] catuṣtake

jñeyāḥ ] jñeyā
aṣṭatriṃśat kalā hy etāḥ kīrtitā dvijasattamaḥ
°triṃśat ] °triṃśa°
hy{ }etāḥ ] jñeyāḥ
saṃkhyāvarṇo diśaś caiva ekaikasya pṛthak pṛthak
saṃkhyāvarṇo ] saṃdhyāvarṇā
pūrvoktena vidhānena bodhavyā tattvacintakaiḥ

°yogaṃ ] °yoga
aśvamedhādiyajñānāṃ koṭyāyutaśatāni ca kṛcchrāditapa sarvāṇi kṛtvā kalpaśatāni ca
°tapa ] °tapaḥ
tatra gantuṃ na śakyeta devair api tapodhana
śakyeta ] śakyete
gaṅgādisarvatīrtheṣu snātvā taptvā ca vai punaḥ
tatra gantuṃ na śakyeta ṛṣibhir vā mahātmabhiḥ
śakyeta ] śakyante
saptadvīpasamudrāṇi ratnapūrṇāni bho dvija
dattvā vā vedaviduṣe śraddhābhaktisamanvitaḥ tatra gantuṃ na śakyeta vinā dhyānena niścayaḥ
śakyeta ] śakyante
svadehātmā samuddhṛtya dattvārthibhyaś ca niścayāt
svadehātmā ] svadehātmāṃ
svadāraputrasarvasvaṃ śiro'rthibhyaś ca yo dadet
na tatra gantuṃ śakyeta anyair vāpi suduṣkaraiḥ yajñatīrthatapodānavedādhyayanapāragāḥ
°pāragāḥ ] °pāragaḥ
brahmāṇḍāntasya bhogāṃs tu bhuṅkte kālavaśānugaḥ
brahmāṇḍāntasya bhogāṃs{ }tu ] brahmāṇḍāt{ }tasya bhogās{ }tu
bhuṅkte ] bhuktvā
kālena samapreṣyeṇa dharmo yāti parikṣayaḥ
alātacakravat sarvaṃ kālo yānti paribhraman traikālyakalanāt kālas tena kālaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe śivāṇḍasaṃkhyā nāmādhyāyo dvitīyaḥ
nāmādhyāyo dvitīyaḥ ] nāma dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
vigatarāga uvāca
kimarthaṃ dharmam ity āhuḥ katimūrtiś ca kīrtyate
āhuḥ ] āhu
katipādo vṛṣo jñeyo gatis tasya kati smṛtā
°pādo ] °pāda
smṛtā ] smṛtāḥ smṛtaḥ

kautūhalaṃ ] kautuhala
saṃśayaṃ ] saśayaṃ
kasya putro muniśreṣṭha prajās tasya kati smṛtāḥ
anarthyajña uvāca
dhṛtir ity eṣa dhātur vai paryāyaḥ parikīrtitaḥ ādhāraṇān mahattvāc ca dharma ity abhidhīyate
ādhāraṇān ] ādhāreṇa
śrutismṛtidvayor mūrtiś catuṣpādavṛṣaḥ sthitaḥ
°smṛtidvayor ] °smṛtir{ }dvayo
caturāśrama yo dharmaḥ kīrtitāni manīṣibhiḥ
gatiś ca pañca vijñeyā śṛṇu dharmasya bho dvija
vijñeyā ] vijñeyaḥ
devamānuṣatiryañ ca narakasthāvarādayaḥ

brahmaṇo ] brāhmaṇo

°madhyamā ] °madhyamāḥ

°ākṣī ] °ākṣi

vigatarāga uvāca
uvāca ] u

anarthayajña uvāca
śraddhā lakṣmīr dhṛtis tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭir medhā kriyā lajjā
tuṣṭiḥ ] tuṣṭī
puṣṭir ] puṣṭi
buddhiḥ śāntir vapuḥ kīrtiḥ siddhiś cābhūtisambhavā
buddhiḥ ] buddhi
cābhūti° ] ca bhūti°
śraddhā kāma suto jāto darpo lakṣmīsutaḥ smṛtaḥ
kāma° ] dharma°
dhṛtyās tu niyamaḥ putraḥ saṃtoṣas tuṣṭijaḥ smṛtaḥ
puṣṭyā lābhasuto jāto medhāputra śrutas tathā
lābha° ] lābhas
°putraḥ ] °putra
kriyāyās tv abhayaḥ putro daṇḍasamaya eva tu
tv{ }abhayaḥ putro ] tūbhayaḥ putrau
lajjāyā vinayaḥ putro buddhyā bodhaḥ sutaḥ smṛtaḥ
lajjāyā vinayaḥ ] lajjāyāḥ vinaya°
smṛtaḥ ] **
lajjāyāḥ sudhiyaḥ putraḥ apramādaś ca tāv ubhau
putra ] putraḥ
kṣemaḥ śāntisuto vindyād vyavasāyo vapoḥ sutaḥ yaśaḥ kīrti suto jñeyaḥ sukhaṃ siddhir vyajāyata
vyajāyata ] vyajāyate
svāyambhuve 'ntar evāsi kīrtitā dharmasūnavaḥ
'ntar{ }evāsi ] 'ntar{ }etvāsi
vigatarāga uvāca
mūrtidvayaṃ kathaṃ dharmaṃ kathayasva tapodhana
dharmaṃ ] dharmaḥ
kautūhalam atīvam me kīrtaya jñānasaṃśayam
anarthayajña uvāca
śrutismṛtidvayor mūrtir dharmasya parikīrtitā
mūrtir ] mūrti
dānāgnihotrasambandha ijyā śrautasya lakṣaṇam
°bandha ] °baddha
śrautasya ] śrotasya śrutasya
smārto varṇāśramācāro yamaiś ca niyamair yutaḥ
smārto ] smārta
yamaś ca niyamaś caiva dvayor bhedam ataḥ śṛṇu ahiṃsā satyam asteyam anṛśaṃsyo damo ghṛṇā dhanyāpramādo mādhuryam ārjavaṃ ca yamā daśa
mādhuryam ] mādhūryam
ārjavaṃ ] ārjavaś
ekaikasya punar pañcabhedam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ ahiṃsādi pravakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣvāvahito dvija
trāsanaṃ tāḍanaṃ bandho māraṇaṃ vṛttināśanam
bandho ] bandha
hiṃsāṃ pañcavidhāṃ prāhur munayas tattvadarśinaḥ
°vidhāṃ ] °vidham °vidha
kāṣṭhaloṣṭakaśādyais tu tāḍayantīha nirdayāḥ
nirdayāḥ ] nirdayā
tatpraharāvibhinnāṅgo mṛtavadhyam avāpnuyāt
°bhinnāṅgo ] °bhinnāṅgā
baddhvā pādau bhujoraś ca śirorukkaṇṭhapāśitāḥ
bhujoraś ] bhujauraś
śiroruk° ] śiroruḥ
anāhatā mriyanty evaṃ vadhabandhanajāḥ smṛtāḥ
°jāḥ smṛtāḥ ] °ja smṛtaḥ
śatrucaurabhayair ghoraiḥ siṃhavyāghragajoragaiḥ trāsanād vadham āpnoti anyair vāpi suduḥsahaiḥ
yasya yasya hared vittaṃ tasya tasya vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ
vadhaḥ ] vadha
vṛttijīvābhibhūtānāṃ tadvārān nihataḥ smṛtaḥ
tadvārān ] taddvārān
! viṣavahniśaraśastrair māyāyogabalena vā
māyā° ] mayā
hiṃsakety āhu viprendra munayas tattvadarśinaḥ
hiṃsakety{ }āhu ] hiṃsakāny{ }āhur
ahiṃsā paramaṃ dharmaṃ yas tyajet sa durātmavān
tyajet{ }sa durātmavān ] tyajec{ }cha durātma*
kleśāyāsavinirmuktaṃ sarvadharmaphalapradam
nātaḥ parataro mūrkho nātaḥ parataraṃ tamaḥ
°taraṃ ] °tan
nātaḥ parataraṃ duḥkhaṃ nātaḥ parataro 'yaśaḥ
nātaḥ parataraṃ pāpaṃ nātaḥ parataraṃ viṣam nātaḥ paratarā vidyā nātaḥ paraṃ tapodhanam
paraṃ tapodhanam ] para tapodyamāḥ
yo hinasti na bhūtāni udbhijādi caturvidham
yo hinasti ] yo hi nāsti
sa bhavet puruṣaśreṣṭhaḥ sarvabhūtadayānvitaḥ
puruṣa° ] puruṣaḥ
sarvabhūtadayāṃ nityaṃ yaḥ karoti sa paṇḍitaḥ sa yajvā sa tapasvī ca sa dātā sa dṛḍhavrataḥ
ahiṃsā paramaṃ tīrtham ahiṃsā paramaṃ tapaḥ ahiṃsā paramaṃ dānaṃ ahiṃsā paramaṃ sukham
ahiṃsā paramo yajña ahiṃsā paramaṃ vratam
yajña ] yajñar yajñaḥ
ahiṃsā paramo jñānam ahiṃsā paramā kriyā
ahiṃsā paramaṃ śaucam ahiṃsā paramo damaḥ
ahiṃsā paramo lābha ahiṃsā paramaṃ yaśaḥ
ahiṃsā paramā kīrti ahiṃsā paramo damaḥ
ahiṃsā paramo dharma ahiṃsā paramo gatiḥ
ahiṃsā paramaṃ brahma ahiṃsā paramaḥ śivaḥ māṃsāśanān nivarteta manasāpi na kāṅkṣayet
sa mahatphalam āpnoti yas tu māṃsaṃ vivarjayet
māṃsaṃ ] māṃsa
svamāṃsaṃ paramāṃsena yo vardhayitum icchati
anabhyarcya pitṝn devān na tato 'nyo 'sti pāpakṛt
tato 'nyo ] tad{ }anyo
madhuparke ca yajñe ca pitṛdaivatakarmaṇi
atraiva paśavo hiṃsyā nānyatra manur abravīt kṛtvā svayaṃ vāpy utpādyāparopahitam eva ca
kṛtvā ] krītvā
ca ] vā
devān pitṝṃś cārcayitvā khādan māṃsaṃ na doṣabhāk
pitṝṃś{ }cārcayitvā ] pitṛś{ }cārpayitvā
vedayajñatapastīrthadānaśīlakriyāvrataiḥ
māṃsāharanivṛttānāṃ ṣoḍaśāṃśaṃ na pūryate
°vṛttānāṃ ] °vṛttīnāṃ
mṛgāḥ parṇatṛṇāhārād ajameṣagavādibhiḥ
parṇa° ] parṇā°
sukhino balavantaś ca vicaranti mahītale vānarāḥ phalam āhārād rākṣasā rudhirapriyāḥ
nihatā rākṣasāḥ sarve vānaraiḥ phalabhogibhiḥ tasmān māṃsaṃ na hīheta balakāmena bho dvija
balena ca guṇākāśāt paratobhayabhīruṇā
guṇākāśāt ] guṇā kuryāt
ahiṃsakasamo nāsti dānayajñasamīhayā
°yajñasamīhayā ] °dharmasamīhaya
iha loke yaśaḥ kīrtiḥ paratra ca parāṃ gatiḥ
trailokyaṃ maṇiratnapūrṇam akhilaṃ dattvottame brāhmaṇe
akhilaṃ dattvottame brāhmaṇe ] a
koṭīyajñasahasrapadmam ayutaṃ dattvā mahīṃ dakṣiṇām
koṭīyajñasahasrapadmam ] *********
tīrthānāṃ ca sahasrakoṭiniyutaṃ snātvā sakṛn mānavaḥ
°koṭi° ] °koṭī°
! etatpuṇyaphalam ahiṃsakajanaḥ prāpnoti niḥsaṃśayam
niḥśaṃśayam ] ****
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe ahiṃsāpraśaṃsā nāmādhyāyas tṛtīyaḥ
nāmādhyāyas{ }tṛtīyaḥ ] nāmas{ }tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
anarthayajña uvāca
sadbhāvaḥ satyam ity āhur dṛṣṭapratyakṣam eva vā
satyam{ }ity{ }āhur ] satyam{ }
°pratyakṣam ] °pratyayam
yathābhūtārthakathanaṃ tat satyakathanaṃ smṛtam
ākroṣatāḍanādīni yaḥ saheta suduḥsaham kṣamate yo jitātmā tu sa ca satyam udāhṛtam
satyam{ }udāhṛtam ]
vadhārtham udyataḥ śastraṃ yadi pṛccheta karhicit
śastraṃ ] satya
na tatra satyaṃ vaktavyam anṛtaṃ satyam ucyate
vaktavyam ] vaktayā
vadhārhaḥ puruṣaḥ kaścid vrajet pathibhayāturaḥ pṛcchato 'pi na vaktavyaṃ satyaṃ tad vāpi ucyate
pṛcchato ] pṛcchate
! na narmayuktam anṛtaṃ hinasti
hinasti ] hi nāsti
na strīṣu rājan na vivāhakāle prāṇātyaye sarvadhanāpahāre pañcānṛtaṃ satyam udāharanti
devamānuṣatiryeṣu satyadharmaparāyaṇaḥ
satyadharmaparāyaṇaḥ ] satyaṃ dharmaḥ payataḥ
satyaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ variṣṭhaṃ ca satyaṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
śreṣṭhaṃ ] śreṣṭha
dharmaḥ ] dharma
satyaṃ sāgaram avyaktaṃ satyam akṣayabhogadam
akṣayabhogadam ] akṣayate naraṃ
satyaṃ potaḥ paratrārthaṃ satyaṃ yaj jñānavistaram
potaḥ ] proktaḥ
satyam iṣṭagatiḥ proktaṃ satyaṃ yajñam anuttamam satyaṃ tīrthāt paraṃ tīrthaṃ satyaṃ dānam anantakam
tīrthāt ] tīrthaṃ
satyaṃ śīlaṃ tapo jñānaṃ satyaṃ śaucaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ satyaṃ sopānam ūrdhvasya satyaṃ kīrtir yaśaḥ sukham
sukham ] sukhaḥ
aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam aśvamedhasahasrād dhi satyam eva viśiṣyate
eva ] evaṃ
satyena tapate sūryaḥ satyena pṛthivī sthitā
sūryaḥ satyena pṛthivī sthitā ] sūryaḥ satyena pṛthivī sthitāḥ
satyena vāyavo vānti satyāt toyaṃ ca śītalam
satyāt ] satyo
tiṣṭhanti sāgarāḥ satye satyena ca priyavrataḥ
satyena ca ] samayena
satye tiṣṭhati govindo balibandhanakāraṇāt
agnir dahati satyena satyena śaśibhāṣkaraḥ
śaśibhāṣkaraḥ ] saśi
satyena vindhyās tiṣṭhante vardhamāno na vardhate
vindhyās{ }tiṣṭhante ] tiṣṭhate vindhyo
lokālokaḥ sthitaḥ satyaṃ meruḥ satye pratiṣṭhitaḥ
°lokaḥ ] °loka
meruḥ ] meru
vedās tiṣṭhanti satyeṣu dharmaḥ satye pratiṣṭhati
vedās ] vedā
satyaṃ gauḥ kṣarate kṣīraṃ satyaṃ kṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ sthitam
kṣīre ghṛtaṃ sthitam ] kṣīraṃ sthitaṃ ghṛtam
satye jīvaḥ sthito dehe satyaṃ jīvaḥ sanātanaḥ
satye jīvaḥ ] satyaṃ jīva
satyam ekena samprāpto dharmaḥ sādhananiścayaḥ
°niścayaḥ ] °niścaḥ
rāmarāghavavīryeṇa satyam ekaṃ surakṣitam
etat satyavidhānasya kīrtitaṃ tava suvrata
suvrata ] suvrataṃ
sarvalokahitārthāya kim anyac chrotum icchasi
vigatarāga uvāca
na hi tṛptiṃ vijānāmi dharmaṃ śrutvā tathāpy aham
dharmaṃ śrutvā tathāpy{ }aham ] śru dharman{ }tavāmy{ }aham
upariṣṭād ato bhūyaḥ kathayasva tapodhana
°dhana ] °dhūna
anarthayajña uvāca
steyaṃ śṛṇv atha viprendra pañcadhā parikīrtitam adattādānam ādau tu utkocaṃ ca tataḥ param
ca tataḥ ] cānṛtaḥ
prasthavyājas tulāvyājaḥ prasahyastena pañcamam
tulāvyājaḥ ] tulāvyāja
pañcamam ] pañcamaḥ
dhṛtaduṣṭaprabhāvena paradravyāpakarṣaṇam
dhṛta° ] dhṛṣṭa°
vāryamāṇo 'pi durbuddhir adattādānam ucyate utkocaṃ śṛṇu viprendra dharmasaṃkarakārakam
utkocaṃ ] utkoca
°saṃkara° ] °śaṅkara° °saṃhāra°
mūlakāryavināśārtham utkocaḥ parigṛhyate
utkocaḥ ] utkoca
tena cāsau vijānīyād dravyalobhabalāt kṛtam
prasthavyāja upāyena kuṭumbaṃ trātum icchati taṃ ca stenam vijānīyāt paradravyāpahārakam
taṃ ca stenam ] so 'pi tena
tulāvyāja upāyena parasvārthaṃ hared yadi
parasvārthaṃ ] parasyārthaṃ
cauralakṣaṇakāś cānye kūṭakāryaṭikā narāḥ
kūṭakāryaṭikā ]
durbalārjavabāleṣu cchadmanā vā balena vā
cchadmanā ] cchanmanā
apahṛtya dhanaṃ mūḍhaḥ sa coraś cora ucyate
nāsti stenasamaṃ pāpaṃ nāsty adharmaś ca tatsamaḥ
stenasamo ] tena samam
nāsti stenasamo 'kīrtir nāsti stenasamo 'nayaḥ
nāsti stenasamo 'vidyā nāsti steyasamaḥ khalaḥ
stena° ] steya°
stena° ] tena
nāsti stenasama ajño nāsti stenasamo 'lasaḥ
ajño ] ajña* ajñaḥ
stena° ] tena
nāsti stenasamo dveṣyo nāsti steyasamo 'priyaḥ
stena° ] tena
nāsti stenasamaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāsti stenasamo 'yaśaḥ
stena° ] tena
stena° ] tena
pracchanno hriyate ca vittam athavā pratyakṣyam anyo haret
anyo ] anye
nikṣepād dhanahāriṇo 'nyavidhayo vyājena cānyo haret
cānyo ] cānyā
anyo lekhyavikalpanāhṛtadhanā anyo hṛtād vai hṛtā
anyo lekhya ] anyollekhya
! anyaḥ krītadhano paro dhayahṛta ete jaghanyāḥ smṛtāḥ
jaghanyāḥ ] jaghanyaḥ
stenaṃ tulya na mūḍham asti puruṣo dharmārthahīno 'dhamaḥ
stenam ] stenas
yāvaj jīvati śaṅkayā narapateḥ saṃtrasyamāno śaṭhaḥ
śaṭhaḥ ] raṭan
prāptaḥ śāsanatīvrasadyaviṣamaḥ prāpnoti karmeritaḥ
karmeritaḥ ] karme
! kālena mriyate sa yāti nirayam ākrandamāno bhṛśam
nirayam{ }ākrandamāno ] niyamam{ }ākrandramāno
nītvā durgatikoṭikalpanirayān tiryaktvam āyānti te
tiryaktvam ] tiryatvam
tiryaktve ca tathaikam ekaśatikaṃ prabhramya varṣāmbudaḥ
varṣāmbudaḥ ] varṣāmbudam
mānuṣyaṃ tad avāpnuvanti vipulaṃ dāridryarogākulam
dāridrya° ] dāridhra°
tasmād durgatihetukarma sakalaṃ tyaktvā śivaṃ cāśrayet
aṣṭamūrtiśivadveṣṭā pitur mātuś ca yo dviṣet gavāṃ vā atither dveṣṭā nṛśaṃsāḥ pañca eva te
nṛśaṃsāḥ ] nṛśaṃsā
aṣṭamūrtiḥ śivaḥ sākṣāt pañcavyomasamanvitaḥ
°mūrtiḥ ] °mūrti°
sūryaḥ somaś ca dīkṣaś ca dūṣakaḥ sa nṛśaṃsakaḥ
dīkṣaś ] dīkṣuś
pitākāśasamo jñeyo janmotpattikaraḥ pitā pitṛdaivatam ādityam ānṛśaṃsa tato 'nvitaḥ
ādityam ] ādiścam
ānṛśaṃsa tato 'nvitaḥ ] ānṛśaṃśatamanvitaḥ
pṛthvyāṃ gurutarī mātā ko na vandeta mātaram
pṛthvyāṃ ] pṛthvyā
yajñadānatapo vedās tena sarvakṛtaṃ bhavet
gāvaḥ pavitraṃ maṅgalyaṃ devatānāṃ ca devatāḥ
devatāḥ ] devatā
sarvadevamayā gāvas tasmād eva na hiṃsayet
eva ] gāvaṃ
jātamātrasya lokasya gāvas trātā na saṃśayaḥ ! ghṛtaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi mūtraṃ śakṛt karṣaṇam eva ca
pañcāmṛtaṃ pañcapavitrapūtam
°pūtam ] °pūtana
ye pañcagavyaṃ puruṣāḥ pibanti
puruṣāḥ ] puruṣaḥ
te vājimedhasya phalaṃ labhanti tad akṣayaṃ svargam avāpnuvanti
na gāvatulyaṃ dhanam asti kiṃcid
gāva° ] gobhis
duhyanti vāhyanti bahiścaranti tṛṇāni bhuktvā amṛtaṃ sravanti vipreṣu dattāḥ kulam uddharanti
dattāḥ ] dattā
gavāhnikaṃ yaḥ prakaroti nityam
prakaroti ] ca karoti
śuśrūṣaṇaṃ yaḥ kurute gavānām
gavānām ] gavān{ }tu
! aśeṣayajñatapadānapuṇyam
°tapa° ] °japa°
bhavaty asau dharmam aśeṣakartā
bhavaty{ }asau dharmam{ }aśeṣakartā ] bhaty{ }asau bhamanṛśaṃsakartā
atithiṃ yo 'nugaccheta atithiṃ yo 'numanyate atithiṃ yo 'nupūjyeta atithiṃ yaḥ praśaṃsate
atithiṃ yo na pīḍyeta atithiṃ yo na duṣyati atithipriyakartā yaḥ atitheḥ paricārakaḥ
yaḥ ] yar
atithikṛtasaṃtoṣas tasya puṇyam anantakam
atithi° ] atithiṃ
āsanenārghyapādyena pādaśaucajalena ca
°ārghya° ] °ārdhya°
annavastrapradānair vā sarvaṃ vāpi pradāpayet putradārātmako vāpi yo 'tithim anupūjayet
°dārātmako ] °
śraddhāyā cāvikalpena aklībamānasena ca
cāvikalpena ] cāpi kalpena
na pṛcched gotravaraṇaṃ svādhyāyaṃ deśam eva vā
°caraṇaṃ ] °pravaraṃ
deśam{ }eva vā ] deśajanmanā deśajanmanī
cintayen manasā bhaktyā dharmaḥ svayam ihāgataḥ aśvamedhasahasrāṇi rājasūyaśatāni ca
puṇḍarīkasahasraṃ ca sarvatīrthatapaḥphalam atithir yasya tuṣyeta nṛśaṃsam atam utsṛjet
nṛśaṃsam{ }atam{ }utsṛjet ] na saṃśaya samaśnute
sa tasya sakalaṃ puṇyaṃ prāpnuyān nātra saṃśayaḥ na gatim atithijñasya gatim āpnoti karhicit
na gatim ] na tithim
tasmād atithim āyāntam abhigacchet kṛtāñjaliḥ śaṅkuprasthena caikena yajña āsīn mahadbhutaḥ
śaṅku° ] śakti°
°bhutaḥ ] °bhutam
atithiprāptadānena svaśarīraṃ divaṃgatam
sva° ] sa°
nakulena purādhītaṃ vistareṇa dvijottama
dvijottama ] dvijottamaḥ
viditaṃ ca tvayā pūrvaṃ prasthavārtā ca kīrtitāḥ dama eva manuṣyāṇāṃ dharmasārasamuccayaḥ
dharmasāra° ] dharmabhāra°
damo dharmo damaḥ svargaḥ damaḥ kīrtir damaḥ sukham damo yajño damas tīrthaṃ damaḥ puṇyaṃ damaḥ tapaḥ
damahīnam adharmaś ca damaḥ kāmakulapradaḥ
damaḥ ] damaṃ
nirdamaḥ karimīnaś ca pataṅgabhramaramṛgāḥ
tvagjihvā ca tathā ghrāṇā cakṣuḥ śravaṇam indriyāḥ
indriyāḥ ] indriyaḥ
durjayendriyam ekaikaṃ sarve prāṇaharā smṛtāḥ
damaṃ yo jayate samyak nirdamo nidhanaṃ vrajet mṛge śrotravaśān mṛtyuḥ pataṅgāś cakṣuṣor mṛtāḥ
mṛge ] mṛgo
pataṅgāś ] pataṅgā
ghrāṇayā bhramaro naṣṭo naṣṭo mīnaś ca jihvayā sparśena ca karī naṣṭo bandhanāvāsaduḥsahaḥ
kiṃ punaḥ pañcabhuktānāṃ mṛtyus tebhyaḥ kim adbhutam
punaḥ ] puna
tebhyaḥ ] tebhya
purūravātilobhena atikāmena puṇḍakaḥ
°tilobhena atikāmena ] °tikāmena atilobhena
sagaraś cātidarpeṇa atimānena rāvaṇaḥ atikrodhena saudāsa atipāpena yādavāḥ
atipāpena ] atiyānena
atitṛṣṇā ca mānāc ca nahuṣo dvijavajñayā
atitṛṣṇā ca mānāc{ }ca ] atitṛṣṇā ca māndāto atitṛṣṇā ca mānāc{ }ca ca
atidānād balir naṣṭa atiśauryeṇa arjunaḥ
atidyūtān nalo rājā nṛgo goharaṇena tu
atidyūtān ] atikhyātān
nṛgo ] nṛgaṅ
tasmād damaṃ sadā rakṣet ati sarvatra varjayet
damaṃ sadā rakṣet ] dama sadā sa rakṣet
damena hīnaḥ puruṣo dvijendra
hīnaḥ puruṣo dvijendra ] hīnaṃ puruṣaṃ dvijendraḥ
svargaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca nāsti ! vijñānadharmakulakīrtināśo
°nāśo ] °nāma
! bhavanti viprā damayā vihīnāḥ
viprā ] vipra
nirghṛṇo na paratrāsti nirghṛṇo na ihāsti vai
nirghṛṇo ] nirghṛṇe
nirghṛṇo ] nirghṛṇe
nirghṛṇe na ca dharmo 'sti nirghṛṇe na tapo 'sti vai
parastrīṣu parārtheṣu parajīvopakarṣaṇe paranindāparānneṣu ghṛṇāṃ pañcasu kārayet
paranindā° ]
ghṛṇāṃ ] ghṛṇā
parastrī śṛṇu viprendra ghṛṇīkāryā sadā budhaiḥ rājñī viprī parivrājā svayoniparayoniṣu
°vrājā ] °vrājyā
parārthe śṛṇu bhūyo 'nya anyāyārtham upārjanam āḍhaprasthatulāvyājaiḥ parārthaṃ yo 'pakarṣati
jīvāpakarṣaṇe vipra ghṛṇīkurvīta paṇḍitaḥ
ghṛṇī° ] ghṛṇāṃ
vanajā vanajā jīvā vihagācaraṇācarāḥ
vihagācaraṇācarāḥ ] vilagocaragocaraḥ
paranindā ca kā vipra śṛṇu vakṣye samāsataḥ
vakṣye ] vakṣyā
devānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca gurumātātithidviṣaḥ parānneṣu ghṛṇā kāryā abhojyeṣu ca bhojanam sūtake mṛtake śauṇḍe varṇabhraṣṭakule naṭe
śauṇḍe ] sauṇḍo
ete pañcaghṛṇāsu saktapuruṣaḥ svargārthamokṣārthinām loke 'nindanam āpnuvanti satataṃ kīrtir yaśo'laṃkṛtam
'nindanam{ }āpnuvanti ] nandanavāyuvānti
prajñābodhaśrutismṛtiṃ ca labhate mānaṃ ca nityaṃ labhet dākṣiṇyaṃ sa bhavet sa mānuṣaparaṃ prāpnoti niḥsaṃśayaḥ
mānuṣa° ] māyuṣa°
caturmaunaś catuḥśatruś catur āyatanaṃ tathā
śatruḥ ] śatru
catur dhyānaṃ catuṣpādaṃ pañcadhanyavidhocyate
pañcadhanya° ] dhanyapañca°
caturmaunasya vakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣvāvahito bhava pāruṣyapiśunāmithyāsambhinnāni ca varjayet
°piśunā° ] °piṇḍānā°
kāmaḥ krodhaś ca lobhaś ca mohaś caiva caturvidhaḥ catuḥśatrur nihantavyaḥ sarvathā vītakalmaṣaḥ
sarvathā ] sorithā
caturāyatanaṃ vipra kathayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇu karuṇāmuditopekṣāmaitrī cāyātanaṃ smṛtam
mudito° ] muditau°
cāyātanaṃ ] cāyātana
catur dhyānādhunā vakṣye saṃsārārṇavatāraṇam ātmavidyābhavaṃ sūkṣmaṃ dhyānam uktaṃ caturvidham
°bhavaṃ ] °bhava
dhyānam{ }uktaṃ ] dhyānayajñaś
ātmatattvaḥ smṛto dharmo vidyāpañcasu pañcadhā
dharmo ] dhanyā
ṣaṭtriṃśākṣaram ityāhuḥ sūkṣmatattvam alakṣaṇam
āhuḥ sū° ] ā**
catuṣpādaḥ smṛto dharmaś caturāśramam āśritaḥ gṛhastho brahmacārī ca vānaprastho 'tha bhaikṣukaḥ
bhaikṣukaḥ ] bhakṣakaḥ
dhanyās te yair idaṃ vetti nikhilena dvijottama pāvanaṃ sarvapāpānāṃ puṇyānāṃ ca pravardhanam
pravardhanam ] pravardhanaḥ
āyuḥ kīrtir yaśaḥ saukhyaṃ dharmād eva pravardhate śāntiḥ puṣṭiḥ smṛtir medhā jāyate dhanyamānavaḥ
puṣṭiḥ ] *ṣṭiḥ
pramādasthāna pañcaivaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
°sthāna ] °sthānaṃ
brahmahatyā surāpānaṃ steyo gurvaṅganāgamam
mahāpātakam ity āhus tatsaṃyogī ca pañcamaḥ anṛtaṃ ca samutkarṣaṃ rājagāmī ca paiśunaḥ
samutkarṣaṃ ] samutkarṣa
rāja° ] rājñī°
guroś cālīka nirbaddhas samāni brahmahatyayā
nirbaddhas ] nibaddhas
brahmahatyayā ] bra***yā
brahmo ṛgvedanindā ca kūṭasākṣī sakṛd budhaḥ
brahmo ] brahma
sakṛd{ }budhaḥ ] suhṛd{ }badhaḥ
garhitānnaś ca yo vipraḥ surāpānasamāniṣaṭ
°ānnaś{ }ca yo vipraḥ ] °ānnañ{ }ca yojagvis
retotsekaḥ svayonyāsu kumārīṣv antyajāsu ca
sakhyaputrasya ca strīṣu gurutalpasamaḥ smṛtaḥ
°putrasya ca strīṣu ] °putrīṣu cāstrīṣu
°samaḥ ] °sama
nikṣepasyāpaharaṇaṃ narāśvarajatasya ca
bhūmivajramaṇīnāṃ ca hṛtasteyasamaḥ smṛtaḥ
°samaḥ ] °sama
catvāra ete saṃbhūya yat pāpaṃ kurute naraḥ
ete ] eva
mahāpātakapañcaitan tena sarvaṃ prakāśitam pañcapramādam etāni varjanīyaṃ dvijottama
°mādam ] °māda
kāyavāṅmanasā pūryaś cakṣurbuddhiś ca pañcamaḥ
pūryaś ] bhūyaś
saumyadṛṣṭipradānaṃ ca krūrabuddhiṃ ca varjayet
°dānaṃ ] °dānaś
°buddhiṃ ] °dṛṣṭiṃ
prasannamanasā dhyāyet priyavākyam udīrayet yathā śaktipradānaṃ ca svāśramābhyāgato guruḥ
°dānaṃ ] °dātaś
indhanodakadānaṃ ca jātavedam athāpi vā sulabhāni na dattāni indhanāgnyudakāni ca
sulabhāni na ] surabhāni ca
kṣutaṃ jīveti vā noktaṃ tasya kiṃ parataḥ phalam
kṣutaṃ ] śataṃ
pañcārjavā praśaṃsanti munayas tattvadarśinaḥ
praśaṃsanti ] praśasanti
karmavṛttyābhivṛddhiṃ ca pāratoṣikam eva ca
°vṛddhiṃ ] °vṛttiś
strīdhanotkocavittaṃ ca ārjavo nābhinandati
strīdhanotkoca° ] strīdhanaṅgo ca
ārjavo ] ārjave
ārjavo na vṛthā yajña ārjavo na vṛthā tapaḥ
yajña ārjavo ] yajñaś{ }cārjavo
ārjavo na vṛthā dānam ārjavo na vṛthāgnayaḥ
ārjavasyendriyagrāmaḥ suprasanno 'pi tiṣṭhati
ārjavasya sadā devāḥ kāye tasya ramanti te
tasya ramanti ] ***nti
iti yamapravibhāgaḥ kīrtito 'yaṃ dvijendra
dvijendra ] narendra
iha parata sukhārthaṃ kārayet tanmanuṣyaḥ duritamalaprahārī śaṅkarasyājñayāste
durita° ] irita°
bhavati pṛthivibhartā hy ekachatrapravṛttā
°vṛttā ] °vṛttāḥ
iti vṛsasārasaṃgrahe yamavibhāgo nāmādhyāyaś caturthaḥ
nāmādhyāyaś{ }caturthaḥ ] nāmaś{ }caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ
vigatarāga uvāca
vigatarāga uvāca ] vigata
kathaya niyamatattvaṃ sāmprataṃ tvaṃ viśeṣāt
sāmprataṃ tvaṃ viśeṣāt ] tvāṃ vaśeṣāt sāṃprata tvaṃ viseṣāt
amṛtavadanatulyaṃ śrotukāmo gato 'smi
°kāmo ] °kāmā
prakṛtidahanadagdhaṃ jñānatoyair niṣiktam
niṣiktam ] vimuktam
aparavadamatajñā nāsti dharmeṣu tṛptiḥ
°tajñā nāsti ] °tajñā °tajjñān{ }nāsti
anarthayajña uvāca
śravaṇasukham ato 'nyat kīrtayiṣye dvijendra
kīrta° ] kīrti°
niyamakalaviśeṣaḥ pañca pañca prakāraḥ
°viśeṣaḥ ] viśe* °viśeṣa
hariharamunibhīṣṭaṃ dharmasāraṃ dvijendra kalikaluṣavināśaṃ prāyamokṣaprasiddham
°vināśaṃ ] °vināśa°
śaucam ijyā tapo dānaṃ svādhyāyopasthanigrahaḥ
ijyā ] ījyā
vratopavāsamaunaṃ ca snānaṃ ca niyamā daśa
tatra śaucādinirdeśaṃ vakṣyāmīha dvijottama
°nirdeśaṃ ] °niyamaṃ
śārīraśaucam āhāro mātrābhāvaś ca pañcamaḥ
°śaucam{ }āhāro ] °śauca*hāro
°bhāvaś ] °bhāvaṃ
tāḍayen na ca bandheta na ca prāṇair viyojayet parastrīparadravyeṣu śaucaṃ kāyikam ucyate
śrotaśaucaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha gudopasthamukhādayaḥ
gudo° ] gudā°
mukhasyācamanaṃ śaucam āhāravacaneṣu ca
śaucam ] śaucaṃm
mūtraviṣṭāsamutsarge devatārādhaneṣu ca mṛttoyais tu gudopasthaṃ śaucayīta vicakṣaṇaḥ
°pasthaṃ ] °pastha
ekopasthe gude pañca tathaikatra kare daśa
gude ] °gudo
daśa ] daśaḥ
ubhayoḥ sapta dātavyā mṛdaḥ śuddhiṃ samīhatā
śuddhiṃ samīhatā ] śuddhisamīhayā śuddhiṃ samāhitā
etac chaucaṃ gṛhasthānāṃ dviguṇaṃ brahmacāriṇām
chaucaṃ ] chauca
°guṇaṃ ] °guṇa
vānaprasthasya triguṇaṃ yatīnāṃ tu caturguṇam
tri° ] dvi°
āhāraśaucaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣvāvahito bhava
śṛṇuṣvāvahito ] śṛṇu
bhāgadvayaṃ tu bhuñjīta bhāgam ekaṃ jalaṃ pibet
pibet ] pibe
vāyusaṃcāradānārthaṃ caturtham avaśeṣayet
°cāradānārthaṃ ] °cāraṇārthāya
snigdhasvādurasaiḥ ṣaḍbhir āhāraṣaḍrasair budhaḥ
°svādu° ] °svāda°
°ṣaḍrasair ] °sadravair °sadravai
dhātuvaiṣamyanāśo 'sti na ca rogāḥ sudāruṇāḥ
°vaiṣamyanāśo 'sti ] ° °vaiṣamya naśyanti
sudāruṇāḥ ] sudāruṇaḥ
abhakṣyaṃ ca na bhakṣeta apeyaṃ na ca pāyayet
abhakṣyaṃ ] abhakṣaṃ
na ca ] ca na
agamyaṃ na ca gamyeta avācyaṃ na ca bhāṣayet
avācyaṃ ] avācaṃ
laśunaṃ ca palāṇḍuṃ ca gṛñjanaṃ kacakāni ca
palāṇḍuṃ ] palaṇḍuṃ palaḍuṃ
kacakāni ] ca kacāni
gauraś ca śūkaraṃ māṃsaṃ varjayec ca vidhānataḥ
māṃsaṃ ] māsaṃ
chattrākaṃ viḍvarāhaṃ ca gomāṃsaṃ ca na bhakṣayet
gomāṃsaṃ ] gomāñ
caṭakaṃ ca kapotaṃ ca jālapādaṃś ca varjayet
caṭakaṃ ] caṭakām
haṃsasārasacakrāhvakukkuṭān śukaśyenakān
°śyenakān ] °śonakān °śyenakā
kākolūkaṃ balākaṃ ca matsyādīṃś cāpi varjayet
kākollūkaṃ balākaṃ ca ] kākolūka kākollūkabalākaṃ ca kākolūkavalākaṃ ca
amedhyāṃś cāpavitrāṃś ca sarvān eva vivarjayet
amedhyāṃś ] amedhyaś
śākamūlaphalānāṃ ca abhakṣyaṃ parivarjayet mānaveṣu purāṇeṣu śaivabhāratasaṃhite
kīrtitāni viśeṣeṇa śaucācāram aśeṣataḥ tvayā jijñāsito 'smy adya saṃkṣiptaḥ kathito mayā
kathito ] kathitaṃ
satyavādī śucir nityaṃ dhyānayogarataḥ śuciḥ
śucir ] śuci śucin
ahiṃsakaḥ śucir dānto dayābhūtakṣamā śuciḥ
dānto ] dāntau
sarveṣām eva śaucānām arthaśaucaṃ paraṃ smṛtam
śaucānām ] śaucānāṃm
°śaucaṃ paraṃ smṛtam ] °śaucaṃ para smṛtam °śaucayanaṃ smṛtaḥ
yo 'rthe hi śuciḥ sa śucir na mṛdvāriśuciḥ śuciḥ
yo 'rthe hi śuciḥ sa śucir ] yo 'rthe hi śuciḥ sa śuci yo 'rthe hi suśucir{ }vipra
°śuciḥ śuciḥ ] °śuciḥ śuci
kāyavāṅmanasāṃ śaucaṃ sa śuciḥ sarvavastuṣu
śuciḥ ] śuci
! śaucāśaucavidhijñamānava yadi kālakṣayair niścayaḥ
kālakṣayair{ }niścayaḥ ] kālakṣayen{ }niścayaḥ kālakṣaye niścayaḥ kālakṣayetiś{ }ca yaḥ
saubhāgyatvam avāpnuvanti satataṃ kīrtir yaśo'laṅkṛtaḥ
°laṅkṛtaḥ ] °lakṛtaḥ
prāptaṃ tena ihaiva puṇyasakalaṃ saddharmaśāstreritam
°eritam ] °oditaḥ
jīvānte ca paratra-m-īhitagatiḥ prāpnoti niḥsaṃśayam
niḥsaṃśayam ] niḥsaṃśayaḥ
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe śaucācāravidhir nāmādhyāyaḥ pañcamaḥ
nāmādhyayaḥ pañcamaḥ ] nāma pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
[anarthayajña uvāca]
atha pañcavidhām ijyāṃ pravakṣyāmi dvijottama
ijyāṃ ] ījyāṃ
dharmamokṣaprasiddhyarthaṃ śṛṇuṣvāvahito dvija
mokṣaprasiddhya ] mokṣeśasiddhya
dvija ] bhava
arthayajñaḥ kriyāyajño japayajñas tathaiva ca
°yajñaḥ ] °yajña°
jñānaṃ dhyānaṃ ca pañcaitat pravakṣyāmi pṛthak pṛthak
agnyupāsanakarmādi agnihotrakratukriyā
agni° ] °
aṣṭakā pārvaṇī śrāddhaṃ dravyayajñaḥ sa ucyate
ārāmodyānavāpīṣu devatāyataneṣu ca
°yataneṣu ] °layaneṣu
svahastakṛtasaṃskāraḥ kriyāyajña sa ucyate
°hasta° ] °hastaiḥ
japayajñaṃ tato vakṣye svargamokṣaphalapradam vedādhyayana kartavyaṃ śivasaṃhitam eva ca
itihāsapurāṇaś ca japayajñaḥ sa ucyate idaṃ karma akarmedam ūhāpohaviśāradaḥ
karma ] kramam
śāstracakṣuḥ samālokya jñānayajñaḥ sa ucyate dhyānayajñaṃ samāsena kathayiṣyāmi te śṛṇu
dhyānaṃ pañcavidhaṃ caiva kīrtitaṃ hariṇā purā sūryaḥ somāgnisphaṭikaḥ sūkṣmaṃ tattvaṃ ca pañcamam
sūkṣmaṃ tattvaṃ ca pañcamam ] sūkṣmaṃ ta sūkṣmāṃ tattvaś{ }ca pañcamam
sūryamaṇḍalam ādau tu tattvaṃ prakṛtir ucyate tasya madhye śaśiṃ dhyāyet tattvaṃ puruṣa ucyate
candramaṇḍalamadhye tu jvālām agniṃ vicintayet prabhutattvaṃ sa vijñeyo janmamṛtyuvināśanam
°tattvaṃ ] °tatvas
°nāśanam ] °nāśanaḥ
agnimaṇḍalamadhye tu dhyāye sphaṭika nirmalam
sphaṭika ] sphaṭi
vidyātattvaṃ sa vijñeyaṃ kāraṇam ajam avyayam
vijñeyaṃ ] vijñeyaḥ
vidyāmaṇḍalamadhye tu dhyāyet tattvam anuttamam akīrtitam anaupamyaṃ śivam akṣayam avyayam pañcamaṃ dhyānayajñasya tattvam uktaṃ sanātanam
yajñasya ] yajñañ{ }ca
vigatarāga uvāca
ekaikasya hi tattvasya phalaṃ kīrtaya kīdṛśam
hi ] tri°
kāni lokā prapadyante kālaṃ vāsya tapodhana
prapadyante ] pra***
anarthayajña uvāca
brahmalokaṃ tu prathamaṃ tattvaṃ prakṛticintayā
prakṛticintayā ] ca kṛticintaya
kalpakoṭisahasrāṇi śivavan modate sukhī
sukhī ] sukham
dvitīyaṃ tattva puruṣaṃ dhyāyamāno mṛto yadi viṣṇulokam ito yāti kalpkoṭyayutaṃ sukhī
yāti ] yānti
prabhutattvaṃ tṛtīyaṃ tu dhyāyamāno mariṣyati
tṛtīyaṃ ] tṛtīyas
dhyāyamāno mariṣyati ] dhyāya***riṣyati dhayāyāmāno mariṣyati
rudraloke vasen nityaṃ kalpakotyayutaṃ śatam
rudra° ] śiva°
vidyātattvāmṛtaṃ dhyāyet sadāśivam anāmayam
°mṛtaṃ ] °mataṃ
akṣayaṃ lokam āpnoti kalpānāntaparaṃ tathā
akṣayaṃ ] akṣaya°
pañcamaṃ śivatattvaṃ tu sūkṣmaṃ cātmani saṃsthitam na kālasaṃkhyā tatrāsti śivena saha modate
pañcadhyānābhiyukto bhavati ca na punarjanmasaṃskārabandhaḥ
punarjanma ] puna
! jijñāsyantāṃ dvijendra bhavadahanakaraḥ prārthanākalpavṛkṣaḥ janmenaikena muktir bhavati kimu na vā mānavāḥ sādhayantu
mānavāḥ ] mānava
pratyakṣān nānumānaṃ sakalamalaharaṃ svātmasaṃvedanīyaḥ
°vedanīyaḥ ] °vedanīya
mānasaṃ tapa ādau tu dvitīyaṃ vācikaṃ tapaḥ
°tapa ] °tapam
kāyikaṃ ca tṛtīyaṃ tu manovākkarmatatparaḥ
kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ caiva tapo miśraka pañcamam manaḥsaumyaṃ prasādaś ca ātmanigraham eva ca
°prasādaś ] °prasādaṃ
maunaṃ bhāvaviśuddhiś ca pañcaitat tapa mānasam
°śuddhiś ] °śuddhiṃ
pañcaitat ] pañcaitan
anuvegakarā vāṇī priyaṃ satyaṃ hitaṃ ca yat
svādhyāyābhyasanaṃ caiva vācikaṃ tapa ucyate
bhyasanaṃ caiva ] bhyasana**
ārjavaṃ ca ahiṃsā ca brahmacaryaṃ surārcanam
ārjavaṃ ca ahiṃsā ca ] ārjavatvam{ }ahiṃsāś{ }ca
°caryaṃ ] °carya
śaucaṃ pañcamam ity etat kāyikaṃ tapa ucayate
śaucaṃ ] śauca
iṣṭaṃ kalyāṇabhāvaṃ ca dhanyaṃ satyaṃ hitaṃ vedet
°bhāvaṃ ] °bhāvaś
manomiśraka pañcaitat tapa uktaṃ maharṣibhiḥ
pañcaitat ] pañcaitān
tapa uktaṃ maharṣibhiḥ ] tapam{ }uktaṃ mahirṣibhiḥ
svastimaṅgalam āśīrbhir atithigurupūjanam
atithi° ] atithiṃ
kāyamiśrakapañcaitat tapa uktaṃ mahātmabhiḥ
pañcaitat ] pañcaitan
tapa uktaṃ ] tapam{ }uktaṃ
maṇḍūkayogī hemante grīṣme pañcatapās tathā
grīṣme ] gṛṣme
abhrāvakāśe varṣāsu tapaḥ sādhanam ucyate svamāṃsoddhṛtya dānaṃ ca hastapādaśiras tathā
dānaṃ ] dānaś
puṣpam utpādya dānaṃ ca sarve te tapasādhanāḥ
dānaṃ ] dānaś
tapasādhanāḥ ] tapassādhanāḥ
kṛcchrātikṛcchraṃ naktaṃ ca taptakṛcchramayācitam
yācitam ] yācitaḥ
cāndrāyaṇaṃ parākaṃ ca tapassāntayanādayaḥ
cāndrāyaṇaṃ parākaṃ ] cāndrāyaṇavarākaś
tapassāntayanādayaḥ ] tapasāntapanādayaḥ
yenedaṃ tapa tapyate sumanasaḥ saṃsāraduḥkhacchidam
tapa ] tapas
āśāpāśa vimucya nirmalamatis tyaktvā jaghanyaṃ phalam
jaghanyaṃ ] jagat{ }yaṃ
svargākāṅkṣyanṛpatvabhogaviṣayaṃ sarvāntikaṃ tatphalam
°kāṅkṣya° ] °kāṃkṣa°
jantuḥ śāśvatajanmamṛtyubhavane tanniṣṭasādhyaṃ vadet
°sādhyaṃ vadet ] °
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ
dānāni ca tathety āhuḥ pañcadhā munibhiḥ purā annaṃ vastraṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca bhūmigodāna pañcamam
annāt tejaḥ smṛtiḥ prāṇaḥ annāt puṣṭir vapuḥ sukham
annāt{ }tejaḥ smṛtiḥ prāṇaḥ ] annād{ }bhavanti bhūtāni
annāc chrīḥ kānti vīryaṃ ca annāt sattvaṃ ca jāyate
vīryaṃ ] vīrśyaṃ
jāyate ] jāya*
annāj jīvanti bhūtāni annaṃ tuṣṭikaraṃ sadā
°karaṃ ] °karaḥ
ānnāt kāmo mado darpa annāc chauryaṃ ca jāyate
darpaḥ ] darpo
chauryaṃ ] chauryaś
annāt kṣudhātṛṣāvyādhīn sadya eva vināśayet
°vyādhīn ] °vyādhā(nSKT//SKTt) °vyādhā
annadānāc ca saubhāgyaṃ khyātiḥ kīrtiś ca jāyate
annadaḥ prāṇadaś caiva prāṇadaś cāpi sarvadaḥ
annadaḥ ] annada
tasmād annasamaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
bhūtaṃ ] bhūto
vastrābhāvān manuṣyasya śriyād āpi parityajet vastrahīno na pūjyeta bhāryāputrasakhādibhiḥ
vidyāvān sukulīno 'pi jñānavān guṇavān api vastrahīnaḥ parādhīnaḥ paribhūtaḥ pade pade
apamānam avajñāṃ ca vastrahīno hy avāpnuyāt
avajñāṃ ] avajñaṃ
jugupsati mahātmāpi sabhāstrījanasaṃsadi
tasmād vastrapradānāni praśaṃsanti manīṣiṇaḥ na jīrṇaṃ sphuṭitaṃ dadyād vastraṃ kutsitam eva vā
jīrṇaṃ sphuṭitaṃ ] jīrṇasphaṭitaṃ
navaṃ purāṇarahitaṃ mṛdu sūkṣmaṃ suśobhanam
sūkṣmaṃ ] śuklaṃ
susaṃskṛtya pradātavyaṃ śraddhābhaktisamanvitam
śraddhāsattvaviśeṣeṇa deśakālavidhena ca
°sattva° ] °sa ca°
pātradravyaviśeṣeṇa phalam āhuḥ pṛthak pṛthak
yādṛśaṃ dīyate vastraṃ tādṛśaṃ prāpyate phalam jīrṇavastrapradānena jīrṇavastram avāpnuyāt śobhanaṃ dīyate vastraṃ śobhanaṃ vastram āpnuyāt
dadyād vastrasuśobhanaṃ dvijavare kāle śubhe sādaram
dvijavare kāle śubhe ] dvijayine ekāśubhaṃ
! saubhāgyam atulaṃ labheta sa naro rūpaṃ tathā śobhanam tasmin yāti sa vastrakoṭiśataśaḥ prāpnoti niḥsaṃśayam
°saṃśayam ] °saṃśayaḥ
tasmāt tvaṃ kuru vastradānam asakṛt pāratrikotkarṣaṇam
suvarṇadāna viprendra saṃkṣipya kathayāmy aham
°dāna ] °dānam
pavitraṃ maṅgalaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvapātakanāśanam
°pātaka° ] °pāpaka°
dhārayet satataṃ vipra suvarṇakaṭakāṅgulim
°kaṭakāṅgulim ] °ka**gulim
mucyate sarvapāpebhyo rāhunā candramā yathā
dattvā suvarṇaṃ viprebhyo devebhyaś ca dvijarṣabha truṭimātre 'pi yo dadyāt sarvapāpaiḥ sa mucyate
°mātre ] °mātro
sarvapāpaiḥ sa mucyate ] sarvapāpai pramucyate
raktimāṣakakarṣaṃ vā palārdhaṃ palam eva vā
rakti° ] ranti° ratta°
evam eva phalaṃ vṛddhir jñeyā dānaviśeṣataḥ
sarvādhāramahīdānaṃ praśaṃsanti manīṣiṇaḥ
dānaṃ praśaṃsanti ] dā***santi
annavastrahiraṇyādi sarvaṃ vai bhūmisambhavam
sarvaṃ vai ] sarvaṃ
bhūmidānena viprendra sarvadānaphalaṃ labhet bhūmidānasamaṃ vipra yady asti vada tattvataḥ
mātṛkukṣivimuktas tu dharaṇīśaraṇo bhavet
°muktas ] °muktis
°śaraṇo ] °śaraṇāṃ
carācarāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhūmiḥ sā dhāraṇā smṛtā
ekahastaṃ dvihastaṃ vā pañcāśac chatam eva vā
ekahastaṃ ] ekahasta°
sahasrāyutalakṣaṃ vā bhūmidānaṃ praśasyate
ekahastāṃ ca yo bhūmiṃ dadyād dvijavarāya tu
dadyād ] dadyā
varṣakoṭiśataṃ divyaṃ svargaloke mahīyate
evaṃ bahuṣu hasteṣu guṇāguṇiphalaṃ smṛtam
guṇāguṇi° ] guṇāgaṇi°
śraddhādhikaphalaṃ dānaṃ kathitaṃ te dvijottama
jāmadagnyena rāmeṇa bhūmiṃ dattvā dvijāya vai
rāmeṇa ] **ṇa
āyur akṣayam āptaṃ tu ihaiva ca dvijottama
ca ] hi
hemaśṛṅgāṃ raupyakṣurāṃ cailaghaṇṭāṃ dvijottama
°kṣurāṃ ] °khurāṃ
viprāya vedaviduṣe dattvānantaphalaṃ smṛtam
dattvānanta° ] dattvānta°
dānābhyāsarataḥ pravartanabhavāṃ śakyānurūpaṃ sadā annaṃ vastrahiraṇyaraupyam udakaṃ gāvas tilaṃ medinīm
tilaṃ ] tilām
dadyāt pādukachatrapīṭhakalaśaṃ pātrādyam anyac ca vā
pātrādyam{ }anyac{ }ca vā ] pātreṣu labdheṣu vai
śraddhādānam abhinnarāgavadanaṃ kṛtvā mano nirmalam
śraddhādānam ] dattvādānam
dānād eva yaśaḥ śriyaḥ sukhakarāḥ khyātiś ca tulyaṃ bhavet
yaśaḥ ] yaśa
dānād eva nigarhaṇaṃ ripugaṇair ānandadaṃ saukhyadam
ānandadaṃ saukhyadam ] cānandasaukhyapradam
dānād durjayatā prasādam atulaṃ saubhāgya dānāl labhet
dānāl ] dānaṃ
dānād eva anantabhoganiyataṃ svargaṃ ca tasmād bhavet
dānād eva ca śakralokam atulaṃ dānāj janānandanam
dānāj ] dānā
dānād eva mahīṃ samāsu bubhuje samrāḍ mahīmaṇḍale
mahīṃ samāsu ] mahīyasāṃ
dānād eva surūpayonisubhagaś candrānano vīkṣate
vīkṣate ] vikṣate
dānād eva anekasambhavasukhaṃ prānoti niḥsaṃśayam
°saṃśayam ] °saṃśayaḥ
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe dānapraśaṃsādhyāyaḥ saptamaḥ
°praśaṃsādhyāyaḥ saptamaḥ ] °praśaṃsā saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ
pañcasvādhyāyanaṃ kāryam ihāmutra sukhārthinā
°mutra ] °mūtra
śaivaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ purāṇaṃ ca smārtaṃ bhāratasaṃhitām
śaive tattvaṃ vicinteta śaivaḥ pāśupatadvaye
śaive ] śaivaṃ
śaivaḥ ] śaivāḥ
atra vistarataḥ proktaṃ tattvasārasamuccayam
saṃkhyātattva tu sāṃkhyeṣu bodhavyaṃ tattvacintakaiḥ
saṃkhyātattva tu ] saṃ
pañcatattvavibhāgena kīrtitāni maharṣibhiḥ
purāṇeṣu mahīkoṣo vistareṇa prakīrtitaḥ adhordhvamadhyatiryaṃ ca yatnataḥ sampraveśayet
sampraveśayet ] samprabodhayet
smārtaṃ varṇāśramācāraṃ dharmanyāyapravartanam
smārtaṃ ] smārta°
°vartanam ] °vartana
śiṣṭācāro vikalpena grāhyas tatra aśaṅkitaḥ
°cāro ] °cāra°
grāhyas{ }tatra aśaṅkitaḥ ] grāhyas{ }ta***ṅkitaḥ
itihāsam adhīyānaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa naro bhavet dharmārthakāmamokṣeṣu saṃśayas tena chidyate
śṛṇuṣvāvahito vipra pañcopasthavinigraham striyo vā garhitotsargaḥ svayaṃ muktiś ca kīrtyate
garhitotsargaḥ ] garhito svargaḥ
svapnopaghātaṃ viprendra divāsvapnaṃ ca pañcamaḥ
°ghātaṃ ] °ghāta
agamyā strī divā parve dharmapatny api vā bhavet
strī divā parve ] * divāparvve strī divāpūrve
viruddhastrī na seveta varṇabhraṣṭādhikāsu ca
viruddhastrī ] dviruddhāstrīn
°dhikāsu ] °pikāsu
ajameṣagavādīnāṃ vaḍavā mahiṣīṣu ca
garhitotsargam ity etad yatnena parivarjayet anyonyakaṣaṇā vāpi apānakaṣaṇāpi vā
°kaṣaṇā ] °karṣaṇā
°kaṣaṇāpi ] °karṣaṇāpi
svayaṃmuktir iyaṃ jñeyā tasmāt tāṃ parivarjayet
tāṃ ] strī
svapnaghātaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha aniṣṭaṃ paṇḍitaiḥ sadā
svapne strīṣu ramante ca retaḥ prakṣarate tataḥ
prakṣarate ] praskhalatas
divāśayaṃ na kartavyaṃ nityaṃ dharmapareṇa tu
°pareṇa ] °parena
svargamārgārgalā hy etā striyo nāma prakīrtitāḥ
striyo ] strīyo
mārjārakabakaśvānagomahīvratapañcakam
mārjārakavakaśvānagomahīvrata° ] mārjārakaś{ }ca śvānāś{ }ca gomahīvaka
svaviṣṭāmūtraṃ bhūmīṣu chādayed dvijasattama sūryasomānumodanti mārjāravratikeṣu ca
°modanti ] °ṣādanti
bakavac cendriyagrāmaṃ suniyamya tapodhana
tapodhana ] tapodhanam
sādhayec ca manas tuṣṭiṃ mokṣasādhanatatparaḥ
mūtraviṣṭena bhūmīṣu kurute chādanaṃ sadā
mūtraviṣṭena ] mūtraviṣṭe ca
chādanaṃ ] dhanadaṃ
tuṣyate bhagavān śarvaḥ śvānavratacaro yadi
mūtravarco na ruddhyeta sadā govratiko naraḥ
varco ] varcā
govratiko ] **tiko
bhīmas tuṣṭikaraś caiva purāṇeṣu nigadyate
bhīmas ] bhīma
kuddālair dārayanto 'pi kīlakoṭiśataiś citaḥ
kīlakoṭiśataiś{ }citaḥ ] kīṭakoṭīśatair{ }api
kṣamate pṛthivī devī evam eva mahīvrataḥ
vratapañcakam ity etad yaś careta jitendriyaḥ sa cottamam idaṃ lokaṃ prāpnoti na ca saṃśayaḥ
śeṣānnām antarānnāṃ ca naktāyācitam eva ca
śeṣānnām{ }antarānnāṃ ] śe śeṣāṇām{ }antarāṇāṃ
ca ] vā
upavāsaṃ ca pañcaitat kathayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
vaiśvadevātithiśeṣaṃ pitṛśeṣaṃ ca yad bhavet bhṛtyaputrakalatrebhyaḥ śeṣāśī vighasāśanaḥ
vighasāśanaḥ ] viṣasāsanaḥ
antasamprāntarāśī ca sāyamāśī tathaiva ca
antarāprāntarāśī ] antasamprāntarāśī
sāyamāśī ] sāyamāśīn
sadopavāsī bhavati yo na bhuṅkte kadācana
na divā bhojanaṃ kāryaṃ rātrau naiva ca bhojayet naktavele ca bhoktavyaṃ naktadharmaḥ samīhitā
ca ] va
dharmaṃ samīhitā ] dharmaḥ samīhitaḥ
anārambhasya āhāraṃ kuryān nityam ayācitam parair dantaṃ tu yo bhuṅkte tam ayācitam ucyate
bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca lehyaṃ ca coṣyaṃ peyaṃ ca pañcamam na kāṅkṣen nopabhuñjīta upavāsaḥ sa ucyate
°bhuñjīta ] °**ta
mithyā piśunapāruṣyaṃ pṛṣṭavāgapralāpanam
°pāruṣyaṃ ] °yābhinnā
pṛṣṭavāga° ] pṛṣtevāka°
maunapañcakam ity etad dhārayen niyatavrataḥ
mauna° ] maunaṃ
dhārayen ] dhārayan
asambhūtam adṛṣṭaṃ ca dharmāc cāpi bahiṣkṛtaḥ
dharmāc ] dharmaṃ
anarthaproyavākyaṃ yat tan mithyāvacanaṃ smṛtam
yat{ }tan ] yan{ }tan
parastrīṃ nābhinandanti parasyaiśvaryam eva ca
parastrīṃ ] parastrī
aniṣṭadarśanākāṅkṣī piśunaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ
mṛtamātā pitā caiva hānisthānaṃ kathaṃ bhavet bhuktvā kāmam amṛṣṭānāṃ pāruṣyaṃ samudāhṛtam
bhuktvā ] bhuktva bhuktā
hṛdi na sphuṭase mūḍha śiro vā na vidāryase evam ādīny anekāni tīkṣṇavādī sa ucyate
dyūtabhojanayuddhaṃ ca madyastrīkarṣam eva ca
°yuddhaṃ ] °yuddhaś
°karṣam ] °kaṣam
asatpralāpaḥ pañcaitat kīrtitaṃ te dvijottama
te ] me
maunam eva sadā kāryaṃ vākyasaubhāgyam icchatā apāruṣyam asaṃbhinnaṃ vākyaṃ satyam udīrayet
°bhinnaṃ ] °digdhaṃ
yas tu maunasya no kartā dūṣitaḥ sa kulādhamaḥ
dūṣitaḥ ] bhūṣitaḥ
janma janma ca durgandho mūkaś caivopajāyate
durgandho ] dṛgandho
tasmān maunavrataṃ sadaiva sudṛḍhaṃ kurvīta yo niścitam
tasmān ] **n
vācā tasya alaṅghyatā ca bhavati sarvāṃ sabhyāṃ nandati
alaṅghyatā ] alaṃghyatāñ
vaktrāc cotpalagandham asya satataṃ vāyanti gandhotkaṭāḥ
cotpala° ] cotara°
śāstrānekasahasraśo girinaraḥ proccāryate nirmalaḥ
°malaḥ ] °malam
snānaṃ pañcavidhaṃ caiva pravakṣyāmi yathātatham
yathātatham ] **tatham
āgneyaṃ vāruṇaṃ brāhmyaṃ vāyavyaṃ divyam eva ca
vāruṇaṃ ] brāhmaṇaṃ
āgneyaṃ bhasmanā snānaṃ toyāc chataguṇaṃ phalam bhasmapūtaṃ pavitraṃ ca bhasma pāpapraṇāśanam
tasmād bhasma prayuñjīta dehināṃ tu malāpaham sarvaśāntikaraṃ bhasma bhasma rakṣakam uttamam
bhasmanā tryāyuṣaṃ kṛtvā brahmacaryavrate sthitam
tryāyuṣaṃ kṛtvā ] tryāyu***
°vrate ] °vrata°
bhasmanā ṛṣayaḥ sarve pavitrīkṛtam ātmanaḥ
ṛṣayaḥ sarve ] ṛṣibhir{ }sarvaiḥ
bhasmanā vibudhā muktā vīrabhadrabhayārditāḥ
muktā ] muktāḥ
bhasmānusaṃsaṃdṛṣṭyaiva brahmaṇānumatā kṛtaḥ
bhasmānusaṃsaṃdṛṣṭyaiva ] bhasmanā saṃpradṛśyāivaṃ
brahmaṇānumatā ] brāhmaṇānumato
cāturāśramato 'dhikyaṃ vrataṃ pāśupataṃ kṛtam
cāturā° ] caturā°
tasmāt pāśupataṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bhasmadhāraṇahetavaḥ
vāruṇaṃ salilasnānaṃ kartavyaṃ vividhaṃ naraiḥ
vāruṇaṃ ] vā**
vividhaṃ ] vidhivan
nadītoyataḍāgeṣu prasraveṣu hradeṣu ca
brahmasnānaṃ ca viprendra āpohiṣṭhaṃ vidur budhāḥ trisaṃdhyam eva kartavyaṃ brahmasnānaṃ tad ucyate
goṣu saṃcāramārgeṣu yatra godhūlisambhavaḥ tatra gatvāvasīdeta snānam uktaṃ manīṣibhiḥ
varṣatoyāmbudhārābhiḥ plāvayitvā svakāṃ tanum snānaṃ divyaṃ vadaty eva jagadādimaheśvaraḥ
iti niyamavibhāgaḥ pañcabhedena vipra nigadita tava pṛṣṭaḥ sarvalokānukampya
°kampya ] °kampyaḥ
sakalamalapahāre dharmapañcāśad etat
°pañcāśad ] °pañcāśam
! na bhavati punarjanma kalpakoṭyāyute 'pi
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe niyamapraśaṃsā nāmādhyāyo 'ṣṭamo
nāmādhyāyo 'ṣṭamo ] nāmādhyāya aṣṭamo nāma aṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ
[anarthayajña uvāca]
trikālaguṇabhedena bhinnaṃ sarvacarācaram tasmāt triguṇabandhena veṣṭitaṃ nikhilaṃ jagat
vigatarāga uvāca
traikālyam iti kiṃ jñeyaṃ traidhātukaśarīriṇaḥ
kiṃ jñeyaṃ ] vijñeyaṃ
°dhātuka° ] °dhāyukta°
kiṃcid vistaram eveha kathayasva tapodhana
eveha ] etad{ }dhi
kathayasva ] ka***
anartayajña uvāca
traikālyaṃ triguṇaṃ jñeyaṃ vyāpī prakṛtisambhavaḥ anyonyam upajīvanti anyonyam anuvartinaḥ
sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamas tathā
rajas ] raja°
sattvaṃ ] sattva°
tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajaś caiva anyonyamithunāḥ smṛtāḥ
sattvaṃ ] sattva°
sāttviko bhagavān viṣṇu rājasaḥ kamalodbhavaḥ
rājasaḥ kamalodbhavaḥ ]
tāmaso bhagavān īśaḥ sakalaṃ vikaleśvaraḥ
tāmaso bhagavān{ }īśaḥ sakalaṃ ] ********
sattvaṃ kundenduvarṇābhaṃ padmarāganibhaṃ rajaḥ tamaś cāñjanaśailābhaṃ kīrtitāni manīṣibhiḥ
°bhaṃ ] °bhā
sattvaṃ jalaṃ rajo 'ṅgāraṃ tamo dhūmasamākulam
'ṅgāraṃ ] 'ṅgaran
etadguṇamayair baddhāḥ pacyante sarvadehinaḥ
vigatarāga uvāca
kena kena prakāreṇa guṇapāśena badhyate
guṇa° ] omitted
cihnam eṣāṃ pṛthaktvena kathayasva tapodhana
anarthayajña uvāca
anekākārabhāvena badhyante guṇabandhanaiḥ mohitā nābhijānanti jānanti śivayoginaḥ
ūrdhvaṃgo nityasattvastho madhyago rajasāvṛtaḥ
°sattva° ] °satya°
°vṛtaḥ ] °vṛtam
adhogatis tamo'vasthā bhavanti puruṣādhamāḥ
svarge 'pi hi trayo vaite bhāvanīyās tapodhana mānuṣeṣu ca tiryeṣu guṇabhedās trayas trayaḥ
tiryeṣu ] tīryeṣu
brahmā viṣṇuś ca rudraś ca dharma indraḥ prajāpatiḥ
dharma indraḥ ] dharmar{ }indra°
somo 'gni varuṇaḥ sūryo daśasattvottamāḥ smṛtāḥ
daśa° ] daśaḥ
rudrādityā vasusādhyāḥ viśveśamaruto dhruvaḥ
°dityā vasusādhyāḥ vi° ] °dityāvasusā** °dityavasusādhyāḥ vi°
ṛṣayaḥ pitaraś caiva daśaite sattvamadhyamāḥ
tārā grahā surā yakṣā gandharvāḥ kiṃnaroragāḥ
gandharvāḥ ] gandharvā
rakṣobhūtapiśācāś ca daśaite sāttvikādhamāḥ
ṛtvik purohitācāryayajvāno 'tithivijñanī
°vijñanī ] °vijñakau
rājamantrī vrato vedī daśaite rājasottamāḥ
°mantrī ] °mantri
sūto 'mbaṣṭavaṇik cograḥ śilpakārukamāgadhāḥ
°vaṇik{ }co° ] °vaṇiś{ }co° °vaṇiśvo°
veṇavaidehakāmātyā daśaite rajamadhyamāḥ
vaidehakāmātyā ] vaidecakau mātyā
carmakṛtkumbhakṛtkolī lohakṛttrapunīlikāḥ
°kolī ] °kālī
°nīlikāḥ ] °tīlikā
naṭamuṣṭikacaṇḍālā daśaite rajasādhamāḥ
°caṇḍālā ] °cāṇḍālaḥ
gogajagavayā aśvamṛgacāmarakiṃnarāḥ
°gavayā ] °gavayo
°cāmara° ] °vānara°
siṃhavyāghravarāhāś ca daśaite tamasottamāḥ
°varāhāś ] °varāhaś
ajameṣamahiṣyāś ca mūṣikānakulādayaḥ uṣṭraraṅkuśaśagaṇḍā daśaite tamamadhyamāḥ
°śaśagaṇḍā ] °śagaṇḍāś{ }ca
tamamadhyamāḥ ] tamadhyamāḥ
ṛkṣagodhāmṛgaśṛṅgibakavānaragardabhāḥ
°gardabhāḥ ] °gardabhaḥ
sūkaraśvānagomāyur daśaite tamasādhamāḥ
krauñcahaṃsaśukaśyenabhāsavāruṇḍasārasāḥ cakrāṅgaśukamāyūrā daśaite tamasāttvikāḥ
°ṅgaśukamāyūrā ] °
tamasāttvikāḥ ] tamassāttvikāḥ
valākāḥ kukkuṭāḥ kākāś cillalāvakitittirāḥ
kukkuṭāḥ kākāś ] kukkuṭo kākā
°tittirāḥ ] °tittiriḥ
gṛdhrakaṅkabakaśyena daśaite tamarājasāḥ
kokilolūkakiñjalkakapotāḥ pañca eva ca
°kiñjalka° ] °kiñjalya°
śārikāś ca kuliṅgāś ca daśaite tamasādhamāḥ
kuliṅgāś ] kuliṅgā
makaragohanakrāś ca ṛṣā ca tamasāttvikāḥ
tamasāttvikāḥ ] tama
kacchapaśuśukumbhīramaṇḍukās tamarājasāḥ
°kumbhīra° ] °kambhīrā
śaṃkhaśuktikaśambūkakabandhyās tamatāmasāḥ
°śambūka° ] °śambūkā
candanāgarupadmaṃ ca plakṣodumbarapippalāḥ
°garu° ] °guru°
vaṭadāruśamībilvā daśaite tamasāttvikāḥ
tamasāttvikāḥ ] tamassātvikāḥ
jāmbīralakucāmrātadāḍimākolavetasāḥ
nimbinīpo dhuvāvaś ca daśaite tamarājasāḥ
dhuvāvaś ] dhravāvaś dhavāvaś
daśaite ] ***
vṛkṣavallīlatāveṇutvaksāratṛṇabhūruhāḥ
°sāra° ] °sāras
mīrajā ca śilāśasyā daśaite tamasāttvikāḥ bhramarādipataṅgāś ca krimikīṭajalaukasaḥ
pataṅgānāś{ }ca ] pataṅgānāṃ
krimikīṭajalaukasaḥ ] kimikīṭajalaukasāṃ
yūkoddaṃśamaśānāṃ ca viṣṭajās tamasāttvikāḥ
yūkoddaṃśamaśānāṃ ] yuktodaṃśamaśānāś
viṣṭajās{ }tamasāttvikāḥ ] viṣṭajās{ }tamassātvikāḥ viṣṭajā tamasāttvikāḥ
dayā satyaṃ damaḥ śaucaṃ jñānaṃ maunaṃ tapaḥ kṣamā
śilaṃ ca nābhimānaṃ ca sāttvikāś cottamā janāḥ
nābhimānaṃ ] nābhimānāṃ
kāmatṛṣṇāratidyūtamāno yuddhamadaḥ spṛhā
nirghṛṇāḥ kalikartāro rājaseṣūttamo janāḥ
nirghṛṇāḥ ] nirghṛṇā
rājaseṣūttamo ] rājase hy{ }uttamo
hiṃsāsūyāghṛṇāmūḍhanidrātandrībhayālasāḥ
°tandrī° ] °tantrī°
krodho matsaramāyī ca tāmaseṣūttamā janāḥ
krodho ] krodha°
tāmaseṣūttamo ] tāmase hy{ }uttamo
laghuprītiprakāśī ca dhyānayoge sadotsukaḥ
°yoge ] °
prajñābuddhivirāgī ca sāttvikaṃ guṇalakṣaṇam bālako nipuṇo rāgī māno darpaś ca lobhakaḥ
nipuṇo ] nipuno
spṛhā īrṣyā pralāpī ca rājasaṃ guṇalakṣaṇam
rājasaṃ ] tāmasaṃ
udvega ālaso mohaḥ krūras taskaranirdayaḥ
krūras ] krūra°
krodhaḥ piśunanidrā ca tāmasaṃ guṇalakṣaṇam
piśuna° ] piśuno
vigatarāga uvāca
kena cihnena vijñeya āhāraḥ sarvadehinām
kena cihnena vijñeya āhāraḥ sarvadehinām ] ************* dehinām
traiguṇyasya pṛthaktvena kathayasva tapodhana
anarthayajña uvāca
āyuḥ kīrtiḥ sukhaṃ prītir balārogyavivardhanam
prītir ] prīti priti
hṛdasvādurasaṃ snigdha āhāraḥ sāttvikapriyaḥ
°rasaṃ ] °rasā
sāttvikapriyaḥ ] sāttvikaḥ kiyāḥ
atyuṣṇam āmlalavaṇaṃ rūkṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ vidāhikaḥ
āmla° ] alla°
vidāhikaḥ ] *
rājase śreṣṭham āhāro duḥkhaśokābhayapradaḥ
abhakṣyamedhyapūtī ca pūti paryuṣitaṃ ca yat
abhakṣyamedhyapūtī ca ] abhakṣamadyapūtī vai
āyāsarasavisvāda āhāras tāmasapriyaḥ
āyāsa° ] āyāma°
tāmasa° ] tāmasaḥ
vigatarāga uvāca
guṇātītaṃ kathaṃ jñeyaṃ saṃsāraparapāragam guṇapāśanibaddhānāṃ mokṣaṃ kathaya tattvataḥ
°baddhānāṃ ] °baddhāmo
anarthayajña uvāca
ātmavat sarvabhūtāni samyak paśyeta bho dvija guṇātītaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ saṃsāraparapāragaḥ
guṇātītaḥ ] guṇātītaṃ
īrṣyādveṣasamo yas tu sukhaduḥkhasamāś ca ye stutinindāsamā ye ca guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate
tulyapriyāpriyo yaś ca arimitrasamas tathā
tulya° ] tulyaḥ
mānāpamānayos tulyo guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate
eṣa te kathito vipra guṇasadbhāvanirṇayaḥ
°sadbhāva° ] °madbhāva°
guṇayuktas tu saṃsārī guṇātītaḥ parāṃgatiḥ
°gatiḥ ] °gatim °gati
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe traiguṇyaviśeṣanīyo nāmādhyāyo navamaḥ
nāmādhyāyo navamaḥ ] nāma navamo 'dhyāyaḥ
vigatarāga uvāca
katamaṃ sarvatīrthānāṃ śreṣṭham āhur manīṣinaḥ
tīrthānāṃ śreṣṭham ] tīrthā**ṣṭham
manīṣinaḥ ] manīṣibhiḥ
kathayasva muniśreṣṭha yady asti bhuvi kāmadam
bhuvi ] bhūri
anarthayajña uvāca
atiguhyam idaṃ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ snehād dvijottama bravīmi vaḥ purāvṛttaṃ nandinā kathito 'smy aham
nandikeśvara uvāca
kailāsaśikhare ramye siddhacāraṇasevite
kailāsa° ] kailāśe
tatrāsīnaṃ śivaṃ sākṣād devī vacanam abravīt
devy uvāca
bhagavan devadeveśa sarvabhūtajagatpate praṣṭum icchāmy ahaṃ tv ekaṃ dharmaguhyaṃ sanātanam
atitīrthaparaṃ guhyaṃ saṃsārād yena mucyate manuṣyāṇāṃ hitārthāya brūhi tattvaṃ maheśvara
maheśvara uvāca
ko māṃ pṛcchati tat praśnaṃ muktvā tvām eva sundari
praśnaṃ ] praśna
muktvā ] muktā
śṛnu vakṣyāmi tat praśnaṃ devair api sudurlabham
kurukṣetraṃ prayāgaṃ ca vārāṇasīm ataḥ param gaṅgāgnisomatīrthaṃ ca sūryapuṣkaramānasam
naimiṣaṃ bindusāraṃ ca setubandhaṃ surahradam
°bandhaṃ ] °bandha°
ghaṇṭikeśvaravāgīśaṃ jñātvā niścayapāpahā
niścayapāpahā ] niśca
umovāca
evamādi mahādeva pūrvavat kathitā 'smy aham
kathitā ] kathito
svargabhogapradaṃ tīrtham eteṣāṃ suranāyaka
suranāyaka ] suranāka suranāyakam
kathaṃ mucyate saṃsārāj jñānamātreṇa īśvara kautūhalaṃ mahaj jātaṃ chindhi saṃśayakārakam
°kārakam ] °kāraka
rudra uvāca
kiṃ na jānāsi tat tīrthaṃ sulabhaṃ durlabhaṃ ca yat sulabhaṃ gurusevīnāṃ durlabhaṃ tadvivarjanāt
sulabhaṃ gurusevīnāṃ ] ******vīnāṃ
°varjanāt ] °varjayet
kuruḥ puruṣa vijñeyaḥ śarīraṃ kṣetra ucyate
puruṣa ] puruṣaḥ
śarīraṃ ] śarī
śarīrasthaṃ kurukṣetraṃ sarvatīrthaphalapradam
sarvayajñaphalāvāptiḥ sarvadānaphalāni ca sarvavratatapaś cīrṇaṃ tatphalaṃ sakalaṃ bhavet
evam eva phalaṃ teṣāṃ tīrthapañcadaśeṣu ca snānadhyānaṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ mahātīrthaṃ mahāsukham
snānadhyānaṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ ] ******puṇya
devy uvāca
atīva romaharṣo me jāto 'sti tridaśeśvara sulabhaṃ sukaraṃ sūkṣmaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭiś ca me gatā
caturdaśaparo bhūyaḥ kathayasva manoharam prayāgādi pṛthaktvena tattvatas tu sureśvara
rudra uvāca
suṣumṇā bhavatī gaṅgā iḍā ca yamunā nadī
bhavatī gaṅgā ] bhagavatī ga*
etā śrotavahā nadyaḥ prayāgaḥ sa vidhīyate
dakṣiṇā vāruṇī nāsā vāmanāsā asi smṛtā
vāruṇī ] varuṇī
vāruṇā-asimadhyena tena vārāṇasī smṛtā
ākāśagaṅgā vikhyātā tasyāḥ sravati cāmṛtam ahorātram avicchinnaṃ gaṅgā sā tena ucyate
somatīrtham iḍānāḍī kiṅkiṇīravacihnitā
°rava° ] °rāva°
taṃ tu śrutvā na saṃdehaḥ sarvapāpakṣayo bhavet
taṃ tu ] tantu
sūryatīrthaṃ suṣumṇā ca nīravāravasaṃyutā
nīravā° ] vīravā°
śrutimātrād vimucyeta pāparāśir mahān api
agnitīrthārjunā nāḍī brahmaghoṣamanoramā
°rjunā ] °rjunaṃ
°ramā ] °ramāḥ
tat tad akṣaram ākarṇya amṛtattvāya kalpate
puṣkaraṃ hṛdi madhyastham aṣṭapattraṃ sakarṇikam
°karṇikam ] *** °karṇikām
cintayet sūkṣma tanmadhye janmamṛtyuvināśanam
sūkṣma ] sūkṣmaṃ
mānasaṃ saramadhyasthaṃ sahaṃsakamalopari
mānasaṃ ]
salīlo līlayācārī parataḥ parapāragaḥ
salīlo ] salīlā
naimiṣaṃ śṛṇu deveśi nimiṣā pratyayo bhavet samyag chāyāṃ nirīkṣeta svātmāno vā parasya vā
vā ] ca
āyātapy aṅgulīmātraṃ nimiṣākṣi sa paśyati
°mātraṃ ] °madhye
dṛṣṭvā pratyayam evaṃ hi naimiṣajñas sa ucyate
tīrthaṃ bindusaraṃ nāma śṛṇu vakṣyāmi sundari
tīrthaṃ bindu° ] tīrtham{ }indu°
dehamadhye hṛdi jñeyaṃ hṛdi madhye tu paṅkajam
karṇikā padmamadhye tu binduḥ karṇikamadhyataḥ
°madhye ] °dhye
bindumadhye sthito nādaḥ sa nādaḥ kena bhidyate
bindumadhye ]
bhidyate ]
ukāraṃ ca makāraṃ ca bhitvā nādo vinirgataḥ
ukāraṃ ca makāraṃ ] ukāraś{ }ca makāraś
taṃ viditvā viśālākṣi so 'mṛtatvaṃ labheta vā
so 'mṛtatvaṃ ] somatatvaṃ
vakṣye te setubandhaṃ duritamalaharaṃ nādatoyapravāham
te ] omitted
jihvākaṇṭhorukūlāsuragaṇapulināvartaghoṣā taraṅgā kumbhīrāghoṣamīnā daśagaṇamakarā bhīmanakrāvisargāḥ
daśa° ] **
sānusvāre gabhīre madasukharamaṇaṃ setubandhaṃ vrajasva
vrajasva ] ramasva
saptadvīpāntamadhye śṛṇu śaśivadane sarvaduḥkhāntalābham īśānenābhijuṣṭaṃ hṛdi hradavimalaṃ nāma śītāmbupūrṇam
nāma ] nāda
tatraikaṃ jātapadmaṃ prakṛtidalayutaṃ keśaraṃ śaktibhinnam pañcavyomapraśastaṃ gatiparamapadaṃ prāptukāmena sevyam
sevyam ] sarvam
! nāḍyaikāsaṅgatāni nipatitam amṛtaṃ ghaṇṭikāpārakeṇa
°pārakeṇa ] °yāṅkareṇa
tṛpyante tena nityaṃ hṛdikamalapuṭaṃ sthānabhūtāntarātmā yaṃ paśyantīśabhaktā kalikaluṣaharaṃ vyāpinaṃ niṣprapañcam
°prapañcam ] °prapañca
! deveśaṃ ghaṇṭikeśamarabhavam abhavantīrtham ākāśabindum
°bhavantīrtham ] bhava**rtham
mīmāṃsāratnakūlā kramapadapulinā śaivaśāstrārthatoyā
śaiva° ] śarva°
mīnaughā pañcarātraṃ śrutikuṭilagatismārtavegā taraṅgā
°vegā ] °vegās
yogāvartātiśobhā upaniṣadivahā bhāratāvartaphenā pañcāsadvyomarūpī rasabhavananadī tīrthavāgīśvarīyam
yas taṃ vetti sa vetti vedanikhilaṃ saṃsāraduḥkhacchidam janmavyādhiviyogatāpamaraṇaṃ kleśārṇavaṃ duḥsaham
°rṇavaṃ ] °rṇava
garbhāvāsam atīva sahyaviṣayaṃ dustīrya duḥkhālayam
°viṣayaṃ ] °viṣamaṃ
prāptaṃ tena na saṃśayaḥ śivapadaṃ duṣprāpya devair api
saṃśayaḥ ] saṃśayaṃ
iti vṛsasārasaṃgrahe kāyatīrthopavarṇano nāma daśamo 'dhyāyaḥ
nāmādhyāyo daśamaḥ ] nāma daśamo 'dhyāyaḥ
devy uvāca
sarvayajñaḥ paraśreṣṭha asti anyaḥ surottama
°ttama ] °ttamaḥ
alpakleśam anāyāsa arthaprāyaṃ vineśvara
°nāyāsa ] °nāyā °
vineśvara ] sureśvara
sarvayajñaphalāvāpti daivataiś cāpi pūjitam
daivatai° ] devatai°
kathayasva suraśreṣṭha mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai
°śreṣṭha mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai ] °śre××××××××××
maheśvara uvāca
mahe° ] mehe°
na tulyaṃ tava paśyāmi dayā bhūteṣu bhāmini
tulyaṃ tava ] ××××
bhāmini ] bhāmi
kim anyat kathayiṣyāmi dayā yatra na vidyate
kim{ }anya° ] kimyanya°
sadāśivamukhāt pūrvaṃ śrutaṃ me varasundari śṛṇu devi pravakṣyāmi dharmasāram anuttamam
devi pravakṣyāmi ] te devi vakṣyāmi
°sāram{ }anuttamam ] °sārasamuccayam
vinārthena tu yo yajñaḥ sa yajñaḥ sārvakāmikaḥ
sārvakāmikaḥ ] sarvakālikaḥ sarvakāmika sārvakālikaḥ sārvakāmikāḥ
akṣayaś cāvyayaś caiva sarvapātakanāśanaḥ
akṣayaś{ }cāvyayaś ] akṣayaṃ cāvyayaṃ
°nāśanaḥ ] °nāśanam °nāśana
bahuvighnakaro hy artho bahvāyāsakaras tathā
hy{ }artho ] hy{ }ertho
karas{ }tathā ] karatasthā
brahmahatyā ivendrasya pravibhāgaphalā smṛtā
°phalā smṛtā ] °phala smṛtaḥ °pradaḥ smṛtaḥ
pañcaśodhyena śodhyeta arthayajño varānane
°yajño ] °yajña
śodhite tu phalaṃ śuddham aśuddhe niṣphalaṃ bhavet
śuddham{ }aśuddhe ] śuddhaṃm{ }aśuddhe śuddham{ }aśuddhaṃ
devy uvāca
devy{ }uvāca ] omitted
pañcaśodhye suraśreṣṭha saṃśayo 'tra bhaven mama
°śreṣṭha ] °sre
'tra bhave° ] 'trā bhava°
kathayasva vibhāgena śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
rudra uvāca
manaḥśuddhis tu prathamaṃ dravyaśuddhir ataḥ param
°śuddhir{ }ataḥ ] °śuddhigataḥ
mantraśuddhis tṛtīyā tu karmaśuddhir ataḥ param
mantraśuddhis{ }tṛtīyā ] mantraddhi tṛtīyā
karmaśuddhi° ] karmasiddhi
pañcamī sattvaśuddhis tu kratuśuddhiś ca pañcadhā
°śuddhis{ }tu ] °śuddhiś{ }ca
°śuddhiś{ }ca pañcadhā ] °śuddhis{ }tu pañcadhā °śuddhir{ }ataḥ param
manaḥśuddhir nāma aviparītabhāvanayā
°bhāvanayā ] °bhāvanavā °bhāvanatayā
dravyaśuddhir nāma ananyāyopārjitadravyena
°dravyena ] °vyena
mantraśuddhir nāma svaravyañjanayuktatayā
°yuktatayā ] °yuktayā
kriyāśuddhir nāma yathākramāviparītatayā
°rītatayā ] °rītayā °××tayā
sattvaśuddhir nāma rajastama-apradhānatayā
°dhānatayā ] °dhānata
vidhim evaṃ yadā śudhyed yadi yajñaṃ karoti hi
°dhim{ }evaṃ yadā ] °dhim{ }eva yadā °dhim{ }eva ya °dhim{ }evaṃ yathā
śudhyed{ }yadi ] sūyed{ }yadi pūrya yadi sūryed{ }yadi sūyed{ }yati śuddhya ya°
hi ] omitted
tasya yajñaphalāvāptir janmamṛtyuś ca no bhavet
°vāptir{ }ja° ] °vāpti ja °vāpi ja°
vinārthena tu yo yajñaṃ karoti varasundari
°sundari ] °sundarī
na tasya tatphalāvāptiḥ sarvayajñeṣv aśeṣataḥ
°yajñeṣv{ }aśeṣataḥ ] °yajñeṣu śeṣataḥ
yajñavāṭa kurukṣetraṃ sattvāvāsakṛtālayaḥ
°kṣetraṃ ] °kṣetra
°layaḥ ] °layam
pratyāhāra mahāvediḥ kuśaprastarasaṃyamaḥ
°vediḥ ] °devi
vidhi niyamavistāro dhyānavahnipradīpitaḥ
°vistāro ] °vistārau
dhyānavahnipradīpitaḥ ] dhyānaṃ vahnipradīpitaḥ dhyānam{ }agnipradīpitaḥ dhyāna agnipradīpanaḥ dhyānavahniḥ pradīpitaḥ dhyānavṛddhir pradīpinaḥ
yogendhanasamijjvālatapodhūmasamākulaḥ
°ndhanasamijjvālatapodhūma° ] °ndhanasamijjvālatapodhūpa° ° °ndhanasamijvālatapodhūma° °ndhanaśami °ndhanasamijjvālā tapodhūma°
pātranyāsa śivajñānaṃ sthālīpāka śivātmakaḥ
pātra° ] pātrā°
ājyāhutim avicchinnaṃ lambakaśruvapātitaḥ
°cchinnaṃ ] °cchinna
°pātitaḥ ] °pātitam
dhāraṇādhvaryuvat kṛtvā prāṇāyāmaś ca ṛtvijaḥ
°dhvaryuva° ] °dhvaryava° ° dhva** dharmava°
tarkayuktaḥ savistāraḥ samādhir vayatāpanaḥ
°vistāraḥ ] °vistāro
brahmavidyāmayo yūpaḥ paśubandho manonmanaḥ
°nmanaḥ ] °tmanaḥ
śraddhā patnī viśālākṣi saṃkalpaḥ pada śāśvatam
viśālākṣi ] viśālākṣī
pada śāśvatam ] pa
pañcendriyajayotpannaḥ puroḍāśo 'mṛtāśanaḥ
mṛtā° ] mṛgā°
brahmanādo mahāmantraḥ prāyaścittānilo jayaḥ
jayaḥ ] jalāḥ
somapāna parijñānam upākarma caturyamaḥ
pari° ] para°
itihāsa jalasnānaṃ purāṇakṛtam ambaraḥ
°snānaṃ ] °snāna
°kṛtam{ }ambaraḥ ] °kṛtambaram
iḍāsuṣumnāsaṃvedye snānam ācamanaṃ sakṛt
°vedye ] °vedya °vedyeḥ °vaidya °bhedo
sakṛt ] viduḥ
saṃtoṣātithim ādṛtya dayābhūtadvijārcitaḥ
°toṣātithim{ }ādṛtya ] °toṣatithim{ }āvṛtya
°dvijā° ] °dayā°
brahmakūrca guṇātīta havirgandha nirañjanaḥ
°havir{ }ga° ] °havi °haviga
brahmasūtraṃ trayas tattvaṃ bodhanā muṇḍitaṃ śiraḥ
°sūtraṃ trayas ] °sūtran{ }trayastayas °sūtraṃ traya °sūtratrayaṃ
muṇḍitaṃ ] muṇḍita°
nivṛttyādi caturvedaś catuḥprakaraṇāsanaḥ
nivṛttyā° ] nirvṛtyā°
°prakaraṇāsanaḥ ] prakaranāśanaḥ prakaraśāsanaḥ

°bhayaṃ bhūte ] °bhakṣayam{ }bhūtai

vinārthaṃ yajñasamprāptiḥ kathitā te varānane
vinārthaṃ ] vinārtha
varānane ] va
āsahasrasya yajñānāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti nityaśaḥ
nityaśaḥ ] mānavaḥ
āśramaḥ prathamas tubhyaṃ kathito 'sti varānane
°s{ }tubhyaṃ ] °syeṣa °syaivaṃ
'sti ] smi

°dharmaṃ ] °dha °dharme
pūjitam ] pūpūjitam

°caryaṃ ] °carya

dvitīyam āśramaṃ devi sarvapāpavināśanam
°vināśanam ] °pranāśanam

°paraṃ dhyānaṃ ] °parijñānaṃ

sevet{ }sa ] seve sa sevet{ }ta

varjayet saṃgrahaṃ nityam abhimānaṃ ca varjayet
susūkṣmaṃ manasā dhyātvā śucau pādaṃ vinikṣipet
vinikṣi° ] ×nikṣi° vinikṣa°
na kupyeta anālābhe lābhe vāpi na harṣayet
