arthatṛṣṇāsv anudvigno roṣe vāpi sudāruṇe
°nudvigno ] °nudigno
stutinindā samaṃ kṛtvā priyaṃ vāpriyam eva vā
niyamās tu parīdhānaṃ saṃyamāvṛtamekhalaḥ
°dhānaṃ ] ° °dhānā
°mekhalaḥ ] °mekhalāḥ °mekhalā
nirālambaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā buddhiṃ kṛtvā nirañjanām
°baṃ manaḥ kṛtvā ] °bam{ }asatkṛtvā °bam{ }asaṃkṛtvā °bam{ }anaṃkṛtvā °ba manas{ }kṛtvā °bam{ }anaṅkṛtvā
nirañjanām ] nirañjanam nirañjanaḥ
ātmānaṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtvā khaṃ ca kṛtvā manonmanam
kṛtvā khaṃ ca ] kṛ
manonmanam ] manonmanaḥ manonmanaiḥ
tridaṇḍaṃ triguṇaṃ kṛtvā pātraṃ kṛtvākṣaro 'vyayaḥ
vyayaḥ ] vyayaṃ vyaya dvayam
nyased dharmam adharmaṃ ca īrṣyādveṣaṃ parityajet
°dharmaṃ ca ] °dharmaṃ vā
°dveṣaṃ ] °dveṣa
nirdvandvo nityasatyastho nirmamo nirahaṃkṛtaḥ
°satya° ] °saṃtya°
°kṛtaḥ ] °kṛtaṃ °kṛtiḥ
divasasyāṣṭame bhāge bhikṣāṃ saptagṛhaṃ caret
divasasyā° ] divasatyā°
bhikṣāṃ ] bhikṣā
na cāsīta na tiṣṭheta na ca dehīti vā vadet
yathālābhena varteta aṣṭau piṇḍān dine dine
yathālābhena ] yathālā××
aṣṭau ] aṣṭa
vastrabhojanaśayyāsu na prasajyeta vistaram
°śayyāsu ] °śayyāñca °śaiyyāsu
vistaram ] vistaraḥ
nābhinandeta maraṇaṃ nābhinandeta jīvitam indriyāṇi vaśaṃkṛtvā kāmaṃ hatvā yatavrataḥ
vaśaṃkṛ° ] vasaṃtkṛ°
hatvā yatavrataḥ ] kṛtvā yataḥ vrataḥ
atītaṃ ca bhaviṣyaṃ ca na bhikṣuś cintayet sadā
sadā ] omitted
! krodhamānamadadarpān parivrāḍ varjayet sadā
°darpān{ }pa° ] °darpāt{ }pa°
virāgaṃ tu dhanuḥ kṛtvā prāṇāyāmaguṇair yutam
dhanuḥ ] dhanuṣ
yutam ] yutaḥ vṛtaṃ
dhāraṇāśaratīkṣṇena mṛgaṃ hatvā manendriyam
°tīkṣṇena ] °tīkṣeṇa
maitrīkhaḍgasutīkṣṇena saṃsārāriṃ nikṛntayet
sutīkṣṇena ] sutīkṣṇeṇa ṇa
°sārāriṃ ] °sārāri
karuṇāvartacakreṇa krodhamattagajaṃ jayet
muditāvarmabaddhāṅgas tūṇaṃ pūrṇam upekṣayā
tūṇaṃ pūrṇam{ }u° ] tūṇṇāpūrṇṇam{ }u° tūṇāpūrṇṇam{ }u° tū tūṇṇāpūṇṇām{ }u° tūrṇṇāpūrṇṇam{ }u° tūṇīpūrṇam{ }u°
anakṣaraṃ paraṃ brahma cintayet satataṃ dvija
paraṃ ] para
brahmaṇo hṛdayaṃ viṣṇur viṣṇoś ca hṛdayaṃ śivaḥ
hṛdayaṃ ] ×dayaṃ hṛdaye
viṣṇur{ }vi° ] viṣṇum{ }vi° viṣṇu vi°
śivaḥ ] śivaṃ
śivasya hṛdayaṃ saṃdhyā tasmāt saṃdhyām upāsayet
°sayet ] °śayet °śrayet
saṃsārārṇavatāraṇaṃ śubhagatiḥ sa brahma saṃdhyākṣaraṃ
°kṣaraṃ ] °kṣara
dhyāyen nityam atandrito hy anupamaṃ vyaktātmavedyaṃ śivam
°vedyaṃ ] °vedya
rūpair varṇaguṇādibhiś ca vihitaṃ durlakṣyalakṣyottamaṃ
durlakṣyalakṣyottamam ] durlakṣyalakṣottamam
yatnoddhṛtya samāśrayet suraguruṃ sarvārtihartā haram
sarvārtihartā haram ] sarvārttiha sarvāttiharttā haraṃ sarvārtihan śaṅkaram
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe caturāśramadharmavidhāno nāmādhyāya ekādaśamaḥ
nāmādhyāya ekādaśamaḥ ] nāmādhyāya ekādaśa nāma ekādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
devy uvāca
devy{ }uvāca ] omitted
ahiṃsā paramo dharmaḥ satataṃ parikīrtyate ātithyakānāṃ dharmaṃ ca kathayasva yad uttamam
ātithya° ] atithya°
maheśvara uvāca
ahiṃsātithyakānāṃ ca śṛṇu dharmaṃ yad uttamam
°ttamam ] °ttamāṃ
trailokyam akhilaṃ devi ratnapūrṇaṃ sulocane
°locane ] °locanaṃ
caturvedavide dānaṃ na tattulyam ahiṃsakaḥ
dānaṃ ] nānaṃ
śṛṇu dharmam atithyānāṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi sundari
āsīd vṛttaṃ purākhyānaṃ nagare kusumāhvaye
°khyānaṃ ] °khyātaṃ
kapilasya suto vidvān vipulo nāma viśrutaḥ
dharmanityo jitakrodhaḥ satyavādī jitendriyaḥ brahmaṇyaś ca kṛtajñaś ca madbhaktaḥ kṛtaniścayaḥ
°bhaktaḥ ] °bhakta°
dhanāḍhyo 'tithipūjyaś ca dātā dānto dayālukaḥ
dānto ] dānta dāntomSKT(?)/SKT
nyāyārjitadhano nityam anyāyaparivarjitaḥ
nyāyā° ] nyāyo°
bhāryā ca rūpiṇī tasya candrabimbaśubhānanā pīnottuṅgastanī kāntā sakalānandakāriṇī
sakalā° ] ×××
pativratā patiratā patiśuśrūṣaṇe ratā
pativratā ] prativratā
atha kenāpi kālena sūryarāgam abhūt tataḥ grastabhāgatrayas tv āsīt kṛṣṇamādhavamāsike
snātukāmāvatīryante sarve pauranṛpādayaḥ
°vatīryante ] ca tīrthante
devāś ca pitaraś caiva tarpyante vidhivat tathā
tarpyante ] tapyante
kecij juhvati tatrāgniṃ kecid viprāṃś ca tarpayet
viprāṃś{ }ca ] viprāś{ }ca
kecid dānopatiṣṭhanti kecit stunvanti devatām
devatām ] devatā
dhyānayogaratāḥ kecit kecit pañcatape ratāḥ evaṃ pravartamāneṣu rājanādiṣu sarvaśaḥ
rājanā° ] rājānā°
vipulo 'pi ca tatraiva gaṅgāgaṇḍakisaṃgame
'pi ca ] 'pi
bhāryayā saha tatraiva snātvā kṣomavibhūṣaṇaḥ
bhāryayā ] bhāryāyā
devatāguruviprāṇām anyeṣāṃ tarpaṇe rataḥ
°viprā° ] °vi×
tarpaṇe ] tarpaṇā
tatrāvasarasamprāpto brāhmaṇo 'tithir āgataḥ
bhāryā tasyātirūpeṇa mohitā brahmaṇas tadā
brahmaṇas{ }tadā ] brāhmaṇasya ca
brāhmaṇo 'pi tathaiveha rūpeṇāpratimo bhavet
tathaiveha ] ta
anyonyadṛṣṭisaṃsaktau jātau tau tu parasparam
°saṃsaktau ] °saṃśaktau °śaktau
vipulenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā brāhmaṇa saṃśitavrata
°vrata ] °vra* °vrataḥ
ājñāpaya dvijaśreṣṭha adya me 'nugrahaṃ kuru
°grahaṃ ] °graha
bhāryābhṛtyapaśugrāma ratnāni vividhāni ca
vipulenaivam uktas tu gṛhīto brāhmaṇo 'bravīt yadi satyaṃ pradātāsi suprasannaṃ manas tava
°sannaṃ ] °sanna°
vipula uvāca
suprasannaṃ mano me 'dya suprasannaṃ tapaḥphalam śīghram ājñāpaya vipra yac cābhilaṣitaṃ tava adeyaṃ nāsti viprasya svaśiraḥprabhṛti dvija
°bhṛti ] °bhṛtir
brāhmaṇa uvāca
brāhmaṇa ] brāhmaṇā
yady evaṃ vadase bhadra bhāryāṃ me dehi rūpiṇīm svasti bhavatu bhadraṃ vaḥ kalyāṇaṃ bhava śāśvatam
svasti ] svastir
bhava ] tava
vipula uvāca
vipula ] vipra
pratīccha bhāryāṃ suśroṇīṃ rūpayauvanaśālinīm akutsitāṃ viśālākṣīṃ pūrṇacandranibhānanām
bhāryovāca parityājyā kathaṃ nātha apāpāṃ tyajase katham
°tyājyā ] °tyājya
atīva hi priyāṃ bhāryāṃ nirdoṣāṃ sa kathaṃ tyajeḥ
tyajeḥ ] tyajet
sakhā bhāryā manuṣyāṇām iha loke paratra ca dānaṃ vā sumahad dattvā yajño vā subahuḥ kṛtaḥ
°bahuḥ ] °bahūn
aputro nāpnuyāt svargaṃ tapobhir vā suduṣkaraiḥ
svargaṃ tapobhir{ }vā ] sva
śruto me pitṛbhiḥ prokto brāhmaṇaiś ca mamāntike
°ntike ] °ntikaiḥ
aputro nāpnuyāt svargaṃ śrutaṃ me bahuśaḥ purā
svargaṃ ] svarga
mandapālo dvijaśreṣṭho gataḥ svargaṃ tapobalāt
°pālo ] °pāla
dānāni ca bahūn dattvā yajñāṃś ca vividhāṃs tathā
yajñāṃś{ }ca vividhāṃs ] yatvā yajñāṃś{ }ca vividhāṃ syajñāś{ }ca vividhās
vedāṃś ca japa yajñāṃś ca kṛtvā tad dvijasattamaḥ
vedāṃś{ }ca japayajñāṃś{ }ca ] vedāś{ }ca japayajñāṃś{ }ca vedāś{ }ca japayajñāś{ }ca
prāptadvāro 'pi yasyāpi devadūtair nivāritaḥ
yasyāpi ] yasyāhi
aputro nāpnuyāt svargaṃ yadi yajñaśatair api
ity uktas tu cyutaḥ svargān mandapālo mahān ṛṣiḥ putrān utpādayām āsa śāraṅgāś caturo dvijaḥ
śāraṅgāś{ }ca ] śāraṅgaṃś{ }ca śāraṅgāc{ }ca
tena puṇyaprabhāveṇa svargaṃ prāpto hy avāritaḥ kulatrāṇāṃ kalatrāsmi bharaṇād bhārya eva ca
bhārya eva ] bhāryam{ }eva
dārasaṃgraha putrārthe kriyate śāstradarśanāt
kriyate ] kriyāte
yāni santi gṛhe dravyaṃ grāmaghoṣagṛhāṇi ca
dātum arhasi viprāya na māṃ dātum ihārhasi bhāryāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā vipulaḥ punar abravīt
vipula uvāca
vipula uvāca ] omitted
sādhu bhāmini jānāmi sādhu sādhu pativrate
jānāmi ] jānāsi
jito 'smy anena vākyena anenāsmi hi toṣitaḥ
adya grahaṇakāle ca dvija āgatya yācate dadāmīti pratijñāya adattvā narakaṃ vraje
vraje ] vrajet
narakaṃ yadi gacchāmi kulena saha sundari kalpakoṭisahasre 'pi narakasthād yaśasvini
°sahasre 'pi ] °sahasrāṇi
°sthād ] sthā °stho
muktim eva na paśyāmi janmakoṭiśatair api
muktim{ }eva ] muktim{ }evan
adānāc cāśubhaṃ devi paśyāmi varavarṇini
dānena tu śubhaṃ paśye svargaloke yad akṣayam
°loke ] °lokaṃ
noktaṃ mayānṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ nityaṃ satyavrate sthitaḥ
°vrate ] °vrata°
satyadharmam atikramya nānyadharmaṃ samācare
°care ] °caret
bhāryā dharmasakhety evaṃ tvayi pūrvam udāhṛtam
yadi dharmasakhāyāsi so 'dya kāla ihāgataḥ
°sakhāyā° ] °sakhā°
dvijarūpadharo dharmaḥ svayam eva ihāgataḥ
°dharo ] °paro
jijñāsārtham ahaṃ bhadre na vighnaṃ kartum arhasi mātāvyaktaḥ pitā brahmā buddhir bhāryā damaḥ sakhā
sakhā ] samā
putro dharmaḥ kriyācārya ity ete mama bāndhavāḥ kālaśreṣṭho grahaḥ sūryo gaṅgā śreṣṭhā nadīṣu ca
°śreṣtho ] °śreṣṭha° °śreṣṭhaḥ
candrakṣaye dinaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ naraśreṣṭho dvijottamaḥ
dinaṃ ] dina°
śuśrūṣaṇārthaṃ viprasya mayā dattāsi sundari
dattāsi ] dattāni
sarvasvaṃ brāhmaṇe dattvā vanam evāśrayāmy aham
śaṅkara uvāca
śaṅkara ] maheśvara
tūṣṇīmbhūtā tato bhāryā aśrupūrṇākulekṣaṇā
bhāryā ] bhāryāṃ
°kṣaṇā ] °kṣaṇām
kare gṛhya viśālākṣī brāhmaṇāya niveditā
brāhmaṇāya niveditā ] brāhmaya diveditā
yāni santi gṛhe dravyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ paśavas tathā
hiraṇyaṃ ] hiraṇya°
dadāmi te dvijaśreṣṭha grāmaghoṣagṛhādikam
te dvija° ] ××ja°
muktā vaiḍūryavāsāṃsi divyāṇy ābharaṇāni ca sarvān gṛhāṇa viprendra śraddhayā dattasatkṛtām
prīyatāṃ bhagavān dharmaḥ prīyatāṃ ca maheśvaraḥ prīyantāṃ pitaraḥ sarve yady asti sukṛtaṃ phalam
prīyantāṃ ] prīyatāṃ
asti ] asi
rudra uvāca
rudra ] maheśvara
vipulasya vacaḥ śrutvā brāhmaṇena tapasvinā
vacaḥ śrutvā ] vaca
āśīḥ suvipulaṃ dattvā vipulāya mahātmane
vaset tatra gṛhe ramye bhāryām ādāya tasya ca
vaset{ }tatra gṛhe ] vasa tatra gṛhe vasate ca gṛhaṃ
vipulas tu namaskṛtvā kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
cāpi ] ca vi°
brāhmaṇam abhivādyaivaṃ gataḥ śīghraṃ vanāntaram
°dyaivaṃ ] °dyevaṃ °dyenaṃ
vane mūlaphalāhāro vicareta mahītale
ekākī vijane śūnye cintayā ca pariplutaḥ
ekākī ] e
kva gacchāmi kva bhokṣyāmi kutra vā kiṃ karomy aham
kva bhokṣyāmi ] kva bhojyāmi kiṃ bhokṣyāmi
na pathaṃ viṣayaṃ vedmi grāmaṃ vā nagarāṇi vā kheṭakharvaṭadeśaṃ vā jānāmīha na kaṃcana
°kharvaṭa° ] °karppaṭa°
kaṃcana ] kaścana
amuṃ suśailaṃ paśyāmi vipulodarakandaram tam āruhya nirīkṣyāmi grāmaṃ nagarapattanam
evam uktvā tu vipulaḥ śanaiḥ parvatam āruhat
°ruhat ] °ruhet
vṛkṣacchāyāṃ samālokya niṣasāda śramānvitaḥ
etasminn eva kāle tu vṛkṣaśākhāvatārya ca
kāle tu ] kālena
apūrvaṃ ca surūpaṃ ca sugandhatvaṃ ca śobhanam
surūpaṃ ] svarūpaṃ
phalaṃ gṛhya vicitraṃ ca hṛdayānandanaṃ śubham vipulasyāgrataḥ kṛtvā punar vṛkṣaṃ samāruhat
vipulaś citravad dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ aho vā svapnabhūto 'smi aho vā tapasaḥ phalam
na paśyāmi na jighrāmi na ca svādaṃ ca vedmy aham
jighrāmi ] ca ghrāmi
vārtāpi na ca me śrotrā pratijānāmi kaṃcana
śrotrā ] śrotā
kaṃcana ] kaścana
evam uktvā hy anekāni phalaṃ gṛhya manoramam sunirīkṣya punar jighraṃ punar jighraṃ nirīkṣya ca
phalaṃ cātra nirūpyanto deśaṃ vāpy avalokayan
°lokayan ] °lokayat
pātheyarahitaś cāsmi devadattaṃ phalaṃ mama
°dattaṃ ] °datta°
tatphalaṃ pratigṛhyaiva nagaraṃ praviśāmy aham
°gṛhyaiva ] °gṛhyeva
prārthayitvā ca yat kiṃcij jīvanārthaṃ carāmy aham
tataḥ śailam atikramya nagaraṃ praviveśa ha pathi kaścij janaḥ pṛṣṭhaḥ kiṃnāma nagaraṃ tv idam
nagaraṃ ] nagara
sa hovāca pathī kena kim apūrvam ihāgataḥ
sa ho° ] aho°
dakṣiṇāpathadeśo 'yaṃ naravīrapuraṃ tv adaḥ
tv{ }adaḥ ] tvayaḥ svayam
rājā siṃhajaṭo nāma rājñī tasya ca kekayī
°jaṭo ] °yato
kekayī ] kaikayī
ativṛddho jarāgrastaḥ kekayī ca tathaiva ca
kekayī ] kaikayī
dātā sarvakalājñaś ca yuddhe vīryabalānvitaḥ
°kalā° ] °kala°
brahmaṇyo vatsalo loke sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ
vipula uvāca
atra śreṣṭhim upāsyāmi nāma vā tasya kiṃ vada
vada ] vadaḥ
katamo deśas tadvāsaḥ kathayasva na saṃśayaḥ
kathayasva ] kathayasya
vipulenaivam uktas tu pathikovāca taṃ punaḥ mama bhīmabalo nāma śreṣṭhikasya gṛhāgataḥ
mama bhīmabalo nāma ] mama bhī×balo nāma omitted
śreṣṭhikaḥ puṇḍako nāma khyātaḥ śreṣṭhika ucyate kautukaṃ tava yady asti tad āgaccha mayā saha
evam astv iti tenokto vipulena mahātmanā
°kto ] °ktau
tenaiva saha niryātaḥ śreṣṭhikasya gṛhaṃ prati
prati ] pratiḥ
śreṣṭhikaḥ svagṛhāsīno dṛṣṭaḥ sa vipulena tu
dṛṣṭaḥ sa ] dṛṣṭa sa
tasyāntikam upāgamya tat phalaṃ sa niveditaḥ
aho phalam idaṃ śreṣṭham aho phalam ihānitam aho rūpam aho gandham aho phalaṃ suśobhanam
phalaṃ ] phala
tat phalaṃ na mahījātaṃ na merau na ca kandare
tat{ }pha° ] yat{ }pha°
devalokika suvyaktaṃ na martya upajāyate
martya upajāyate ] martya martya supajāyate mahyām{ }upajāyate
aho 'smi saphalaṃ bhoktā rājārhaś ca na saṃśayaḥ
saphalaṃ ] tat{ }phalaṃ
ḍhaukayitvā phalaṃ divyaṃ rājānaṃ toṣayāmy aham
tatas tvarita gatvaiva phalaṃ gṛhya manoharam
tvarita ] tvaritaṃ
°haram ] °ramam
ādareṇopasṛtyaiva rājānaṃ sa phalaṃ dadau
sa phalaṃ ] tat{ }phalaṃ
rājā ca sa phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ
sa phalaṃ ] tat{ }phalaṃ
kutaḥ śreṣṭhi tvayā nītaṃ phalaṃ sarvamanoharam
śreṣṭhi ] śreṣṭha
phalaṃ sarvamanoharam ] phala××××haram
svādumūlaphalakandaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvaṃ na tādṛśam
°kandaṃ dṛṣṭvā ] °skanda dṛṣṭvā °skanda dṛṣṭā
tādṛśam ] yādṛśam
rūpagandhaguṇopetaṃ hṛdayānandakārakam
sadya evopabhuñjāmi tvayā dattam idaṃ phalam
sadya evopayuñjāmi ] satya eva prabhuñjāmi
kīdṛśaṃ svāda vijñātum icchāmi kuru māciram
svādavijñānam ] svādu vijñātum
tataḥ sa bhakṣayām āsa phalaṃ cāmṛtasaṃnibham
tataḥ ] tata
amṛtopamasusvādaṃ sarvaṃ ca bubhuje nṛpaḥ
svādaṃ sarvaṃ ca ] svā××××
sadya ṣoḍaśavarṣasya yauvanaṃ samapadyata
°padyata ] °padyate
na valīpalitaṃ sadyo na jarā na ca durbalaḥ
valī° ] vali°
keśadantanakhasnigdho dṛḍhadanto dṛḍhendriyaḥ
°danto ] °deho
tejaścakṣurbalaprāṇān sadya sarvān avāptavān
°cakṣurbalaprāṇān ] °cakṣuvalaprāṇaṃ
mantrī purohitāmātya sarve bhṛtyajanās tathā
sarve bhṛtyajanās{ }tathā ] janās{ }tathās{ }tathā
paurastrī bālavṛddhāś ca sarve te vismayaṃ gatāḥ
°strī ] °stri
sarve ] ××
rājā siṃhajaṭo nāma tuṣṭim eva parāṃ gataḥ praharṣam atulaṃ caiva prāptavān sa nareśvaraḥ
uvāca rājā taṃ śreṣṭhiṃ svārthatatparanirdayaḥ
śreṣṭhiṃ ] śreṣṭhaṃ
°dayaḥ ] °daya
kuru bhīmabalas tv evaṃ phalam ānaya adya vai
bhīmabalas{ }tv{ }evaṃ ] bhīmavastv{ }evaṃ
punar me yauvanaprāptis tvatprasādān narottama
°ttama ] °ttamaḥ
kekayīṃ durbalāṃ vṛddhāṃ punaḥ prāpaya yauvanam
kekayīṃ durbalāṃ ] kaikayīn{ }durbalān kekayīṃ kekayī durbalā
vṛddhāṃ punaḥ ] vṛ vṛddhā punaḥ
sa rājñā evam uktas tu śreṣṭhī bhīmabalas tathā
śreṣṭhī ] śreṣṭhi
pratyuvāca ha rājānaṃ prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ sthitaḥ
°vāca ha ] °vācāha
na phaledaṃ vane rājan na vāṇijyakṛṣeṇa vā
na phaledaṃ ] na vane na
kenāpi kulaputreṇa tava darśanakāṃkṣayā
datto 'smi tava rājendra mayā datto 'si bhūpate
datto 'si ] prāpto ṣi
na te śaknomy ahaṃ rājan vaktuṃ vaideśinaṃ naram
te ] ca
rājan{ }vaktuṃ ] rā××ktum
vaideśinaṃ naram ] ca dehi tannaraḥ
śrutvā bhīmabalaṃ vākyaṃ pratyuvāca tataḥ punaḥ
°balaṃ ] °bala°
amātyakulaputras tvaṃ brūhi madvacanaṃ punaḥ
yadi nāsti kim etat taṃ mayā vā prārthito bhavān
kim{ }etat ] kim{ }edat
prārthito ] mārjjito
yatra hy eko bahavo 'tra jāyante nātra saṃśayaḥ
yatra hy{ }eko bahavo 'tra ] yatraścaiko bahūn{ }tatra
āgamopāyamārgaṃ ca tenaiva sa tu gamyatām avaśyaṃ tena gantavyaṃ tena mārgeṇa mārgaya
avaśyaṃ tena ] ava
mārgaya ] mārgayaḥ
adattvā phalam anyac ca śiraś chedyāmi durmateḥ
°mateḥ ] °mate
chedya caṇḍavicaṇḍābhyāṃ rakṣabhīmabalādhamaḥ
chedya ] chedye
tato bhīmabalaḥ kruddhaḥ khaḍgaṃ gṛhya śaśiprabham
śaśiprabham ] śaśī pradam
alaṅghya vacanaṃ rājñaḥ kulaputra vraja tvaram
alaṅghya ] uvāca
kulaputra vraja tvaram ] kulaputraṃ vrajatyaram
mā ruṣa kulaputra tvaṃ mayā vadhyo bhaviṣyasi
°putra ] °putras
yady asti phalam anyad vā dehi rājānam adya vai
yady{ }asti ] ×dyosti
yatra prāptaṃ phalaṃ divyaṃ tatra vā deśaya tava
prāptaṃ ] prāpti
deśaya ] deśayan
tatphalena vinā bhadra durlabhaṃ tava jīvitam
vipula uvāca
jīvitāśām ahaṃ prāpto vaideśi bhavanaṃ tava kṛtakartā kathaṃ vadhyaḥ prāpnuyām aham adya vai
prāpnuyām ] prāpto 'yam
phalaṃ vā na punas tv anyad dātuṃ śakyaṃ na kenacit
śakyaṃ na kenacit ] śakya××nacit
sahya parvataśailāgre āśīnaḥ śrāntamānasaḥ
vānaras tatphalaṃ gṛhya mama dattvā punar gataḥ
mama ] mahyaṃ
mayā dattam idaṃ tubhyaṃ tvayāpi ca narādhipe
tatra gacchāva bho śreṣṭhi dṛśyate yadi vānaraḥ tvayā mayā ca gatvaiva yo vāsaḥ plavagādhipaḥ
gatvaiva ] gatveva
śreṣṭhinā ca tathety āha gacchāmaḥ sahitā vayam
gacchāmaḥ ] ga×mas
yatra prāptaṃ phalaṃ tubhyaṃ mokṣayāmo na saṃśayaḥ
prāptaṃ ] prāpta
rudra uvāca
tam āruhya giriṃ sahyaṃ mārgamāṇaḥ samantataḥ
°mānaḥ ] °mānāḥ
vipulena tato dṛṣṭo vānaraḥ plavagādhipaḥ
plavagā° ] plagā°
ayaṃ sa vānaraśreṣṭho vṛkṣacchāyāsamāśritaḥ
vānara° ] vānaraḥ
°cchāyā° ] °cchāṃyā°
mama puṇyabalenaiva dṛśyate 'dyāpi vānaraḥ
vānara kuru mitrārthaṃ sadyomṛtyur bhaven mama pūrvadattaṃ phalam anyad dehi vānara jīvaya
vānara jīvaya ] vā na ca jīvaye
vānara uvāca
gandharveṇa mama dattaṃ phalaṃ dattaṃ tu te mayā punar anyat kathaṃ dāsye tatra gaccha yadīcchasi
vipula uvāca
adattvā tat phalaṃ tubhyaṃ jīvituṃ saṃśayo bhavet athavā tatra gacchāmo yatra citrarathaḥ svayam
athavā tatra ] a×××tra
vānaraḥ punar evāha evaṃ kurvāmahe vayam tataś citrarathāvāsam upagamyedam abravīt
tataś ] tatra
gandharvarāja kāryārthī tvaṃ hy ahaṃ punar āgataḥ
tvaṃ ] tvat
pūrvadattaphalaṃ tv anyad dehi māṃ yadi śakyate
gandharvarājovāca sūryalokagataś cāsmi tena dattaṃ phalottamam
gataś{ }cāsmi ] gata
tena dattaṃ ] ×××ttam
mayā dattaṃ phalaṃ tubhyam atyantasuhṛdo 'si me
dattaṃ ] datta°
kuto 'nyat phalam ādāsye mama nāsti plavaṅgama
'nyat{ }phalam{ }ādāsye ] 'nyaphala dāsyāmi
mama nāsti plavaṅgama ] matto 'sti plavaṅgamaḥ
sūryalokaṃ gamiṣyāmas tatra yācasva bhāskaram
gamiṣyāmas ] gamiṣyāmi
gandharvenaivam uktas tu tathety āha plavaṅgamaḥ sūryalokaṃ tataḥ prāptā gandharvādaya sarvaśaḥ
°daya ] °dayas °dayaḥ
gandharva uvāca
gandharva uvāca ] gandharva gandharvarājovāca
kāryārthena punaḥ prāptas tvatsakāśaṃ khageśvara pūrvadattaphalaṃ tv anyad dehi jīvam anāśaya
tv{ }anya° ] stv{ }anya°
°nāśaya ] °nāśayaḥ
sūrya uvāca
somalokagataś cāsmi tena dattaṃ phalottamam saphalaṃ dattam evāsi suhṛdatvān mayā tava
°vāsi ] °vābhiḥ
suhṛdatvān ] sa ca dattvā
anyad dātuṃ na śaknomi gaccha somapurādya vai
anyad ] anya
°purādya ] °parādya
taṃ prārthayāvikalpena atriputraṃ graheśvaram
°vikalpena ] °
°putraṃ ] °putra°
rudra uvāca
rudra ] maheśvara
gataḥ sūryāgrataḥ kṛtvā somalokaṃ tathaiva hi
gataḥ ] gata
uvāca sūryaḥ somāya kāraṇāpekṣayā śaśim
śaśim ] śaśi
soma uvāca
kimartham āgato bhūyaḥ kartavyaṃ tatra bhāskara
°kara ] °karaḥ
phalaṃ dātuṃ punas tv anyan muktvā tv anyat karomy aham
anyan ] anya anyat
anyat{ }ka° ] anyaṅ{ }ka°
sūrya uvāca
yadi śakyaṃ phalaṃ dehi anyan na prārthayāmy aham
anyan ] anyān
na dattāsi phalam anyan mayā vaddhyo bhaviṣyasi
phalam{ }anyan ] phalaṃ manye
vaddhyo ] vaddho
soma uvāca
āgamaṃ tasya vakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣvāvahito bhava indreṇāsmi phalaṃ dattaṃ saphalaṃ datta me bhavān
gatvaivendrasadas tv anyat prārthayāmaḥ sahaiva tu
gatvaivendra° ] gandharvendra°
evaṃ kurma iti prāha gatvendrasadanaṃ prati
kurma ] soma
somenendram uvācedaṃ phalakāmā ihāgatāḥ pūrvadattaphalam anyad dehi śakra mamādya vai
śakra ] śaka
indra uvāca
yad artham iha samprāptaḥ sa ca nāsti niśākara
°kara ] °karaḥ
viṣṇuhastān mayā prāptam ekam eva phalaṃ śubham
sarva eva hi gacchāmo viṣṇulokaṃ graheśvara sarva evopajagmus te phalārthaṃ madhusūdanam
°jagmu° ] °ñjagmu°
evam uktvā gatāḥ sarve devarājapuraskṛtāḥ
°ktvā ] °ktā
muhūrtenaiva samprāptā viṣṇulokaṃ yaśasvini
upasṛtya tata indraḥ praṇipatya janārdanam sarveṣām uparodhena prārthayāmi yaśodhara
°dhara ] °dharam
viṣṇur uvāca
viṣṇur{ }u° ] viṣṇu u°
pūrvadattaphalasyārthe tac ca sarvam ihāgatāḥ
°rthe ] °rthi
na śaknomi phalaṃ dātuṃ kiṃ vā tv anyat karomy aham
tv{ }anyat ] tv{ }anyaṅ
indra uvāca
brahmāṇḍam api bhettuṃ tvaṃ śaknoṣi garuḍadhvaja
bhettuṃ tvaṃ ] bhartuṃtvaṃ
aśakyaṃ tava nāstīti jānāmi puruṣottama
°ttama ] °ttamam
evam uktvā punar viṣṇuḥ pratyuvāca purandaram phalam ekaṃ parityajya sarvaṃ śaknomi kauśika
upāyo 'tra pravakṣyāmi āgamaṃ śṛṇu gopate brahmaṇā ca mama dattaṃ tat phalaikaṃ purandara
mama ] mamā°
mayā dattaphalaṃ tv ekaṃ kim anyad dātum icchasi
°cchasi ] °cchati
prārthayāmo 'tra gatvaikaṃ parameṣṭhiprajāpatim
prārthayāmo 'tra gatvaikaṃ ] prārthayā ca gatvaivaṃ
°ṣṭhi° ] °ṣṭhiṃ
tavoparādhād devendra prārthayāmi pitāmaham
tavo° ] tato°
evam uktvā gatāḥ sarve puraskṛtya janārdanam
gatāḥ ] gatā
indraḥ somaś ca sūryaś ca gandharvo vānaras tathā
sūryaḥ śaśī caiva ] somaś{ }ca sūryaś{ }ca
vipulaḥ śreṣṭhikaś caiva rājadūtadvayaṃ tathā
°dvayaṃ ] °dvayas
brahmalokaṃ muhūrtena prāptavān surasundari dṛṣṭvā brahmasado ramyaṃ sarvakāmaparicchadam
°sado ] °sadaṃ
anekāni vicitrāṇi ratnāni vividhāni ca mandārataruśobhāni vaidūryamaṇikuṭṭimam
°taru° ] °tala°
°kuṭṭimam ] °kuṭimām
pravālamaṇistambhāni vajrakāñcanavedikām
°vedikām ] °vedikā
pravālasphāṭiko jāla indranīlagavākṣakaḥ
°sphāṭiko jāla ] °sphaṭiko jālā
dṛśyate vipulas tatra nānāvṛkṣa manoramāḥ
vipula° ] vipulā°
puṣpānāmitavṛkṣāgrāḥ phalānāmitakā bhavet
°grāḥ ] °grā °yā
phalānāmitakā ] phalanāmitakāṃ
sarve ratnamayā vṛkṣāḥ sarve ratnamayaṃ jalam vṛkṣagulmalatāvallī kandamūlaphalāni ca
sarve ratnamayā dṛṣṭā vipulo vipulekṣaṇaḥ
sarve ] sarvai
anekabhaumaṃ prāsādaṃ muktādāmavibhūṣitam
apsarogaṇakoṭībhiḥ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitam vimānakoṭikoṭīśaṃ sarvakāmasamanvitam
brahmalokasabhā ramyā sūryakoṭisamaprabhā tatra brahmā sukhāsīno nānāratnopaśobhite
caturmūrtiś caturvaktraś caturbāhuś{}caturbhujaḥ caturvedadharo devaś caturāśramanāyakaḥ
caturvedāvṛtas tatra mūrtimantam upāsate gāyatrī vedamātā ca sāvitrī ca surūpiṇī
vyāhṛtiḥ praṇavaś caiva mūrtimān samupāsate
praṇavaś{ }caiva ] praṇa
vauṣaṭkāro vaṣaṭkāro namaskāraḥ sa mūrtimān
śrutiḥ smṛtiś ca nītiś ca dharmaśāstraṃ samūrtimān
°śāstraṃ samūrtimat ] °śāstrasamūrtimān
itihāsaḥ purāṇaṃ ca sāṃkhyayogaḥ patañjalam
purāṇaṃ ] purāṇaś
°jalam ] °jali
āyurvedo dhanurvedo vedo gāndharva-m-eva ca
gāndharva-m-eva ] gāndharvar{ }eva
arthavedo 'nyavedāś ca mūrtimān samupāsite
arthavedo 'nyavedāś{ }ca ] arthavedānyavedañ{ }ca
tato brahmā samutthāya abhigamya janārdinam gāṃ ca arghaṃ ca dattvaivam āsyatām iti cābravīt
arghaṃ ] arghyaṃ
maṇiratnamaye divye āsane garuḍadhvajaḥ devarājo raviḥ somo gandharvaḥ plavageśvaraḥ
raviḥ somo ] śaśī sūryo
vipulaś ca mahāsattva āsyatāṃ ratna-āsane
°āsane ] °śāśane
sādhu bho vipulaśreṣṭha sādhu bho vipulaṃ tapaḥ
vipulaṃ tapaḥ ]
sādhu bho vipulaprājña sādhu bho vipulaśriya
°śriya ] °śriyaḥ
toṣitāḥ sma vayaṃ sarve brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ
toṣitāḥ ] toṣitā
ādityā vasavo rudrā sādhyāśvinau marut tathā
sādhyāśvinau ] sādhyāśvinyau sādhyā yakṣo
bhuṅkṣva bhogān yathotsāhaṃ mama loke yathāsukham
bhuṅkṣva ] bhuṃkṣa
iyaṃ vimānakoṭīṇāṃ tavārthāyopakalpitā
kalpitā ] kalpitān
sahasrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi apsarā kāmarūpiṇī
°rūpiṇī ] °rūpiṇi
tavārthīyopasarpanti sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitāḥ
v°rthīyo° ] °rtheyo°
yāvat kalpasahasrāṇi parārdhāni tapodhana
°dhana ] °dhanāḥ
yatra yatra prayāsitvaṃ tatra tatropabhujyatām
maheśvara uvāca
iti śrutvā vacas tasya vipulo vipulekṣaṇaḥ vepamāno bhayatrasta aśrupūrṇākulekṣaṇaḥ
bhayatrasta ] bhayas{ }tatra
praṇamya śirasā bhūmau praṇipatya punaḥ punaḥ uvāca madhuraṃ vākyaṃ brahmaloke pitāmaham
°loke ] °loka
vipula uvāca
bhagavan sarvalokeśa sarvalokapitāmaha svapnabhūtam ivāścaryaṃ paśyāmi tridaśeśvara
smṛtibhraṃśaś ca me jāto buddhir jātāndhacetanā
jātāndhacetanā ] jāto 'ndhacetanaḥ
mūḍho 'haṃ tvāṃ kathaṃ staumi jñānātītaṃ parāt param
tubhyaṃ trailokyabandho bhava mama śaraṇaṃ trāhi saṃsāraghoram
tubhyaṃ ] namas
bhīto 'haṃ garbhavāsāj jaramaraṇabhayāt trāhi māṃ mohabandhāt
°bhayāt ] bhayan
! nityaṃ rāgādhivāsam aniyatavapuṣaṃ trāhi māṃ kālapāśāt
rogā° ] °rāgā°
tiryaṃ cānyonyabhakṣaṃ bahuyugaśataśas trāhi mohāndhakārāt
tiryaṃ ] tiryaś
śrutvaivovāca brahmā vipulamati punar mānayitvā yathāvat
mānayitvā ] mānayaṃvā
! āhūta samplavante bhaviṣyasi tava me janmalobho na bhūyaḥ
me janmalobho na ] yajanmalābhānu
garbhāvāsannacatvanna ca punamaraṇaṃ kleśam āyāsapūrṇam
puna ] punar
chittvā mohāndhaśatruṃ vrajasi ca paramaṃ brahmabhūyatvam esi
maheśvara uvāca
brahmaṇā evam uktas tu viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vo yathovāca pitāmahaḥ
indreṇa raviṇā caiva somena ca punaḥ punaḥ
raviṇā ] śaśinā
somena ] sūryeṇa
sādhyādityair marudrudrair viśvebhir vasavais tathā
viśvebhir ] viśveśvi
aho tapaḥ phalaṃ divyaṃ vipulasya mahātmanaḥ svaśarīraṃ divaṃ prāptaṃ śraddhayā tithipūjayā
sva° ] sa°
°pūjayā ] °pūjanāt
evam ādīny anekāni vipule parikīrtitam brahmāṇaṃ punar evāha viṣṇur viśvajagatprabhuḥ
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe vipulopākhyāno nāmādhyāyo dvādaśamaḥ
nāmādhyāyo dvādaśamaḥ ] nāma dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
devy uvāca
ahiṃsātithyakānāṃ ca śruto dharmaḥ suvistaraḥ kiṃ na kurvanti manujāḥ sukhopāyaṃ mahat phalam
svaśarīrasthito yajñaḥ svaśarīre sthitaṃ tapaḥ svaśarīre sthitaṃ tīrthaṃ śruto vistarato mayā
kimarthaṃ bhagavan brūhi sukhopāyaṃ mahat phalam kiṃ nivṛttās tu deveśa ṛṣidaivatamānuṣāḥ
mahādeva uvāca
mahādeva ] bhagavān
adya pṛṣṭena kathitaṃ gopitaṃ ṛṣi sundari mānuṣāṇāṃ hitārthāya tava ca varavarṇini
adyaprabhṛti deveśi khyātir loke bhaviṣyati dhanyā evaṃ cariṣyanti adhanyā na ramanti tam
triguṇena tu bandhena baddhā pāśadṛḍhena tu tenārthena ramanty atra jānanto 'pi vimohitāḥ
devy uvāca
kiṃ vā triguṇabandheti brūhi saṃśayachedaka adyāpi mama deveśa mohotpannas tribandhanaiḥ
bhagavān uvāca
prākṛtaṃ vaikṛtaṃ caiva dakṣiṇābandham eva ca etenaiva tu bandhena baddhāḥ varṇāśramāḥ sadā
jñānahīnā nivartante paramaṃ prāpya tatparam iṣṭastrīṇā nivartante dhanadhānyasamuccaye snehād ākṛṣya manasāṃ bandhaḥ prākṛta ucyate
yogayuktena manasā yad yad aiśvaryam āpyate tac ca vaikṛtabandhas tu yadi tatrānurajyate
ārāmodyānavāpīṣu dānakratuphaleṣu ca āśaktamanasā vācā dakṣiṇābandhaḥ kathyate
anenaiva tu pāśena baddhāvānaravad yathā mokṣitaṃ na ca śaknoti itaś cetaś ca dhāvati
devāsuramanuṣyeṣu tiryeṣu narakeṣu ca bhramante cakrayantreva ? yāvat tattvaṃ na vindati
garbhavāsaparikleśau janmamṛtyu punaḥ punaḥ vyādhiḥ śokabhayāyāsa cintayā jarayā hataḥ
devy uvāca
garbhotpattiḥ kathaṃ deva yogī labhati kīdṛśīm kīdṛśaṃ labhate garbhaḥ śrotuṃ naḥ pratyudīryatām
bhagavān uvāca
śṛṇu devi pravakṣyāmi garbhotpattir yathākramam yathā saṃśayavicchedaṃ bhaviṣyasi varānane
akṣarāt prabhavo brahmā karmabaddhasamudbhavam karmato yajñaprabhavo yajñato dhūmasambhavaḥ
parjanyād annam utpattir annād bhūtāni jajñire annād rasasamutpatti rasāc choṇitasambhavaḥ
śoṇitāt - māṃsa-m-utpatti māṃsād medasamudbhavaḥ medaso 'sthīni jāyante asthibhyo majjasambhavaḥ
majjāyās tu bhavec chukraṃ naraḥ śukrasamudbhavaḥ śukraśoṇitasaṃyogād garbhotpattis tataḥ smṛtaḥ
agnisomātmakaṃ devi śarīradvayadhātutaḥ somadhātusmṛtaṃ śukram agnidhāturajasmṛtam agnisomāśrayaṃ devi śarīram iti saṃjñitam
māsī māsī ṛtuḥ strīṇāṃ bhavatīha na saṃśayaḥ ṛtukāle prasarpyeta na sukhārthaṃ varānane
putrakāmaprayuñjīta dharmārthaś ca yaśasvini pumān strīpuṃ prayuñjīta araṇī bahutāśanaḥ
pumān śukrādhiko jñeyaḥ kanyā raktādhikā bhavet samaśukre ca rakte ca sa ca jāyen napuṃsakaḥ
devy uvāca
dviyamā triyamā caiva kathaṃ jāyeta gurviṇī kathaṃ strīdviyamā jāyet kathaṃ vā puruṣadvayam
bhagavān uvāca
raktādhikā smṛtā kanyā jāyate varavarṇini vāyunā ca dvidhā bhinnā kanyakadviyamā smṛtā
śukrādhikās tu puruṣa dvidhā bhinnānilena tu dviyamā puruṣo jñeyā triyamās tu tridhā kṛte
ṛtusnātā yadā nārī yadi garbhādi gṛhyati prathame ca dvitīye ca tṛtīye ca sa jīvati
sameṣu janayet putraḥ kanyakā viṣame dine ṣaṣṭyāṣṭamau ca daśamī dvādaśī ca pumān bhavet
pañcamī saptamī caiva navamekādaśī striyaḥ samarakte ca śukre ca śyāmaḥ saṃjāyate pumān
rudhiraṃ tv ekarātreṇa kalalaṃ pratipadyate kalalaṃ pañcarātreṇa arbudatvaṃ prajāyate
arbudaḥ saptarātreṇa māṃsapeśī samudbhavaḥ dvitīyaṃ saptarātreṇa tat sarvaṃ māṃsaśoṇitam
tṛtīyaṃ saptarātreṇa hṛdayaṃ jāyate tataḥ tataḥ sarvāṇi gātrāṇi śiraś caivopajāyate
hṛdaye jāyamāne tu mūrcchāntandrirarocakaḥ striyāḥ dhardiḥ praśekaś ca daurbalyaṃ copajāyate
tasyā hi hṛdayaṃ nārī yadi bhakṣyati kiṃcana bhakṣyaṃ lohyaṃ tathā peyam upabhogās tathāyayat
śayanāsanayānāni vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca yad yad ākāṃkṣate kiṃcit tat tad āsyai pradāpayet
nāyā saṃkārayec cāsyā na caivam avamānayet mukham āpāṇḍuraṃ snigdhaṃ kapolastanakeśayoḥ
śarīraś ca śriyā jaṣṭuṃ pīnoruśroṇi vakṣasam liṅgerebhir vijānīyāṃ garbhe jīvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
caturthe saptarātreṇa śiraś caivopajāyate pañcamasaptarātreṇa grīvā tatropajāyate
ṣaṣṭhamasaptarātreṇa skandhagātraṃ prajāyate saptamasaptarātreṇa pṛṣṭhavaṃśa prajāyate
aṣṭamasaptarātreṇa pāṇī jāyate cobhayau saptarātraṃ nava prāpya jāyate hṛdi pañjaram
daśame saptarātre ca pādau jāyate cobhau udaraś copajāyeta saptaikādaśarātrike
dvādaśasaptarātreṇa kukṣipārśveḥ prajāyate saptatraidaśarātreṇa kuṭisutropajāyate
navaty aṣṭamarāteṇa jāyate sūtraviṃśati saptapañcadaśāhena sarvamedaḥ prajāyate
ṣoḍaśasaptarātreṇa athisarvāṇi jāyate saptasaptadaśāhena jāyate snāyubandhanam
saptamāṣṭādaśāhena jāyate mukhamaṇḍalam saptonaviṃśarātreṇa ghrāṇavaṃśaḥ prajāyate
saptaviṃśatirātreṇa naitranāliṃ prajāyate saptaikaviṃśarātreṇa karṇayugmaṃ prajāyate
dvāviṃśasaptarātreṇa jāyate dvau bhruvau tataḥ saptatriviṃśarātreṇa gaṇḍayugmaṃ prajāyate
caturviṃśatisaptāhe oṣṭhayugmaṃ prajāyate pañcaviṃśatisaptāhe jihvā jāyate sundari
ṣaḍviṃśasaptarātreṇa dantapaṅkti prajāyate unaviṃśatisaptāhe jāyate ca tvag eva ca
triṃśatasaptarātreṇa jāyate nābhimaṇḍalam saptaikatriṃśarātreṇa sarvarandhraṃ prajāyate
dvātriṃśasaptarātreṇa nakhaviṃśati jāyate tritriṃśasaptarātreṇa sarve sandhiḥ prajāyate
pañcatriṃśati saptāhe sarvamarma prajāyate ṣaḍtriṃśasaptarātreṇa vedanā copajāyate
saptatriṃśatisaptāhe īrṣyādveṣaḥ prajāyate aṣṭatriṃśatisaptāhe pañcātmakasamanvitam
sarvāṅgam aṅgasampūrṇaḥ paripakva(ḥ) sa tiṣṭhati mātusvāśitapītaś ca nābhisūtrāganena tu
ajātasyopadhāryante garbhasthasyaiva jantavaḥ tataḥ praviśate dehe nidrāsvapna yathā tathā
nopalabhyati sūkṣmatvād araṇy agnir yathā tathā garbhodakena siktāṅgajarāyā pariveṣṭitaḥ
jāti smarati tatrastho jantuś cetaḥsamanvitaḥ mṛtaś cāhaṃ punarjāto bhūyaś caiva punarmṛtaḥ
sthāvarāṇāṃ sahasreṣu jāto 'smi vividheṣu ca caturvarṇavivarṇeṣu mānuṣeṣu sahasraśaḥ
sāmprataṃ ca punar garbhaḥ kleśaḥ prāptaḥ suduḥsahaḥ idānīṃ jātamātro 'haṃ saṃskāraiś cāpi saṃskṛtaḥ
yogam evābhisevāmi sā[ṃ]khyaṃ vā pañcaviṃśakam yatra janmajarā nāsti yatra mṛtyuś ca nāsti vai
yatra brahma paraṃ vedyaṃ cariṣyāmi yatavrataḥ evam ādīny anekāni cintayitvā punaḥ punaḥ
yāvat tiṣṭhati garbhastho jāti smarati pūrvikām tato jāyati kaṣṭena mahākleśena mānavaḥ
yoniyantrasutīvreṇa pīḍyamānasuduḥkhitaḥ jātamātrosmṛtibhraṃśo bhavatīha acetaneḥ
māyāmudgaratīvreṇa hataḥ kiṃ śubham ācaret eṣa garbhasamutpattiḥ kathito 'smi varānane duḥkhasaṃsārapraśamaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe garbhotpattir nāma trayadaśo ! 'dhyāyaḥ devy uvāca
atidīrghātihrasvaś ca pumān kenopajāyate atigauro 'tikṛṣṇaś ca naro bhavati kiṃ prabho
bhagavān uvāca
gṛhītagarbhā yā nārī nityam uttānaśālinī prasāritavimuktātmā so 'tidīrghaḥ prajāyate
gṛhītagarbhā yā nārī śete saṃkucitā sadā raso 'nnādīni kaṭukaṃ sevanāḥ hrasva jāyate
gṛhītagarbhā yā nārī nityaṃ kṣīropasevitā varakodravaśālī ca bhuktā cāpi yavodanam
śuklavastrasrajā yuktā sātigauraṃ prajāyate gṛhītagarbhā yā nārī bāladhānyāni sevate
kṛṣṇakodravatailādi māṣakṛṣṇayavodanam kṛṣṇavastrasrajādīni tasyāḥ kṛṣṇaḥ prajāyate
devy uvāca
jātyandho jāyate kasmānṣaṇḍhobhīrur hatendriyaḥ kujo vā vāmano vāpi paṅgavaḥ sthūlaśiraḥ katham
bhagavān uvāca
gṛhītagarbhā yā nārī tīkṣṇoṣṇāny upasevate laśunānipalāṇḍūni karañjamūlakāni ca
pippalīśṛṅgaveraṃ ca sarṣapānmaricāni ca āsavaś ca parikliṣṭā ye cānye kaṭutiktakāḥ
tīkṣṇaṃ tu sevamānā yā jātyandho jāyate sutaḥ mithyāpacārāḥ strīpuṃso vyāpanne śukraśoṇite yadā garbhāśaye raktaṃ striyāḥ pūrvaṃ niṣicyate
paścāc chukraṃ raktakāle tadāṣaṇḍaḥ prajāyate trastodvigno yadā bhītastrīpuṃsāṃsūpajāyate
tatra yo jāyate garbhabhiruḥ krandanako bhavet nisargakāle śukrasya vighna utpadyate yadā
indriyāvartavighne tu tadā jāyed atindriyaḥ gṛhītagarbhā yā nārī vātalāny upasevate
kaṭukāni kaṣāyāni tiktāni ca viśeṣataḥ vātaḥ prakupitas tasyā garbham ātuhya tiṣṭhati
kubjas tu jāyate tasmād garbhād vātanipīḍanāt nityasāsavaśīlāyā tathā cotkaṭukāśanā
tasyā saṃhanyate garbho vāmanas tena jāyate ativyāyāmaśīlā tu ya nārī viṣamāsanī
garbhaḥ saṃkṣubhyate tasyāḥ paṣaṇḍas tenopajāyate gṛhītagarbhā yā nārī rūkṣadhānyāni sevate
vātaśleṣmaśirastho vai tasyā garbhasya kupyate tataḥ sthūlaśirās tena pumān jāyaty asaṃśayaḥ
devy uvāca
karālāṅgā hanuḥ paṅgūr mūko gadgadabhāṣakaḥ vikṛtākṣas tv anakṣo vā bhavadrasvagudaḥ katham
bhagavān uvāca
karālas tena doṣeṇa jāyate mānavas tathā atha karālaṃ kurute nārī lamboticūcukā tasmād anena doṣeṇa karālo jāyate pumān
gṛhītagarbhā yā nārī raktapittāmayārditā gohanuṃ janayet yeṣā raktapittaprakopitaḥ
gṛhītagarbhā yā nārī vātaśūlair upadrutā śukro dāvartanī cāpi paṅgū janayate sutam
kṣudhārtā vedanārtā ca satataś copavāsinī mūkaṃ janayate bālaṃ dauhṛdaś ca vimānitā
gṛhītagarbhā yā nārī visṛjet - māsa māsikam anakṣo jāyate tasyā garbhaśoṇitasaṃkṣayāt
atha grastā yadā nārī vāto dāvartapīḍitā gṛhītagarbhā rukṣāṇi vātalāny upasevate
vātasthānantatas tasyā garbhasyāpīḍitaṃ bhavet agudo jāyate tasmāj jātaś cāpi na jīvati
devy uvāca
hīnāṅgo jāyate kasmād adhikāṅgo 'pi vā katham śvetapiṅgekṣaṇaḥ kasmāt kathaṃ lohitalocanaḥ
bhagavān uvāca
garbhasya jāyamānasya - - - jāyate nilaḥ vātābhyāṃ śleṣmaṇāt - - - tadaṅgaṃ parihīyate
hīnāṅgo jāyate tasmāt pumān vātaprakopataḥ gṛhītagarbhā yā nārī madhurāṇy upasevate
śṛṅgāṭakakalotyāni śālūkāni viśāni ca mocaṃ tālaphalaṃ caiva nārikelaphalaṃ tathā
atikṣṇaṃ sevamānā tu adhikāṅgaṃprasūyate piṅgākṣaḥ śleṣmapittābhyāṃ śvetākṣaḥ śleṣmaṇā bhavet
devy uvāca
kathaṃ vā jāyate putraḥ kanyakā kena jāyate apumān kena jāyeta dviyamā triyamā tathā
bhagavān uvāca
śukrādhikaḥ pumān jñeyaḥ kanyā raktādhikā bhavet raktaśukrasamatvena jāyate sa napuṃsakaḥ
piṇdībhūto yadā garbha mārutau vibhaved dvidhā evaṃ te dviyamā jñeyās triyamā ca tridhā kṛte
devy uvāca
śoṇitaṃ māṃsa medaś ca asthi majjā ca pañcamī śarīrasthāni dṛśyante śukrasthānaṃ na dṛśyate
tasyotpattiś ca sthānaṃ ca jñātum icchāmi tattvataḥ kathayasva trilokeśa cchettum arhasi saṃśayaḥ
bhagavān uvāca
manaḥ śukrasya prabhavaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śrotraṃ tathākṣiṇī sthānaṃ tu sarvāṅgasamasparśāt sparśaḥ pravartate
yathā niṣiktaṃ kṣīraṃ tu payasād dadhi jāyate pramathyamānadadhnas tu sarpiso 'pi tathāgamaḥ
evaṃ śarīra nirgaccet - śukraṃ śukravahā śirāḥ pūrayitvānupūrveṇa asthayo pratipadyate
tatas tu tāḥ śukravahā meḍhranābhīm anusṛtāḥ nāśukraṃ tat tu siñcanti tasmād garbhasya sambhavaḥ
devy uvāca
kathaṃ vedayate jāti kathaṃ jātismaro bhavet etasmin saṃśayaṃ me 'dya chettum arhasi śaṅkara
bhagavān uvāca
bhāvitātmāṃ ca yo jantur devi bhogādhikaṃ ca yat brahmavid jñānasaṃyuktaḥ sa jātiṃ smarate pumān
devy uvāca
kathaṃ sadyo gṛhītasya liṅgagarbhasya dṛśyate etat kathaya deveśa rahaḥ kāle maheśvara
bhagavān uvāca
pipāśāromaharṣaṃ ca vepanaṃ gātrasīdanam nidrāsvedaṃ ca tandrā ca muhūrtam upajāyate
nikledatvaṃ kharatvaṃ ca yonyāt samupajāyate na cārdravaṃvai dṛśyeta śukrasya rajaso 'pi vā sadyogṛhītagarbhāyā liṅgāny etāni tattvataḥ
devy uvāca
kena liṅgena vijñeyaṃ putrajanma maheśvara kanyakā kena liṅgena jñāyate kathayasva me
bhagavān uvāca
pādorujaṅghapārśvaś ca dakṣiṇaṃ yadi hy unnataḥ dakṣiṇaṃ vipulaṃ tatra tadā putraḥ prajāyate
vāmaś caiva yadā paśyet tadā jāyeta kanyakā unnataṃ madhyamasthāś ca tadā jāyet - napuṃsakam
devy uvāca
puṃsā kapolaromāni khalitaṃ kena jāyate kathaṃ strīṇāṃ na jāyeta romāṇi khalitaṃ tathā
bhagavān uvāca
tathā vṛṣaṇagā jantor yasya retovahā śiraḥ nibaddhā mastake tālu kapolās tu samāśritāḥ
taiḥ kapoleṣu romāṇi jāyante antaretasaḥ khalitaṃ śukradoṣeṇa narāṇām upajāyate
śirā śukravahā strīṇāṃ na śūnyasyānna jāyate yātmāpālo ca kās tv agni dṛṣṭimaṇḍalasaṃśritaḥ ?
śoṇitai soktikoṣṭasthanniśoṣayati tattvataḥ nibaddhanty akṣipakṣmāṇi tena romāṇi ca bhruvoḥ
aśukratvāc ca nārīṇāṃ khalitaṃ nopajāyate chāyāvyapagatasnehā rukṣāgātraśiroruhā grasatosmābhajaṭharā mṛtagarbhaḥ prajāyate
devy uvāca
somadhātu kathaṃ jñeyā agnidhātus tatheśvara pṛthagbhāgaviśeṣeṇa kathayasva maheśvara
bhagavān uvāca
śleṣmamedas tathā snāyuḥ asthidantanakhāni ca striyās tanyaś ca śukraś ca yac ca śvetaṃ tathākṣiṣu
eteṣāṃ saumyabhāgatvāc chvetatvam upajāyate āgneyabhāvād raktatvaṃ kṛṣṇatvaṃ cāpi gacchati
tvagmāṃsarudhiraṃ majjādṛṣṭiroma tathaiva ca āgneyadhātusomaś ca kathito 'smi varānane brūhi brūhi viśālākṣi yady asti tava saṃśayaḥ
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe praśnavyākaraṇo nāmaś caturdaśo 'dhyāyaḥ devy uvāca
jīvabhūteti yat proktaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kīdṛśaṃ bhavet
lakṣaṇaṃ ] lakṣaṇāṅ
sthānam asya na jānāmi rūpaṃ varṇaṃ ca īśvara
etat kautūhalaṃ chindhi saṃśayaṃ parameśvara na cānyad eva paśyāmi jīvanirṇaya kīrtaya
īśvara uvāca
īśvara ] bhagavān
jīvasya lakṣaṇaṃ devi kathituṃ kena śakyate
lakṣaṇaṃ ] kathitaṃ
na rūpavarṇa jīvasya vidyate sthānam eva ca
vyāpī sarvagataṃ sūkṣmaṃ sarvam āśritya tiṣṭhati
vyāpī ]
āśritya ] āśṛtya āvṛtya
nirālambam anādhāram anaupamyaṃ nirañjanam
araṇistho yathā vahniḥ kāṣṭheṣu nopalabhyate tadvaj jīvaṃ na paśyeta śarīrastho 'pi sundari
jīvaṃ ] jīvon
dadhivac ca yathā sarpir dṛśyate na ca dṛśyate tadvaj jīvaḥ śarīrastho dṛśyate na ca dṛśyate
jīvaḥ ] jīvaś jīva
devy uvāca
adṛṣṭapratyayo hy asti nāsti pratyayadarśanam vyāpī kathaṃ mahādeva sarvatrāvasthitaḥ katham
maheśvara uvāca
maheśvara ] bhagavān
asaṃśayo mahādevi vyāpī sarvagataḥ śivaḥ dṛśyetendriyasaṃyogāj jīvapratyayadarśanam
dṛśyete° ] dṛśyante
yathākāśasthito vāyuḥ śabdasparśaguṇānvitaḥ
vāyuḥ śabda° ] vāyu
tadvad dehī vijānīyād guṇaveṣṭena nānyathā
devy uvāca
vyāpīti kathitaḥ pūrvaṃ jīvaḥ sarvagato 'pi ca taṃ vṛthā kathito 'smy adya mriyate kena hetunā
īśvara uvāca
īśvara ] bhagavān
na jīvo mriyate devi sarveṣāṃ surasundari ghaṭāntastho yathākāśo bahirākāśavad yathā
ghaṭabhinne viśālākṣi viśeṣo nopalakṣyate dehabhinne tathā devi vināśo nopalabhyate
devi ] dehī
susūkṣmaḥ sarvago vyāpī paramātmānam avyayaḥ
susūkṣmaḥ ] sa sūkṣmaḥ
bahir antaś ca bhūtānām acaraś cara eva sa
acaraś ] acaran
aprameyo 'vināśī ca aprapañcaḥ prapañcakaḥ sarvendriyaguṇābhāsaḥ sarvendriyavivarjitaḥ
evam eṣa mahādevi jīvasya varavarṇini kathito 'smi samāsena kim anyac chrotum icchasi
icchasi ] icchati
devy uvāca
sāraśreṣṭhaṃ mahādeva kathayeśāna īśvara
sāraśreṣṭhaṃ ] sāraśreṣṭha
śrotum icchāmi deveśa mānuṣāṇāṃ hitaṃ vada
vada ] vadaḥ
īśvara uvāca
īśvara ] bhagavān
āśramāṇāṃ gṛhī śreṣṭho varṇaśreṣṭho dvijātayaḥ
gṛhī ]
°śreṣṭhā ] °śreṣṭo
aśvamedhaḥ kratuśreṣṭho japaśreṣṭho 'ghamarṣaṇaḥ
'ghamarṣaṇaḥ ] rghamarṣaṇaḥ
devatānāṃ hariḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhā gaṅgā nadīṣu ca anāśanas tapaḥśreṣṭhas tīrthaśreṣṭhaḥ surahradaḥ
kṣaumaṃ vastreṣu ca śreṣṭhaṃ yaśaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ vibhūṣaṇam bhārataṃ śrutiṣu śreṣṭhaṃ vrataśreṣṭho dayāparaḥ
dayāparaḥ ]
dāneṣu cābhayaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ manaḥ śreṣṭhendriyeṣu ca vidyā saṃgrahaṣu ! śreṣṭhā satyaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vacassu (ḥsu) ca
śreṣṭā ] śreṣṭho
āyudhānāṃ dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ bāndhaveṣu ca mātaraḥ jñānam auṣadhiṣu śreṣṭhaṃ vaidyaśreṣṭhaḥ śivākṣaraḥ
°śreṣṭhaḥ ] °śreṣṭha
akāraś cākṣaraḥ śreṣṭho dharmaśreṣṭho hy ahiṃsakaḥ paśuṣu saurabhī śreṣṭhā nareṣu ca narādhipaḥ
māsi mārgaśiraḥ śreṣṭhaṃ kṛtaḥ śreṣṭhaś caturyuge
māsi ] māsī
vasanta ṛtuṣu śreṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ cāyanam uttaram
amāvāsyā dinaśreṣṭhā vasuśreṣṭho hutāśanaḥ
grahaśreṣṭho divākaraḥ ] vasuśreṣṭho hutāśanaḥ
strīṣu lakṣmīrpṛtiḥ śreṣṭhā vasuśreṣṭho hutāśanaḥ
ṛṣiṣu uṣaṇaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kāntiśreṣṭho niśākaraḥ
kānti° ] kā*
nakṣatreṣv abhijit śreṣṭho kālaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kaleṣu ca
rmapp{abhijit} dnapp{°bhijit śre°} ]
kālaḥ ] kaliḥ
vedeṣu ca varaṃ sāma sthāvareṣu himālayaḥ aśvattho vara vṛkṣeṣu bhūteṣu vara cetanaḥ
vara ] vaṭa
vara cetanaḥ ] varaś{ }cetanaḥ
adhyātma vara vidyāsu vācaḥ satya vara smṛtaḥ
vācaḥ ] ???
prahlādo vara daityeṣu yakṣarakṣo dhaneśvaraḥ
marīci vara vāteṣu hariḥ śreṣṭho mṛgeṣu ca
marīci vara ] ma****
sādhya nārāyaṇaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ pitṝṇāṃ ca pitāmahaḥ
etat samāsato devi kathito 'si varānane
'si ] 'smi
sarvasāraṃ samuddhṛtya kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmy aham
kiṃ ] ki
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe jīvanirṇayo nāmādhyāyaḥ pañcadaśamaḥ devy uvāca
adhunā śrotum icchāmi yogasadbhāvanirṇayam
°nirṇayam ] °nirṇayaḥ
karaṇaṃ ca yathānyāyaṃ kathayasva sureśvara
karaṇaṃ ] karaṇaś
sureśvara ] sureśvaraḥ
īśvara uvāca
īśvara ] sureśa bhagavān
śṛṇu devi pravakṣyāmi yogasadbhāvam uttamam yaṃ viditvā na paśyanti janāḥ saṃsārabandhanam
brahmahā gurutalpī vā surāpasteya eva vā
vā ] ca
athavā saṃkare jātas tat sarvam apanodati
saṃkare ] śṛṅkare śaṅkare
tat{ }sarvam ] tasarvam
muhūrtārdhe muhūrte vā prāṇāyāmaparāyaṇaḥ
muhūrtārdhe muhūrte vā ] muhūrtārdhe vā muhūrttārddha muhūrte vā muhūrtārdhamuhūrtaṃ ca
dhyeyaṃ cintayamānasya tatpāpaṃ kṣīyate narāt
dhyeyaṃ ] dheyañ dhyeya
narāt ] narān
na yamo nāntakaḥ kruddho na mṛtyur bhīmavigrahaḥ
bhīmavigrahaḥ ] nāpavigrahaḥ
nāviśanti mahātmāno yogino balavattarāḥ
nāviśanti ] viśanti sma
balavattarāḥ ] varavattarā
yathā vai sarvadhātūnāṃ doṣān dahyanti dhamyatām
dhamyatām ] dhāmyatām
tathā pāpāḥ pradahyante dhruvaṃ prāṇasya nigrahāt
pāpāḥ ] pāpaḥ
aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca rājasūyaśataṃ tathā prāṇāyāmaśataṃ caiva na tattulyaṃ kadācana
yajñena devān āpnoti rājyaṃ vai tapasaḥ phalam saṃnyāsād brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ vairāgyāt prakṛtau layam
prakṛtau layam ] prakṛtālayam
jñānāt prāpnoti kaivalyaṃ paraṃ brahma sanātanam ity etā gatayaḥ pañca vidhivat parikīrtitāḥ
muhūrtārdhaṃ muhūrtaṃ vā yogaṃ yuñjīta yogavit
muhūrtārdhaṃ muhūrtaṃ ] muhūrtārddha muhū muhūrtārdha muhūrtaṃ
nistaret sarvapāpāni amṛtatvaṃ ca gacchati
nistaret ] vistaret
yuñjāno 'pi prayatnena yāvat tattvaṃ na vindati
yāvat{ }tattvaṃ na vindati ] yāvantanna vindati yāva tatvaṃ na vindati
brahmaloke dhruvaṃ vāso viṣṇuloke ca sundari
vāso ] vāsvā
bhuktvā karmasahasrāṇi sarvakāmasamanvitaḥ kṣīṇapuṇye tato martye jāyate vipule kule
martye ] martyāṃ
yogam evābhiseveta pūrvajātismaro naraḥ saṃsārārṇavam uttīrya sa śivatvam avāpnuyāt
devy uvāca
yogasya vidhim icchāmi śrotuṃ me puruṣottama
puruṣottama ] puruṣottamaḥ
dhyānadhāraṇasiddhīnāṃ kathayasva sureśvara
°siddhīnāṃ ] °siddhānāṃ
sureśvara ] sureśvaraḥ
maheśvara uvāca
maheśvara ] bhagavān
śṛṇu yogavidhiṃ vakṣye bhavapāśanikṛntanam śucir ekāgracittas tu janaśabdavivarjite
°vivarjite ] °vivarjitaḥ °vivarjitam
tatrāsīnāsane yogī paramātmāna cintayet
°tmāna ] °tmānaṃ
padmakaṃ svastikaṃ caiva niṣkalam añjalis tathā
niṣkalam{ }añjalis{ }tathā ] niṣkalaṃ mañjalis{ }tathā niṣkalamakañjalintathā
ardhacandraṃ ca daṇḍaṃ ca paryaṅkaṃ bhadram eva ca
paryaṅkaṃ ] pa*ṅkaṃ
etadāsanabandhena baddhvā yogaṃ samabhyaset
baddhvā yogaṃ ] baddhā yoga
samaṃ kāyaśirogrīvaṃ dhārayann acalasthitaḥ
pratyāhāras tathā dhyānaṃ prāṇāyāmaś ca dhāraṇā
prāṇāyāmaś ] prāṇāyāmañ
tarkaś caiva samādhiś ca ṣaḍaṅgo yoga ucyate
viṣayāsaktacittānām indriyāṇāṃ prati prati
prati prati ] pratisrati pratiṣṭhati
manasākarṣayed yas tu pratyāhāraḥ sa ucyate
manasā ] manamā
pratyāhāraḥ sa ] pratyahāras{ }tad
śabdādiviṣayān devi vartulīkṛtya dhārayet
°viṣayān ] viṣayā
vītarāgaḥ samādhistho dhyeye vastuni yojayet
dhyeye vastu ] dhyeyastu dhyeyavastu
ātmā dhyātā mano dhyānaṃ dhyeyaḥ śuddhaḥ paraḥ śivaḥ
ātmā ] ātma
paraḥ śivaḥ ] paraśivaḥ
yat paraṃ paramaiśvaryam ekaṃ tatra prayojanam
pūrakaḥ kumbhakaś caiva recakas tadanantaram praśāntaś ceti vikhyātaḥ prāṇāyāmaś caturvidhaḥ
vikhyātaḥ ] vikhyātaḥ
caturvidhaḥ ] caturvidhāḥ
pūrake sthāpayed vahniṃ pādāṅguṣṭhena buddhimān
vahniṃ ] vahni
°ṣṭhena ] °ṣṭheṣu
kumbhakena virudhyeta dahyamānaṃ vicintayet
virudhyeta dahyamānaṃ ] nirudhyeta daihyamāna
bhasmībhūtaṃ tathātmānaṃ recakena vicintayet śuddhadehas tataś cātmā śuddhasphaṭikanirmalaḥ
tālaśabdās tu nirvāṇaṃ daśa dve ca prakīrtitaḥ
nirvāṇaṃ ] nirvāṇa
prāṇāyāmān na saṃdeho dviguṇā dhāraṇā smṛtā
smṛtā ] smṛtāḥ
yoge tu triguṇā proktā saṃkrame ca caturguṇā
proktā saṃkrame ca caturguṇā ] proktāḥ saṃkrame ca caturguṇā proktāḥ saṃkrameṇa caturguṇāḥ
! tathotkrāntau pañcaguṇā yogasiddhis tu ṣaḍguṇā
tathotkrāntau ] tathākratau
ṣaḍguṇā ] ṣaḍguṇāḥ
ṣaḍaṅgena samāyukto yogayuktas tu nityaśaḥ
yogayuktas ] yogamuktas
mānaso yaugapadyaś ca dvirūpo yoga ucyate
yaugapadyaś{ }ca dvirūpo ] yaugapadyaś{ } yogapadyaś{ }ca dvirūpo yogapadyañ{ }ca dvirūpo
akṛtvā prāṇasaṃrodhaṃ manasaikena kevalam
°saṃrodhaṃ ] °saṃrodha
manasaikena ] manasekena
dhyāyeta paramaṃ sūkṣmaṃ sa yogo mānasaḥ smṛtaḥ
smṛtaḥ ] smṛtam
saṃyamya manasā prāṇaṃ prāṇāyāmān manas tathā
prāṇaṃ ] omitted
prāṇāyāmān ] prāṇāyāmām prāṇāyāmā prāṇāyāmaṃ prāṇāyāmāt
evaṃ dhyāyet paraṃ sūkṣmaṃ yaugapadyaḥ sa ucyate
yauga° ] yoga°
siddhilakṣaṇa yogasya śṛṇu vakṣyāmi sundari
siddhi° ] siddhir
śaṅkhabherīmṛdaṅgaś ca veṇudundubhir eva ca
śaṅkhabherīmṛdaṅgaś{ }ca ] śaṅkha*****ś{ }ca
dundubhir{ }eva ] dundubhim{ }eva
tāḍitaṃ na ca vindeta yadā tanmayatāṃ gataḥ
śītoṣṇaṃ sukhaduḥkhaṃ ca tṛṣṇābhukṣaṃ tathaiva ca
tṛṣṇābhukṣaṃ ] tṛḍbubhukṣāṃ
vedanāṃ naiva jānāti yogasiddhas tu sundari
vedanāṃ ] vedanān vedanā
°siddhas ] °siddhis °yuktas
eṣa yogavidhir devi tava pṛṣṭena sundari kathito 'smi samāsena kim anyat kathayāmy aham
devy uvāca
! vinā yogena deveśa saṃsāratāraṇaṃ mama
saṃsāra° ] saṃsārāt
deveśa ] veśa
kathayasva mahādeva nirvikalpakaraṃ manaḥ
maheśvara uvāca
maheśvara ] bhagavān
sadāśivas tu niśvāsa ūrdhvaśvāsaḥ paraḥ śivaḥ
ūrdhva° ] arddha°
tayor madhye tu vijñeyaḥ paramātmā śivo 'vyayaḥ
dhyānayogaṃ na tasyāsti karaṇaṃ ca na vidyate jñātamātreṇa mucyante kim anyat paripṛcchasi
jñāta° ] jñāna°
mucyante kim ] mucya
jñānam anyat pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi nibodha me śāstrapañcasu yat proktaṃ śṛṇu saṃkṣepa nirṇayam
saṃkṣepa ] saṃkṣepe
sāṃkhye yoge pañcarātre śaive vede ca nirmitam
pañca° ] paca°
śaive ] śaiva°
yat sāṃkhyasiddhaṃ kathayāmy ahaṃ te
te ] omitted
saṃsāraghorārṇavayogasāram
°sāram ] sāgaram
yogeṣu sāreṣv atha pañcarātre
pañcarātre ] pañca
vedeṣu śaiveṣu ca niścayas te
niścayas{ }te ] niścayan{ }te niścayās{ }te
ghrāṇendriyādyeṣu ca yat samastam manaś ca līnaṃ bhavatīva yasya
manaś{ }ca ] nabhaś{ }ca
! buddhyā niyamya sakalān hi bhāvān
sakalān{ }hi ] sakalāṃ sakalā hi śakalāṃ
sa labdhalakṣyaḥ śivam abhyupaiti
°paiti ] °peti
śrotrādisarvendriyaniścalatvam ekāgracittaṃ manasā niyamya svadehaśūnyaḥ sa bhavec cireṇa
°śūnyaḥ ] °śūnyaṃ
saṃyogasiddhiṃ pravadanti tajjñāḥ
saṃyogasiddhiṃ ] saṃyogasi* saṃgasiddhiṃ sa yogasiddhiṃ
ādāv eva manaḥ śanair uparamet kṛtvā ca vaśyendriyaṃ
°ndriyam ] °ndriyaḥ
yāvat tal layatāṃ vrajeta manasā niḥsaṃjñadehas tathā
manasā niḥ° ] manasān nis° manasāṃ niḥ° manasāgni°
etad dhyānasamādhiyogasakalaṃ prāpnoti niḥsaṃśayaṃ
°saṃśayam ] °saṃśayaḥ
kiṃ tac chāstrasahasrakoṭipaṭhitaṃ sāraṃ na yo 'nviṣyati
na yo 'nviṣyati ] na yo 'nviṣyate tayer{ }iṣyati
ātmārāmajitaḥ samādhinirato vairāgyam apy āśritaḥ
vairāgyam{ }apy{ }āśritaḥ ] vairāgaśayyāśritaḥ
cittaṃ yasya parikṣayo yadi bhavet tiṣṭhet tanutvaṃ yathā
pari° ] parī°
taj jñeyaṃ gatim uttamāṃ śivapadaṃ saṃsāraduḥkhacchidaṃ
°ttamāṃ ] °ttamaṃ
vedānteṣu ca niṣṭha eṣa kathitaḥ kiṃ śāstram anyad viśet
anyad ] anyaṃ
hṛtpadme karṇikāyām upari ravir avadyotayanto 'ntarālam
ravir{ }ava° ] raviravaṃ° ravirata°
yattejastejamārgair bahalatamaghanair dyotanād dīpta dīpam
dyotanād{ }dīptadīpam ] ghātanād{ }dīptadīpam ghāṭanādīptadīpam dyotanād{ }dīptadīpaḥ
bhittvā yat tāludeśe mukham uparigataṃ tāludeśena mūrdhni
°gataṃ ] °gata° °gatas°
! mūrdhni dvārāntareṇa śivaparamapadaṃ yānti yogena yuktāḥ
mūrdhni ] mūrdhna mūrdhnyā
kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇatamottamo 'timahato yas tejatejātmakaḥ
yas{ }teja° ] yas{ }tejas
lokālokadharādharaḥ śriyapatiḥ prāṇapraviṣṭālayaḥ
praviṣṭālayaḥ ] pratiṣṭhālayaḥ
kartā kāraṇam avyayo 'vyayam asau vyāpī vibhaktāvidam viṣṇur bhāvamayo vibhaktaviṣayair viśveśvaro viśvavit
bhāvamayo ] bhāvamayair
! eṣa tattvavaraḥ parāparamayas tejaḥ parasthānadaḥ
°parasthā° ] °paraḥ sthā°
buddhyā bhāvanabhāvayendriyamano dehāntar ālokayan
dehāntar{ }ālokayan ] dehāntarālokayat dehāntarostokayan
hṛtpadmāyatanasthitaḥ sa puruṣo niśvāsam ucchvāsadaḥ
°cchvāsadaḥ ] °cchvāsadām
nādas tasya sadā sadā nadati taṃ nādopariṣṭhā haraḥ
°pariṣṭhā haraḥ ] °pariṣṭadvaraḥ
yas tejas tejate 'jo bahuniviḍaghano granthimālopagūḍhaḥ
granthimālo° ] gratthimāno°
mūrtir mūrtānusārī bahukaraṇabhṛtaṃ kāraṇād dehabandhaḥ
kāraṇād ] kāraṇaṃ
bhittvā granthiṃ sapāśaṃ viṣam iva viṣayaṃ tyaktasaṅgaikabhāvāḥ
°saṅgaika° ] °saṅsaika°
paśyanty ete tam īśaṃ guṇakalarahitaṃ nirvikāraṃ prakāśam
paśyanty{ }ete tam ] paśyanty{ }etenam paśyanty{ }e**m
yo 'sau tejāntarātmā kamalapuṭakuṭīsaṃkaṭasthānalīnaḥ
°kuṭī° ] omitted °kuṭi°
indor bhāsānurūpī vimaladalasadācchāditaḥ karṇikāyām
°rūpī ] °rūpi
tatra sthāne sthito 'sau tribhuvananilayaḥ sarvabhūtādhivāsaḥ ākāśād ūrdhvatattvasthitavikasakalāsaṃhato muktabandhaḥ
mukta° ] mukta°
etāni tattvāny akhilāni devi
devi ]
! saṃkṣepataḥ kīrtitaḥ pañcabhedaḥ śrotuṃ kim anyad vijigīṣitārtham
vijigīṣitā° ] vijigīṣatā°
saṃsāramokṣeṇa ca tatparo 'sti
devy uvāca
tuṣṭāsmi deva mama saṃśayam adya naṣṭam
tuṣṭā° ] tu tuṣṭo
adya prasannaparameśvara īśvara tvam
īśvara ] īśvarama
adya śrutaṃ tvayi ca puṇyaphalaprabhāvam
pūrṇāni cādya mama iṣṭamanorathāni
iṣṭamanorathāni ]
ajñānapaṅkaghanamadhyanilīyamānām
°nilīyamānām ] °nilīyamānam
uttārayeśa sakalārtivināśanāya
uttārayeśa ] uttarāyeśa uttarayeśa
sarveśa tattvaparamārtha namo namas te adyāpi tṛptir iha nāsti mamāpi śambho
nāsti mamāpi ] nā pi
pītvāmṛtaṃ cottamavaktrajātam
°vaktra° ] °vacaktra° °caktra°
ākhyāhi dānaṃ phaladharmasāram kṛpāṃ mayīśāna kuru prasīda
saṃsārapāraṃ paramaṃ nayasva
nayasva ] naya*
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe 'dhyātmanirṇayo nāmādhyāyaḥ ṣoḍaśamaḥ
nāmādhyāyaḥ ṣoḍaśamaḥ ] nāma ṣoḍaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
devy uvāca
pṛthagdānasya icchāmi śrotuṃ māṃ dātum arhasi
śrotuṃ māṃ dātum{ }arhasi ] māhātmyaṃ vaktum{ }arhasi
annavastrahiraṇyānāṃ gobhūmikanakasya ca
bhagavān uvāca
! susaṃskṛtam annam atipradadyāt ! ghṛtaprabhūtam avadaṃśayuktam ghṛtaprapakvaṃ sukṛtaṃ ca pūpaṃ
sukṛtaṃ ca pūpaṃ ] sukṛtammapūpaṃ
sitena khaṇḍena guḍena yuktam
mārgaṃ khagaś codakajaṅgamaś ca
°jaṅgalaṃ ca ] °jaṅgamaś{ }ca
dadyād vaṭaṃ nāgaravaṃśamūlam
vaṭaṃ ] vaṭa
śākaṃ phalaṃ cāmlamadhūratiktam pānaṃ payaḥ śītasugandhatoyam
dadhi pradadyād guḍamiśritaṃ ca mṛṇālaśālūkavanālakā ca sadakṣiṇālepapavitrapuṣpam śraddhānvitaḥ satkṛtayā praṇamya
satkṛtayā ] saktatayā
prayāti lokaṃ jagadīśvarasya vimānayānaiḥ sahito 'psarobhiḥ ekaikasiṣṭasya sahasravarṣam annaprado modati devaloke
cyutaś ca martye sa bhaved dhanāḍhyaḥ kulodgataḥ sarvaguṇopapannaḥ yaśaḥ śriyaṃ sarvakalajñatā ca bhavet sa bhogī sakalatraputraḥ
dadyād daridraḥ kṛpaṇārtadīno bālāgadatvāturamāgatānām tṛṣṇābubhukṣāgatikāgatānām dattvā sadharmasya phalaṃ kaniṣṭa
vāṇijyadharmādiphalāśritānām dharmo hi tasya na ca nirmalo 'sti toyaṃ ca dadyāl laghupūrṇakambham śītaṃ sugandhaṃ parivāritaṃ ca
sa yāti lokaṃ salileśvarasya na tasya janmānitṛṣābhibhūtaḥ upānahaṃ yo dadati dvijāya suśobhanaṃ tailasudī surapitaṃ ca
te yānti lokam amarādhipasya yamālayaṃ kaṣṭapathāna yānti prakṣīṇapuṇyā punar atra loke jāto bhaved divyakulopapannaḥ
dhanaiḥ samṛddhodhopatitvatāś ca rathāś ca nāgā prabhavanti tasya vastrapradānena bhavanti devi rūpottamasarvakalajñatāṃ ca
samṛddhisaubhāgyaguṇānvitāś ca svargacyutās te puruṣā bhavanti vastrapradānābhiratasya puṃsaḥ anyat pravakṣyāmi tataḥ praśastām
vastraṃ tu lokeṣv atipūjanīyam vastraṃ narāṇāṃ tv atimānanīyam vastraṃ tu bhūyo na ca mānalābhaḥ parābhavaś cāti jugupsanaś ca
tasmād dhi vastraṃ satataṃ pradeyam yaśaḥ śriyaḥ svargasamāntalābham yāvanti sūtrāṇi bhavanti vastre tāvad yugaṃ gacchanti somalokam
puṇyakṣayāj jāyati mṛtyuloke vastraprabhūte dhanadhānyakīrṇo ? surūpasaubhāgyayaśaśivanaś ca vidyādharo lokaprabhutvatāś ca
dvijebhyac chatraṃ sukṛtaṃ pradadyāt varṣātapatraṃ dṛḍhaśobhanaṃ ca aṅgāravarṣatraṣu khaḍgamādyam asaṃśayaṃ trāyati yāmyamārge
svargaṃ ca yānti grahanāyakaś ca sa varṣakoṭyāyutam antakāle jāyanti te mānuṣamartyaloke gṛhottame bhogapatir bhavanti
kṛtvā maṭhaṃ śobhanavipradātā dravyeṇa śuddhena tu pūjayitvā sa yāti devendrasadaṃ yatheṣṭam savarṣakoṭiśatadivyasaṃkhyaiḥ
tadantakāle yadi mānuṣatvam jāyanti te saptamahīprabhoktā sa saptarathyatrayasamprayuktā balādhiko yajñasahasrakartā
bhūmipradātā dvijahīnadīnam saṃmṛddhasasyo jalasaṃnikṛṣta sa yāti lokam amarādhipasya ! vimānayānena manohareṇa
manvantaraṃ yāvad abhuktabhogān tadantakāle cyutamartyaloke sa javamukhaṇḍādhipatir bhavet vīryānvito rājasahasranāthaḥ
sa cailaghaṇṭāṃ kanakāgraśṛṅgām dogdhīṃ savatsāṃ payasāṃ dvijānām dattvā dvijebhyaḥ samalaṅkṛtānām prayānti lokaṃ surabhīsutānām
yāvanti romāṇi bhavanti gāvaḥ
yāvanti ] prayānti
tāvad yugānām anubhūyabhogān tasmāc cyutā martyamahībhujās te sahasrarājānugato mahātmā
suvarṇakāṃsyāyasaraupyadātā tāmrapravālāmaṇimauktikādyān dattvā dvijebhyo vasusādhyaloke prāpnoti varṣaṃ daśapañcakoṭyo !
bhuktvā yatheṣṭaṃ kramadevalokān cyutaṃ ca martye sa bhaven narendraḥ sudurjayaḥ śakrasahasrajetā sudīrgham āyuś ca parākramaś ca
yat prekṣaṇaṃ darśayituṃ pradātā surūpasaubhāgya phalaṃ labheta tṛṇāśanāmūlaphalāśanena labheta rājyāni kaṇṭakāni
labhetaparṇāśanasvargavāsam payaḥ prayogena ca devaloke śuśrūṣaṇo yo gurave ca nityam vidyādharo jāyati martyaloke
dadyād gavāṃ dhāsatṛṇasya muṣṭiḥ gavāḍhyatāṃ jāyati martyaloke śrāddhaṃ ca dattvā prayato dvijāya samṛddhasantāna bhaved yugānte
ahiṃsako jāyati dīrgham āyuḥ kulottamaṃ jāyati dīkṣitena kālatrayaṃ snānakṛtena rājyaṃ pītvā ca vāyus tridaśādhipatvam
anaśnatāyāḥ phalam īśaloke tṛptir bhavet toyapradānaśīlaḥ annapradātā puruṣaḥ samṛddhaḥ sa sarvakāmā labhatīha loke
śraddhāmatir yaḥ praviśed dhutāsanaṃ ! sa yāti lokaṃ prapitāmahasya satyaṃ vaded yo 'pi ca dharmaśīlo modaty asau devi sahāpsarobhiḥ
rasās tu ṣaḍyo parivarjayanti atīva saubhāgya labheta sādhvī dānena bhogān atulyaṃ labheta cirāyutāṃ yāti hi brahmacaryāt
dhanāḍhyatāṃ yānti hi puṇyakarmān maunena - ājñā labhate alaṅghyām prāpnoti kāmaṃ tapasaḥ sutaptaṃ kīrtir yaśaḥ svargam anantabhogam
āyuḥ śriyārogyadhanaprabhutvaṃ jñānādilābhaṃ tapasā labheta
trailokyādhipatitvaśakram agamat kṛtvā tapo duṣkaram yakṣeśo 'pi tapaḥ prabhāvaguruṇā guhyādhipatvaṃ mahat rakṣeśo 'pi bibhīṣaṇas tv amaratāṃ prāptas tapasyaiva tu rudrārādhanatatparās tapaphalāt nandīgaṇatvaṃ gataḥ
jñānaṃ dvijān tapaso āha viṣṇuḥ kṣatraṃ taporakṣaṇam āha sūrya vaiśyaṃ tapaś cāñjanam āha vāyuḥ śūdraṃ hi śilpaṃ tapa āha indraḥ
raṇotsahaṃ kṣatriyayajñam iṣṭaṃ vaiśyaṃ havir yajñam udāharanti śūdrasya yajñaḥ paricaryam iṣṭaṃ yajñaṃ dvijānāṃ japamuktamokṣam
devy uvāca
svamāṃsarudhiraṃ dānaṃ dānaṃ putrakalatrayoḥ kiṃ praśasyaṃ mahādeva tattvaṃ vaktum ihārhasi
maheśvara uvāca
svamāṃsarudhiraṃ dānaṃ praśaṃsanti manīṣiṇaḥ śrūyatāṃ pūrvavṛttāni saṃkṣipya kathayāmy aham
uśīnaras tu rājarṣiḥ kayo *?tārthe svakāntantu * tyaktvā svargam anuprāptaḥ parārthe paratatparaḥ
putramāṃsaṃ svayaṃ chitvā agnidattaṃ purānaghe tena dānaprabhāvena alarkas tridivaṃ gataḥ
svadānadānena mudā sa putra aputrabhūtasya ca putra jātaḥ svarge svayaṃ cokvaya bhogalābhaṃ prāpto mahaddānay*la prabhāvāt
yādavaś cārjano devi dattvā khaṇḍavabhājanam tapanasya prasādena saptadvīpeśvaro bhavet hariṇā ca śiro bhitvā dattaṃ me rudhiraṃ purā
pratīcchitaṃ kapālena brahmasambhavajena me divyavarṣasahasrāṇi dhārā tasya na chidyate
parituṣṭo 'smi tenāhaṃ karmaṇānena sundari varaṃ dattaṃ mayā devi purāṇapuruṣo 'vyayaḥ
akṣayaṃ valamūrjaṃ ca ajarāmaram eva ca mamādhikaṃ bhaved viṣṇur māma yitvam vijeṣyasi
evamādīny anekāni mayoktāni janārdane niṣkampa niścalamanaḥ sthāṇubhūta iva sthitaḥ
da*ciḥ svatanuṃ dattvā vibudhānāṃ varānane bhuktvā lokān kramāt sarvān śivaloke pratiṣṭhitaḥ
jāmadagnir mahīṃ dattvā kāśyapāya mahātmane ihaiva sa yālaṃ bhoktā devarājyam avāpsyati
dattvā go sakalaṃ devi vyāsasyāmitatejasaḥ yudhiṣṭhira mahīyāsa dehas tridivadbhataḥ ?
satyanāmaḥ ? (bhīmaḥ?) svakaṃ bhartā dattvā nārādasatkṛtam dānasyāsya prabhāvena akṣayaṃ tridivadbhataḥ ?
catuḥṣaṣṭhisahastāṇi gavāṃ dattvā dvijanmane duryodhanamahīyā*o gataḥ svargam anantakam
vāsukis sarparājendro dattvā viprasusaṃskṛtam ratkāruś ca ? sābhānyā sarve nāgavimokṣitāḥ
gobhūmikanakādīnāṃ dānaṃ kanyasam ucyate bhṛtyaputrakalatrāṇāṃ dānaṃ madhyamam ucyate
svadehaṃ pisitādīnāṃ dānam uttamam ucyate etat sarvaṃ yadā dānaṃ tad dānam uttamottamam
°ottamam ] °otta
jāvaj janmasahasrāṇi bhoktā bhavati kanyasaḥ śatajanmasahasrāṇi bhoktā bhavati madhyamaḥ
uttamaḥ palabhoktā (phala?) vi ? janmakoṭiśatatrayam parārdhadvayajanmānāṃ bhoktā vai cottamottamaḥ
bhūtānām anukampayā yadi dhanaṃ dātā sadānvarṣine dīnānvakṛyaṇeṣv anāthamalineśvānādini** ca
yady eva kurute sadārtiharaṇaṃ śraddhānvitau bhaktimān tasyānantayālaṃ vadanti vibudhāṃs sa yasya sandarśanāt
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe dānadharmaviśeṣaṃ nāma saptādaśamo 'dhyāyaḥ devy uvāca
bhuktvā tu bhogān suciraṃ yatheṣṭaṃ puṇyakṣayān martyam upāgatānām cihnāni teṣāṃ kathayasva me 'dya yathākramaṃ karmaphalaṃ viśeṣāt
maheśvara uvāca
sadānnadātā kṛpaṇārtidīnāṃ sa varṣakoṭyāyutam īśaloke
°yutam{ }īśaloke ] °yutam{ }īnaśaloke
bhuktvā ca bhogān samam apsarobhiḥ prakṣīṇapuṇyaḥ punar eti martyam
jāyanti divyeṣu kuleṣu puṃsaḥ sastrīsamṛddhe bahubhṛtya pūrṇe gaurava? śvarannādi dhanā kuleṣu ṛṣo ?jjvalakāntisamāyutaṃ ca
vastraṃ susatkṛtya dvijasya dānāt svargeṣu modanti sa varṣakoṭyaḥ punaś ca te martyam upāgatāś ca cihna*āha*krīyavam āpnuvanti
kūpaprayāpuṣkaraṇī pradātā sa lokam āpnoti jaleśvarasya tatas sa tasmāc cyutim āpya lokā akhīsutṛpteṣu kuleṣu jāyet
rannipramāṇād api hemadānāt surendralokaṃ samavāpnuvanti tasmāc cyuto martyam upāgatānaṃ cihn** (saja?) dvi* nadhānyalakṣyāḥ
adūṣya bhūmīvaravipradānāt sa lokam āpnoti sureśvarasya bhuktvā tu bhogān cyuta martyaloke cihnaṃ labhed vai viṣayādhipatvam
dvijasya satkṛtya tilapradātā sa lokam āpnoti ca keśavasya bhraṣṭas tato martyam upāgatas tu cihnaṃ labhed akṣayam arthalābham
gadā ? sva*ayāṃ vidhivad dvijānām dattvā ca gokolam avāpnuvanti kaplāvasāne samupetya martye cihnaṅsavāḍhyaṃ śatagoyutaṃ ca
svargaṃ satānāṃ puruṣasya cihnaṃ vanāḍhyatā śrī mukhabhogalābham āyuryaśorūpakalatraputram samyaṅ vibhūti kulakīrtim artham
dānā*(ṣṭa?)bhūñco?ttamakīrtanante cihnaṃ ca lokaṃ ca samāsato me śṛṇotu devī nirayāgatānāṃ cihnaṃ ca karmaṃ ca vipākatāṃ ca
hatvā ca vipraṃ manasā ca vācā sa yāti pāraṃ nirayasya ghoram aśītikalpaṃ niraye krameṇa bhuktvā punas tirya śatāyutānām
jayanti te mānuṣahīnavidyā pratyantavāmāḥ kulavittahīnāḥ nityaṃ ca tasyākṣayarogapīḍā idan tu cihnaṃ dvijajīvahartuḥ
pītvā ca madyaṃ dvijaḥ ? kāmato vā āghrāti gadhvaṃ svamanīṣikeṇa sa yāti ghoraṃ narakam asahyaṃ yāvac ca kalpaṃ daśa atra bhuktvā
tīryaṃ ca sarvam anubhūya** svaṃ sa kaṣṭakaṣṭena manuṣyajanvā caṇḍālaśaunaśvayacanvam eti śyāmaṃ ca tāla bhavatīha cihnam
nindanti ye vedasasnūya jihvā yaḥ kūṭasākṣī sa ca khalv alā*au suhṛdvadhāmṛtyuśataṃ hi garbhe garhāśanocchiṣṭabhujo bhavanti
stainyas tu yaiḥ kurvati pāpasattvam te pāpadoṣān narakaṃ vrajanti manvantarādīny anubhūyaduḥkham punaś ca tiryak śataśo 'nubhūyāt
mānuṣyajanmeṣu ca duḥkhabhāgī steneyamāyāti punaś ca mūḍhaḥ suvarṇacaurakunakhatvacihnam viśīrṇagātro rajatāpahārī
tāmrāpahāri sphaṭitāgrapāṇīr lohāpahārī bhujacchedacihnaṃ kāṃsāpahārī karabhagnacihnam hṛtvā carīti trapusīsakānām
nāsauṣṭhakarṇaśravaṇasya chedaḥ cihnaṃ nṛṇāṃ vastraharaṃ kucelaḥ dhānyāpahārī bhavaty eṅgahīnaḥ dīpopahārī bhavaty andhacihnam
nirvāpahā kāṇa bhaveta cihnam yaḥ strī haret so 'pi jitaḥ striyā syāt sasyāpahārī bhavatennahīnaḥ hṛtvāyudhayantrahatatvacihnaṃ
annāpahārī paradattabhoktā hṛtvā tu gāvaḥ sa bhavet daridraḥ hariharettaddhariṇā dahanti hṛtvā tu meṣān ajagardabhaś ca
sa bhārabhṛjjīvam udāharanti ratnāpahārī anapatyatā ca chatrāpahārī apavitratā ca hṛtvā ca bījaṃ sa bhaved abījaḥ
godhūmaśāliyavamudgamāṣān hṛtvā masūraṃ vilayaṃ vrajanti kāmāturo mātaramātṛputrī mātṛśvasāṅ gacchati mātulānīm
rājāṅganāṃ putrasutāṃ snuṣāṃ ca pravrājinīṃ brāhmaṇīmantyajāṃ ca ajāśvameṣasurabhīsutāś ca yat kāmayet teṣu vimūḍhacetaḥ
sa yāti kṛcchraṃ narakaṃ sughoraṃ sa varṣakoṭīśataśo bhramitvā tīryañ ca bhūyaḥ śataśovyatītya kaṣṭena vai jāyati mānuṣatvam
hīnāṅgatādīnaśarīratāś ca yo mātṛgāmī sa bhaved aliṅgaḥ mātṛsvasātalpagavānaliṅgā liṅge 'parodhaḥ sutaputrikāmaḥ
snuṣāṃ ca yaḥ sevati raktamehī dauḥ carmatāś ca dvijasundarīṣu rājāṅganāyāsu ca liṅgacchedaḥ pravrājinī kāmukamūtrakṛcchram
savyādhiliṅga labhatentyajāsu vilīnaliṅgaḥ paśuyonigāmī jāyanti te mūṣikadhānyacaurī kṣīraṃ hared vāyasatāṃ prayāti
haṃsāpahārī sa bhaven nihaṃsaḥ śvānatvam āyāti rasāpahārī hṛtvā ca sūcīn tu bhavet sa daṃśaḥ hṛtvā tu sarpir vṛṣatāṃ prayāti
māṃsaṃ tu hṛtvā sa bhaveta gṛdhraḥ tailāpahārī khagatāṃ prayāti guḍaṃ ca hṛtvā guḍikā bhavanti śākāpahārī sa bhaven mayūram
hṛtvā paśuṃ paṅgurajāyatehaḥ citratvam āyāti suvastrahārī hṛtvā dukūlaṃ sa ca sārasattvaṃ kṣaumaṃ ca hṛtvā sa ca durbalatvam
ūrnāni vastrāṇy apahṛtya meṣaḥ chuchundarī jāyati gandhahārī brahmasvam alpam apahṛtya bhoktā sa gṛdhra ucchiṣṭabhujo bhavanti
pādena yaḥ sparśayate dvijāṅghriṃ tacchītaraktaṃ caraṇau bhaveta pādena yaḥ sparśayate ca gāvaḥ sa pādarogān vividhāṃl labheta
yo mātaraḥ tāḍayate pādena pāde tadīye kṛmayaḥ patanti pādāt pṛśed yaḥ pitaraṃ durātmā sūnonnapādaḥ sa bhavet paratra
padāt pṛśet toyam anādareṇa saślīpadīpādayuge bhaveta pādena ya sparśayate hutāśaṃ sa cāgnipādaḥ satataṃ bhaveta
pādena yaś cāryam upaspṛśeta sa pādacchedaṃ bahuśo labheta granthāpahārī sa bhaveta mūkaḥ durgandhavaktraḥ parichidravādī
paiśunyavādī sa ca pūtināsām anamravaktras tv anṛtāpavādī pāruṣyavaktā mukhapākarāgī asat pralāpī sa ca dantarogaḥ
stīkṣṇapradāyī sa ca vakranāsa sambhinnavaktā sa ca kaṇṭharogī kruddhekṣaṇaḥ paśyati yas tu vipraṃ tīvrākṣirogī sa tu jāyate hi
pradveṣayālokayate 'tithīn ya utpāditākṣis sa bhavet paratra vairūpya cakṣus tv atisūkṣmacakṣuḥ sa jāyate kekarapiṅgayakṣuḥ
gartākṣikādīni vipāṇḍurāṇi netrāmayāny eva ca pāpadoṣāt śṛṇvanti ye pāpakathāṃ praśastāṃ tāṃ karṇasarpiḥ paripīḍiyeta
śṛṇvanti nindāṃ hariśarvayor yaḥ sa karṇaśūlena tu jīvatī vā mātāpitṝṇāṃ śṛṇute 'pavādaḥ sa karṇasāphena vināśam eti
śṛṇoti nindāṃ guruviprajā yaḥ sa karṇapūyaṃ sravate saraktam virūpyadāridhrakulādhameṣu aniṣṭakarmabhṛtijīvanāś ca
akīrtanaṃ darśanavarjanaṃ ca śvāpākato śvādiṣu jāyate saḥ etāni cihnaṃ nirayāgatānāṃ mānuṣyaloke kukṛtasya dṛṣṭam
samāsataḥ kīrtita eva devi yathaiva muktis tv iha karmabhaṅgaḥ
mātāpitroghato yāsutaduhitṛvahā bhrātṛgambhīravegā bhāryāvartā vivartā kuṭilagativadhur bāndhavormītaraṅgā kāmakrodhobhakūlā karimakarajhaṣā grāhakāmā bhayante mṛtyor ākhyārṇave 'smin na śaraṇavivaśākāladṛṣṭo prayāti
nityaṃ yena vinā na yāti divasaṃ pañcatvam āpadyate tyaktvā deha vanāntareṣu viṣame śvānaśrigālākule bandhuḥ sarvanivartate gatadayā dharmaika tatra sthitaḥ tasmād dharmaparo na cānyaḥ suhṛdaḥ sevet paratrārthinaḥ
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe pūrvakarmavipākacihnāṣṭādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ vigatarāga uvāca
kriyāsūkṣmo mahādharmaḥ karmaṇā kena prāpyate alpopāyaṃ narārthāya pṛcchāmi kathayasva me
anarthayajña uvāca
alpopāyaṃ mahādharmaṃ kathayāmi dvijottama sukhena labhate svargaṃ karmaṇā yena tac chṛṇu
lokānaṃ mātaro gāvo gobhiḥ sarvaṃ jagad dhṛtam gomayam amṛtaṃ sarvaṃ jātaṃ sarvaśivecchayā
sarvadevamayī gāvaḥ sarvadevamayo dvijaḥ sarvadevamayo bhūmiḥ sarvadevamayaḥ śivaḥ
tasmād gāvaḥ sadā sevyā dharmamokṣārthasiddhidā paricaryā yathāśaktyā grāsavāsajalādibhiḥ
tāḍayen nātivegena vācayen mṛdunācaret pālayan tarpanād yeṣu bhagnodvigneṣu yatnataḥ
vyādhivanaparikleśa oṣadhopakramaś caret kaṇḍūyanaṃ ca kartavyaṃ yathāsaukhyaṃ bhaved gavām
gavāṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā śraddhābhaktisamanvitaḥ sāgarāntā mahī sarvā n pradakṣiṇīkṛtā bhavet
pṛṣṭasaṃsparśanād yañ ca śraddhayā yadi mānavaḥ ahorātrakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ naśyate nātrasaṃśayaḥ
lāṅgūlenoddhṛtaṃ toyaṃ mūrddhnā gṛhṇāti yo naraḥ yāvaj jīva kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ naśyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
vidhivat snāpayed gāṃś ca mantrayuktena vāriṇā tenāmbhasā svayaṃ snātvā sarvapāpakṣayo bhavet
vyādhivighnam alakṣmītvaṃ naśyate sadya eva ca mṛtāpatyāś ca gāvāś ca snānam eva praśasyate
gavāṃ śṛṅgodakaṃ gṛhya mūrdhni yo dhārayen naraḥ sa sarvatīrthasnānasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ
grāsamuṣṭipradānena goṣu bhaktisamanvitaḥ agnihotraṃ hutaṃ tena sarvadevāḥ sutarpitāḥ
catvāraḥ stanadhārās tu yas tu mūrdhnā pratīcchati sa catuḥsāgaraṃ gatvā snānapuṇyaphalaṃ labhet
gavārthaṃ yas tyajet prāṇān gograheṣu dvijottama kalpakoṭiśataṃ divyaṃ śivaloke mahīyate
cyutabhagnādisaṃskāraṃ sarvaṃ yaḥ kurute naraḥ bhāryākoṭiśataṃ dānaṃ yat phalaṃ parikīrtitam
tatphalaṃ labhate martyaḥ śivalokaṃ ca gacchati śivalokaparibhraṣṭaḥ pṛthivyām ekarāḍ bhavet
samāsataḥ samākhyātaṃ yathātattvaṃ dvijottama na śakyaṃ vistarād vaktiuṃ gomahātmyasamuttamam
vigatarāga uvāca
devāḥ r aṣṭavidhāḥ proktāḥ tiryak pañcavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ mānuṣyam ekam evāhuś cāturvarṇyaḥ kathaṃ bhavet
anarthayajña uvāca
pūrvakalpasṛjaty eṣa viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā evaṃ varṇā dvijaś cāsīt sarvakalpāgram agrataḥ
sarvavedavido viprāḥ sarvavedavidas tathā tathā viprasahasrāṇāṃ yajñotsāhamano bhavet
vṛddhaviprasahasrāṇāṃ matam āśritya brāhmaṇaiḥ kartuṃ karma samārabdhakarmaś cāpi vibhajyate
ṛtvajatve sthitāḥ kecit kecit saṃrakṣaṇe sthitāḥ arthopārjanayuktān ye anye śilpe niyojitāḥ
evaṃ yajñavidhānena kartum arebhire purā yathoddiṣṭena karmeṇa yajñotsāham avartata
āgatā ṛṣayaḥ sarve devatāḥ pitaras tathā anyonyam abruvan tatra devarṣipitṛdevatāḥ
yajñārtam asṛjad varṇaṃ vidhinā pātuhetavaḥ evam eva pravartantu bhavatir dvijasattamāḥ
ijyādhyādhyayanasampannā brahmaṇā yatra kalpitāḥ suviprā vipratāṃ yāntu ṣaḍkarmāniratāḥ sadā
rakṣaṇārtaṃ tu ye viprāḥ kalpitāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ kṛtatrāṇāya viprāṇāṃ nityaṃ kṣātravratodbhavāḥ
arthopārjanam uddiśya kalpitā ye dvijātayaḥ te tu vaiśyatvam āyāntu vārto āpaṇatodbhavāḥ vadhabandhanakarmeṣu śilpasthānavadheṣu ca
kalpitā ye dvijātīnāṃ sarve śūdrā bhavantu te prājāpatyaṃ brāhmaṇānām ījyādhyayanatatparām
sthānam aindraṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ prajāpālanatatparam vaiśyānāṃ vāsavasthānaṃ vāṇijyaṃ kṛṣijīvinām
śūdrāṇāṃ marutaḥ sthānaṃ śuśrūṣāniratātmanām maharṣipitṛdevānāṃ matam ājñāya niścitaḥ eṣa saṃkalpito brahmā padmayoniḥ pitāmahaḥ
saṃkalpaprabhavāḥ sarve devadānavamānavāḥ paśupakṣimṛgāmukhyā yāvanti jagasambhavāḥ
bhūtasaṃkalpakartā ya kalpam āsīd dvijottama kīrtitāni samāsena kim anyac chrotum icchasi
vigatarāga uvāca
kiṃ tapaḥ sarvavarṇānāṃ vṛttir vāpi tapodhana yajñāś caiva pṛthaktvena śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
anarthayajña uvāca
brāhmaṇasya tapo yajñāḥ - tapaḥ kṣātrasya rakṣaṇam vaiśyaś ca tapa vāṇijya tapaḥ śūdrasya sevanam
pratigraha dhano vipraḥ kṣatriyasya dhanur dhanam kṛṣir dhanaṃ tathā vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ śuśrūṣaṇaṃ dhanam
ārambhayajñaḥ kṣatrasya havir yajño viśas tathā śūdraḥ paricaro yajño japayajño dvijātayaḥ
satya tīrtha dvijātīnāṃ raṇa tīrthaṃ tu kṣatriyāḥ āryā tīrthaṃ tu vaiśānāṃ ! śūdratīrthaṃ tu vai dvijāḥ
nāsti vidyāsamo mitro nāsti dānasamaḥ sakhā nāsti jñānasamo bandur nāsti yajño japaḥ samaḥ
dharmahīno mṛtas tulyo devatulyo jitendriyaḥ yajñatulyo 'bhayaṃ dātā śivatulyao manonmanaḥ
vigatarāga uvāca
dāna yajñas tapas tīrthaṃ saṃnyāsaṃ yoga eva ca eteṣu katamaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śrotum icchāmi kīrtaya
anarthayajña uvāca
dānadharmasahasrebhyaḥ yajñayājī viśiṣyate yajñayājīsahasrebhyas tīrthayātrī viśiṣyate
tīrthayātrisahasrebhyas tapaniṣṭo viśiṣyate tapaniṣṭhasahasrebhyaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ saṃnyāsikaḥ smṛtaḥ
saṃnyāsīnāṃ sahasrebhyaḥ śreṣṭho yac ya jitendriyaḥ jitendriyasahasrebhyaḥ yogayukto viśiṣyate
yogayuktasahasrebhyaḥ śreṣṭho līnamanaḥ smṛtaḥ tasmāt sarvaprayatnena ādau mana viśodhayet
nigṛhītendriyagrāmaḥ svargamokṣau tu sādhanam viśiṣṭhe tv indriyagrāme tiryannarakasādhanam
vigatarāga uvāca
carācarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ katamaḥ śreṣṭha ucyate kathayasva mamādya tvaṃ chettum arhasi saṃśayam
anarthayajña uvāca
carācarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ tatra śreṣṭho - carāḥ smṛtāḥ carāṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ buddhimān śreṣṭha ucyate
buddhimānṣu ! ca sarveṣu tataḥ śreṣṭha narāḥ smṛtāḥ narāṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ śreṣṭha ucyate
vidvarsv api ca sarveṣu kṛtabuddhir viśiṣyate kṛtabuddhiṣu sarveṣu śreṣṭhaḥ kartā sa ucyate
kartṛṣv api ca sarveṣu brahmavedī viśiṣyate brahmavedi paraṃ ! vipraḥ nānyaṃ vedmi paraṃtapaḥ sa vipraḥ sa tapasvī ca sa yogī sa śivaḥ smṛtaḥ
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe dānayajñaviśeṣo nāma unaviṃśatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ vigatarāga uvāca
pañcaviṃśati yat tattvaṃ jñātum icchāmi tattvataḥ kathayasva mamādya tvaṃ chidyate yena saṃśayaḥ
anarthayajña uvāca
sarvaṃ pratyakṣadarśitvaṃ kathaṃ māṃ praṣṭum arhasi
sarvaṃ ] sarva°
māṃ ] maṃ
pṛṣṭena kathanīyo 'smi eṣa me kṛtaniścayaḥ
śṛṇu te sampravakṣyāmi tattvasadbhāvam uttamam nādimadhyaṃ na cāntaṃ ca yan na vedyaṃ surair api
cāntaṃ ] cāntaś
atisūkṣmo hy atisthūlo nirālambo nirañjanaḥ acintyaś cāprameyaś ca akṣarākṣaravarjitaḥ
sarvaḥ sarvagato vyāpī sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati sarvendriyaguṇābhāṣaḥ sarvendriyavivarjitaḥ
ajarāmarajaḥ śāntaḥ paramātmā śivo 'vyayaḥ
°jaḥ ] yaḥ
alakṣyalakṣaṇaḥ svastho brahmā puruṣasaṃjñitaḥ
brahmā ] brahma
pañcaviṃśaḥ sa vijñeyo janmamṛtyuharaḥ prabhuḥ
sa vijñeyo ] sarvajñeyo
kalākalaṅkanirmukto vyomapañcāśavarjitaḥ
jalapakṣī yathātoyair na lipyeta jale caran
°toyair ] °toyai
lipyeta ] lipyate
tadvad doṣair na lipyeta pāpakarmaśatair api
caturviṃśati yat tattvaṃ prakṛtir vidhiniścayaḥ
yat ] yan
vikṛtiś ca sa vijñeyas tattvataḥ sa manīṣibhiḥ
prakṛtiprabhavāḥ sarve buddhyahaṃkāra-ādayaḥ
buddhyahaṃkāra-ādayaḥ ] buddhyāhaṃkārakādayaḥ
vikṛtiṃ pratilīyante bhūmyādi kramaśas tu vai
kramaśas ] yaḥ kramas
matitattva trayoviṃśa dharmādiguṇasaṃyutaḥ sattvādhikasamutpannaboddhāta vidhidehinaḥ
°boddhāta ] °boddhātaṃ
dvāviṃśati ahaṃkāras tattvam uktaṃ manīṣibhiḥ
uktaṃ ] ukta
bhūtādi mama pañcāha rajādhikasamudbhavam
bhūtādi mama pañcāha ] bhūtādir{ }nāma pañcāha
rajā° ] rajo°
ekaviṃśati yat tattvaṃ suśiraṃ viddhi bho dvija
suśiraṃ viddhi ] susira vṛddhi
śabdātītaṃ suśiratvaṃ saśabdaguṇalakṣaṇam
°lakṣaṇam ] °
saptasvarās trayo grāmā mūrcchanās tv ekaviṃśatiḥ
grāmā ] grāmāḥ
°viṃśatiḥ ] °viṃśati
tā nāmekonapañcāśac chabdabhedas tadādayaḥ
°kona° ] °kūna°
evam ādīny anekāni svarabhedā dvijottama
°bhedā ] °bhedān
gāndharvasvaratattvajñair munibhiḥ samudāhṛtam
gāndharvasvara° ] gāndharvāsura
veṇumurajatantrīṇāṃ dundubhīnāṃ svanāni ca
svanāni ] stanāni
śaṅkhakāhalakāṃsyānāṃ śabdāni vividhāni ca
kāṃsyānāṃ śabdāni ] kāṃsyā
ākāśadhātuṃ viprendra śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te daśa
°dhātuṃ ] °dhātu
pāyūpasthodaraḥ kaṇṭhaśaṅkhalau mukhanāsikau
°daraḥ ] °dara°
śaṅkhalau ] śrotau ca
hṛdiṃ ca daśamaṃ jñeyaṃ deha ākāśasambhavaḥ
hṛdiṃ ] hṛdiś
punar anyat pravakṣyāmi tac chṛṇuṣva dvijottama
anyat ] anyaṃ
daśa dhātuguṇā jñeyāḥ pañcabhūtaḥ pṛthak pṛthak ākāśasya guṇāḥ śabdo vyāpitvaṃ chidratāpi ca
ākāśasya ] ākāśa×
anāśrayanirālambam avyaktam avikāritā apratīghātitā caiva bhūtatvaṃ prakṛtāni ca
ākāśadhāto[r?] viprendra tato vāyusamudbhavaḥ śabdapūrvaguṇaṃ gṛhya vāyoḥ sparśaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
śabdapūrvaṃ mayākhyātaṃ śṛṇu sparśa dvijottama
dvijottama ] ×jottama
kaṭhinaś cikkaṇaḥ ślakṣo mṛdusnigdhakharadravāḥ
cikkaṇaḥ ] cikkaraḥ
karkaśaḥ paruṣas tīkṣṇaḥ śītoṣṇa daśa ca dvayam
tīkṣṇaḥ ] tīkṣṇa
dvayam ] dvaya
iṣṭāniṣṭadvayasparśa vapuṣā parigṛhyate
prāṇopānaḥ samānaś ca udāno vyāna eva ca nāgakūrmo 'tha kṛkaro devadatto dhanaṃjayaḥ
kṛkaro ] kṛkalo
daśavāyupradhānaite kīrtitā dvijasattama
kīrtitā ] kīrtitāḥ
dhanaṃjayo bhaved ghoṣo devadatto vijṛmbhakaḥ
ghoṣo ] yoṣo
kṛkaraḥ kṣudhakṛn nityaṃ kūrmonmīlitalocanaḥ
kṛkaraḥ ] kṛkara
nāga udghāṭanaṃ puṣyaṃ karoti satataṃ dvija
prāṇaḥ svasati bhūtānāṃ niśvasanti ca nityaśaḥ
prāṇaḥ ] prāṇāḥ
nityaśaḥ ] nitya yaḥ
prayāṇaṃ kurute yasmāt tasmāt prāṇa iti smṛtaḥ
prayāṇaṃ ] prayāṇā
apanayaty apānas tu āhāraṃ manujāmadhaḥ
apanaya° ] a
°madhaḥ ] °dhamaḥ °pavaḥ
śukramūtravaho vāyur apānas tena kīrtitaḥ
pītaṃ bhakṣitam āghrātaṃ raktapittakaphānilam
°ghrātaṃ ] °ghrāti
samaṃ nayati gātreṣu samāno nāma mārutaḥ
spandayaty adharaṃ vaktraṃ netragātraprakopanam
°dharaṃ ] °dhara°
udvejayati marmāṇi udāno nāma mārutaḥ
marmāṇi ] karmāṇi
udāno nāma ]
vyāno vināmayaty aṅgaṃ vyaṅgo vyādhiprakopanaḥ prītivināśakathitaṃ vārdhikyaṃ vyāna ucyate
prīti° ] prītir
daśavāyuvibhāge ca kīrtito me dvijottama
me ] ye
daśavāyuguṇāṃś cānyāṃ chṛnu kīrtayato mama
cānyāṃ ] cānyac
kīrtayato mama ] kīrtaya me dvija
vāyor aniyamasparśo vātasthāne svatantratā
vātasthāne ] vāta×ne
balaṃ śīghraṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca ceṣṭākarmātmanā bhavaḥ
vāyunāpi sṛjas tejas tadrūpaguṇam ucyate śabdasparśasamajyotis triguṇaṃ samudāhṛtam
śabdaḥ sparśaḥ purā proktaḥ śṛṇu rūpaguṇaṃ tataḥ
proktaḥ ] proktāḥ
rūpaguṇaṃ ] rūpaṃ guṇaṃ
hrasvaṃ dīrgham aṇu sthūlaṃ vṛttamaṇḍalam eva ca
dīrgham{ }aṇu ] °dīrghalaghu
caturasraṃ dvirasraṃ ca tryasraṃ caiva ṣaḍasrakam
caturasraṃ dvirasraṃ ] caturaśran{ }dvi×śraṃ caturasradvirasraś
tryasraṃ ] tisraś
śuklaḥ kṛṣṇas tathā rakto nīlaḥ pīto 'ruṇas tathā
śuklaḥ ] śuklaṃ
nīlaḥ ] nīla°
śyāmaḥ piṅgala babhruś ca nava raṅgāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
śyāmaḥ piṅgala babhruś{ }ca ] śyāmaḥ piṅgalo babhruś{ }ca śyāmaś{ }ca piṅgalo babhruś{ }ca śyāma piṅgalo bhruś{ }ca
raṅgāḥ ] raṅgaḥ
navadhā navaraṅgānām ekāśīti guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
smṛtāḥ ] smṛtaṃ
tejodhātu daśa brūmaḥ śṛṇuṣvāvahito bhava
tejodhātu daśa ] tejodhātur{ }daśaṃ
kāmas tejokṣaṇaḥ krodho jaṭharāgniś ca pañcamaḥ
tejokṣaṇaḥ ] tejakṣaṇaḥ tejekṣaṇaḥ
jaṭharāgniś ] jaṭha×gniś
jñānaṃ yogas tapo dhyānaṃ viśvāgnir daśamaḥ smṛtaḥ
viśvāgnir ] viśvāgni
daśa tejoguṇāṃś cānyān pravakṣyāmi dvijottama
daśa tejoguṇāṃś ] daṃśatejoguṇāś
agner durdharṣavāpnoti tāpapākaprakāśanaḥ
agner{ }durdharṣavāpnoti ] agner{ }durddhaṣatāpnoti agne durddhaṣatāpnoti
śaucaṃ rāgo laghus taikṣṇaṃ daśamaś cordhabhāṣitam
rāgo ] gaṅgā
daśapañcorddhabhāṣitam ] daśamaś{ }cordhabhāṣitam
jyotiḥ so 'pi sṛjaś cāpi saraso guṇasaṃyutaḥ caturguṇāḥ smṛtā āpaḥ vijñeyā ca manīṣibhiḥ
śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca rasaś ca sa caturguṇaḥ
rūpaṃ ] rūpaś
rūpādiguṇa pūrvokta adhunātha rasaṃ śṛṇu
pūrvokta ] pūrvoktaṃ
kaṭutiktakaṣāyāś ca lavaṇāmlas tathaiva ca
lavaṇāmlas ] lavaṇāntas
madhuraś ca rasān ṣaḍ vai pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ
rasān ] rasāṃ rasā
ṣaḍrasāḥ ṣaḍvibhedena ṣaḍtriṃśaguṇa ucyate
ṣaḍvi° ] ṣaḍbhir
āpadhātudaśa tv anyān śṛṇu kīrtayato mama
°nyān ] °nyāṃ °nyā
lālā siṅghāṇikā śleṣmā raktaḥ pittaḥ kaphas tathā
śleṣmā ] śoṣmā
raktaḥ ] rakta°
svedam aśru rasaś caiva medaś ca daśamaḥ smṛtaḥ
rasaś ] rasaṃś
medaś ] medaṃ
daśa āpaguṇāś cānyā kīrtayiṣyāmi tān śṛṇu
cānyā ] cānye
tān ] tāṃ
aṅgyaśaityaṃ rasakledo dravatvaṃ snehasaumyatā
aṅgyaśaityaṃ ] agnyaśaitya°
jihvāviṣpandinī caiva bhaumān daśaguṇāñ śṛṇu
°viṣpandinī ] °niṣpandinī
bhaumān{ }daśaguṇāñ{ }śṛṇu ] bhaumānyaśravaṇādhamaḥ
āpaś ca bījyajābhūmis tasyā gandhaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
āpaś{ }ca bījya° ] āpaś{ }cāpījya°
caturāpaguṇān gṛhya bhūmer gandhaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
°guṇān ] °guṇā
śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥ
rūpaṃ ] rūpaś
pañcamaḥ ] pañcama
āpaḥpūrvaguṇāḥ proktā bhūmer gandhaguṇaṃ śṛṇu
proktā ] prokto
śṛṇu ] smṛta
iṣṭāniṣtadvayor gandhaḥ surabhir durabhis tathā
dvayor{ }gandhaḥ ] dvayo××
karpūraḥ kasturīkaṃ ca candanāgarum eva ca
kasturīkaṃ ] kastūrīkaś
°garu° ] °guru°
kuṅkumādisugandhāni ghrāṇam iṣṭaṃ prakīrtitam
°kīrtitam ] °kīrtitaḥ
viṅmūtrasvedagandhāni vaktragandhaṃ ca duḥsaham
°gandhaṃ ] °gandhaś
jīrṇasphoṭitagandhāni aniṣṭānīti kīrtitam
°sphoṭita° ] °sphoṭaka°
bhūmer dhātu daśa tv anyān kathayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
tv{ }anyān ] tv{ }anyā
tac{ }chṛṇu ]
tvacaṃ māṃsaṃ ca medaṃ ca snāyu majjā sirā tathā
tvacaṃ māṃsaṃ ca medaṃ ca ] tvacā māṃsaś{ }ca medaś{ }ca
sirā ] śiras
nakhadantaruhāś caiva keśaś ca daśamas tathā
keśa° ] keśā°
daśa tv anyān pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu bhūmiguṇān dvija
tv{ }anyān ] tv{ }anyām
bhūmeḥ sthairyaṃ rajastvañca kāṭhinyaṃ prasavātmakam
rajastvañca ] rajatvaś ca
kāṭhinyaṃ ] kaṭhinyaṃ
gandho guruś ca śaktiś ca nīhārasthāpanākṛtiḥ
guṇaṃ dhātuviśeṣaś ca utpattiś ca dvijottama
guṇaṃ dhātu° ]
yathā śrutaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ kīrtitaṃ nikhilena tu
vaikārikam ahaṃkāraṃ sattvodriktāt tu sāttvikaḥ
sattvodriktāt{ }tu ] sattvodṛktāt{ }tu sattvonuktānu
śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā caiva pañcamī
buddhīndriyāṇi pañcaiva kīrtitāni dvijottama hastapādas tathā pāyur upastho vāk ca pañcamaḥ
pāyu° ] snāyu°
pañcamaḥ ] pañcamam
śrotreṇa gṛhyate śabdo vividhas tu dvijottama veṇuvīṇāsvanānāṃ ca tantrīśabdam anekadhā
muraja saunda paṇavabherīpaṭahanisvanam
saunda ] maunda
śaṅkhakāhalaśabdaṃ ca śabdaṃ ḍiṇḍimagomukham
kāṃsikāhalamiśraṃ ca gītāni vividhāni ca
°kāhala° ] °kātāla°
tvacayā gṛhyate sparśaḥ sukhaduḥkhasamanvitaḥ
gṛhyate ] gṛhya×
mṛdusūkṣmasukhaṃ sparśaḥ vastraśayyāsanādayaḥ
°sukhaṃ ] °sukha°
tīkṣṇaśastrajalaṃ śaitya uṣṇataptakṣatekṣaraḥ
śaitya ] śaitye
evamādīny anekāni jñeyānīṣṭaṃ dvijottama cakṣuṣā gṛhyate rūpaṃ sahasrāṇi śatāni ca
devarūpavikārāṇi nakṣatragrahatārakāḥ mānuṣānāṃ vikārāṇi grāmaṃ nagarapattanam
vṛkṣagulmalatānāṃ ca paśupakṣiśarīsṛpāṃ kṛmikīṭapataṅgānāṃ jalajānām anekadhā
śailadāravaromāṇi rūpāṇi vividhāni ca
°romāṇi ] °homāni
dhātudravyavikārāṇi rūpāṇi dvijasattama
dvijasattama ] dvija
jihvayā gṛhyate svādo hṛdyāhṛdyo dvijottama
jihvayā ] ××yā
phalamūlāni śākāni kandāni piśitāni ca
pakvāpakva viśeṣāṇi dadhikṣīraghṛtāni ca vrīhyoṣadhirasānāṃ ca miśrāmiśram anekadhā
°ṣadhi° ] °ṣadha°
ṣaṭkarmapratibhedena rasabhedaśata smṛtam
°śataṃ ] °śata
ghrāṇena gṛhyate gandha iṣṭāniṣṭo dvijarṣabhaḥ
gṛhyate gandha iṣṭā° ] gṛ
°niṣṭo ] °niṣṭā
guḍājyaṃ guggulur bhaṣmacandanāgarukaṃ tathā
guḍājyaṃ guggulur ] guḍājyaguggulu
°garukaṃ ] °gurukas
kastūrikuṅkumādīnām iṣṭo gandho manoharaḥ
gandho ] gandha
vraṇamūtrapurīṣāṇāṃ māṃsaparyuṣitāni ca
māṃsa° ] māsa°
vātakarmādidurgandha aniṣṭaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ
hastena kurute karma vividhāni dvijottama
hastena ] hastābhyāṃ
mohendraṃ vāruṇaṃ caiva vāyavyāgneyam eva ca
mohendraṃ vāruṇaṃ ] ××ndram{ }vāruṇañ mohendravāruṇaṃ
āgneyapavanādīni kāṃsyo lohas trapus tathā
°pavanā° ] °pacanā°
agnikarmāṇy anekāni yajñahomakriyās tathā
sūryavyajanavātena mukhavātena vai tathā camaracarmavātena vātayantraṃ ca vāyavam
vāruṇaṃ toyakarmāṇi kurute vividhāni ca
kurute ] kuru×
rasoparasakarmāṇi tasya poṣaṇakarma ca
snānācamanakarmāṇi vastraśaucādayas tathā kāyaśaucaṃ ca kurute tṛṣānāśanam eva ca
tṛṣā° ] tṛṣa°
navamāni hy anekāni vāruṇaṃ karma ucyate māhendraṃ pārthivaṃ karma anekāni dvijottama
kulālakarmabhūkarma karma pāṣāṇam eva ca
kulālakarma° ] ku
karma ] karmaṃ
dārudantimaśṛṅgādi karma pārthivam ucyate
catuṣkarma samāsena hastataḥ parikīrtitam pādābhyāṃ gamanaṃ karma diśaś ca vidiśas tathā
diśaś{ }ca vidiśas ] diśañ{ }ca vidiśan
nimnonnatasame deśe śilāsaṃkaṭakoṭare toyakardamasaṃghāte bahukaṇṭakasaṃkule
°kule ] °yute
pāyukarma visargaṃ tu kaṭhinadravapicchilam
pāyu° ] pāpa°
saraktaphenilādīni pāyuśakti pramuñcate
°muñcati ] °muñcate
upasthakarma ānandaṃ karoti jananaṃ prajā
ānandaṃ ] ānanda
strīpuṃnapuṃsakaṃ caiva upasthaṃ kurute dvija
vācā tu kurute karma navadhā dvijapuṅgava stutinindā praśaṃsā ca ākrośaḥ priya eva saḥ
ākrośaḥ ] ×krośaḥ
praśno 'nujñā tathākhyānam āśīś ca vidhayo nava
cā vidhayo nava ] ca vidhayo naya cāvidhiyo nayaḥ
etā navavidhā vāṇī kīrtito me dvijottama
adhunā kathayiṣyāmi manaso nava vai guṇān calopapattiḥ sthairaṃ ca visargakalpanākṣamā
°kṣamā ] °samā
sad asac cāśutā caiva manaso nava vai guṇāḥ
cāśutā ] cāśutāñ
iṣṭāniṣṭavikalpaś ca vyavasāyaḥ samādhitā
iṣṭā° ] ×ṣṭā°
samādhitā ] samādhinā
manaso dvividhaṃ rūpaṃ manaś conmana eva ca
conmana ] cotmana
manas tv indriyabhāvatve unmanastvam atīndriya
°tīndriye ] °nīndriye °tīndriya
nigṛhītā visṛṣtaṃ ca bandhamokṣau tu sādhanam
nigṛhītendriyagrāmaḥ svargamokṣau tu sādhanam
visṛṣṭe indriyagrāme duḥkhasaṃsārasādhanam
duḥkha° ] ×kha° duḥkhaṃ
sakalaṃ niṣkalaṃ caiva mana eva vidur budhāḥ sakalaṃ mananānātve ekatve mananiṣkalam
vigatarāga uvāca
manaḥ svavedyaṃ lokānām unmanas tu na vidyate unmanaḥ kathayāsmākaṃ kīdṛśaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ bhavet
anarthayajña uvāca
unmanastvaṃ gate vipra nibodha daśalakṣaṇam
nibodha ] ×bodha
na śabdaṃ śṛṇute śrotraṃ śaṅkhabherīsvanād api
śrotraṃ ] śrotre
tvacaḥ sparśaṃ na jānāti śītoṣṇam api duḥsaham rūpaṃ paśyati no cakṣuḥ parvatābhyadhiko 'pi vā
jihvā rasaṃ na vindeta madhurāmlavato 'pi vā
°mlavato ] °mlavano
gandhaṃ jighrati na ghrāṇā tīkṣṇaṃ vāpy aśucīny api
ghrāṇā ] ghrāṇo
unmanas tava me khyātaṃ sarvadvaitavināśanam
unmanas{ }tava me ] ××××××
bhavapāragasuvyaktaṃ niṣkalaṃ śivam avyayam
sa śivaḥ sa paro brahmā sa viṣṇuḥ sa paro 'kṣaraḥ sa sūkṣmaḥ sa paro haṃsaḥ so 'kṣaraḥ kṣaravarjitaḥ
eṣa unmana jānīhi śivaś ca dvijapuṅgava kīrtito 'smi samāsena kim anyat paripṛcchasi
paripṛcchasi ] pa
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe pañcaviṃśatitattvanirṇayo nāma viṃśatimo 'dhyāyaḥ
viṃśatimo ] viṃśatitamo
vigatarāga uvāca
aho matimatāṃ śreṣṭha aho dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
matimatāṃ ] matimanā
vara ] varaḥ
aho dama śamaḥ satya aho yajña aho tapaḥ
dama śamaḥ ] damaḥ śamaḥ
anenāmṛtavākyena vismayo me paro gataḥ prīto 'smi ca tapādhārajñānādbhutarasena ca
prīto 'smi ca ]
°bhuta° ] °bhūta°
kiṃ dadāmi varaṃ brūhi dātāsmi tava cepsitam
cepsitam ] cesmitam
etac chrutvā tatas tena pratyuvāca śubhāṃ giram
śubhāṃ giram ] śubhāṅgirām
[anarthayajña uvāca]
ko bhavān varadaśreṣṭha devadānavarākṣasāḥ
varada śreṣṭha ] varadaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ
°rākṣasāḥ ] °rākṣasaḥ
athavā bhagavān viṣṇur mama jijñāsur āgataḥ
vyaktaṃ tvāṃ puruṣaśreṣṭha jānāmi puruṣottama
°śreṣṭha ] °śreṣṭhaḥ
puruṣottama ] puruṣotta× puruṣottamaḥ
rūpaṃ darśaya govinda yady asti tapasaḥ phalam
rūpaṃ darśaya govinda ] ××××××vinda
tatas tu puṇḍarīkākṣo darśayāmāsa svāṃ tanum śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇiḥ pītāmbaradharo hariḥ
anarthayajñas taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ praharṣam atulaṃ labdhvā aśrupūrṇākulekṣaṇaḥ

°binduṃ ] °bindu

supiṣitvāṅgulau ] su× supithitvāṅgulau suśiṣi cāṅgulau
°karṇaye° ] °karṣaye° °karṣaya°
tat tad akṣaram ākarṇya amṛtatvāya kalpyate
°karṇya ] °kaṇṇya
