°tandritaḥ ] °tendritaḥ
vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyo nirdvandvapadam āpnuyāt
vimuktaḥ ] vimukta
nirdvandva° ] nidvanda° nirdvanda°
vaidyutī tu niśāmadhye lakṣate 'jam anāmayam
vaidyutī tu ] vaidyutīnta
lakṣate 'jam{ }a° ] lakṣye teja{ }a° lakṣyateja{ }a° lakṣateja a°
pañcamāsasadābhyāsād divyacakṣur bhaven naraḥ
pañcamāsasadā° ] pañcamāsassadā° pañcamāsasamā° pañcamāsaṃ sadā°
°sād{ }di ] °sā di°
°kṣur{ }bhaven{ }na° ] °kṣur{ }bhave na° °kṣu bhaven{ }na° °rkṣu bhaven{ }na
bindumālāṃ tataḥ paśyet tarucchāyāsamāśritām
tataḥ paśyet ] tu yaḥ paśyen
°śritām ] °śritāḥ °śritam
jātyasphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ dṛṣṭvā mucyati bandhanaiḥ
°kasaṃkāśaṃ ] °saṃkakāśaṃ
bandhanaiḥ ] bandhavaiḥ bandhanāt vaṃcanaiḥ
dhyāyen mano'nugā nāma pakṣmīr āpīḍya locane
locane ] locanaḥ locanaiḥ locanai
śvetapītāruṇaṃ binduṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūyo na jāyate mano'nugādi ṣaṭ tv ete dhyānam uktaṃ mayā tava
°ṣaṭ{ }tv{ }ete ] °ṣaṭ{ }tv{ }etā °ṣaṭkena
°ktaṃ mayā tava ] °ktaṃ samāsataḥ °kta mayā tava
adhunānyat pravakṣyāmi paramāṇu caturvidham pārthivādicaturbhūtair yair vyāptaṃ nikhilaṃ jagat
lakṣaṇaṃ tasya rājendra śṛṇu vakṣyāmi sāmpratam pārthivordhagatiḥ ! sūkṣmaḥ paramāṇur narādhipa
pratyakṣadarśanaṃ dhyānaṃ lakṣayan niyataḥ śuciḥ mucyate sarvapāpebhyo rāhunā candramā yathā
tena yo 'bhyasate nityaṃ sa yogī bhuvaneśvara adhogati mahārāja paramāṇu jalodbhuvaḥ
abhyased yad idaṃ rājan sarvapātakanāśanam āgneyaparamāṇuś ca tiryagūrdhagatiḥ ! smṛtāḥ
ya idaṃ dhyāyate nityam uttamāṃ gatim āpnuyāt vāyavyaṃ paramāṇuś ca adhordhvatiryag āsmṛtā
na sa muhyati taṃ dṛṣṭvā vāyusambhava bhūpate catvāra ete rājendra paramāṇur nirīkṣate
tena sarvamakhairiṣṭaṃ tena taptaṃ taptaṃ tathā tena dattā mahī kṛtsnā saptasāgarasaṃvṛtā
sarvatīrthābhiṣekaś ca sarvavratakriyā tathā anenaiva vidhānena daśadhyānaṃ narādhipa kurute avyavacchinnaṃ sarvakāmaphalapradam
daśākṣaramahārāja yogīndrasya mahātmanaḥ kathayāmi samāsena śṛṇuṣvāvahito bhava
praṇavādisvarā trīṇi dīrghabindusamāyutam pañca pañca cavarge tu vāyubījam adhasthitam
trayodaśasvarāyuktaṃ pañcama parikīrtitam pañcaviṃśatimaḥ ṣaṣṭha akṣaraḥ parikīrtitaḥ
yādṛśaṃ pañcamaḥ proktaṃ saptame ca prayojayet akārasvarasaṃyuktaṃ sarvapātakanāśanam
prathamaṃ pañcame varge tṛtīyasvarayojitam uktare kārasaṃyuktaṃ navamaṃ parikīrtitam
daśamaḥ punar oṃkāraḥ mantraśreṣṭho daśākṣaraḥ japato dhyāyate vāpi pārthivādi krameṇa tu
mucyate so 'pi saṃsāre saṃśayo nāsti bhūpate ācāramūlo dharmas tu dharmamūlo janārdanaḥ tena sarvajagad vyāptaṃ trailokyaṃ sa carācaraṃ
ācārāl labhatīha āyur atulam aiśvaryavittaṃ tathā ācārāt sutam īpsitaṃ ca labhate śrīkīrtiprajñāyaśaḥ ācārāl labhate ca lakṣmim atulaṃ khyātiṃ tathaivottamam ācārād iha mantradharmaparamaṃ prāpnoti niḥsaṃśayam
janamejaya uvāca
ācārāt prabhavānusaṅgakathitaṃ suśliṣṭadharmākaram ācārāt katidhāṅga kīrtaya punas tṛptir na me jāyate sarvajñaḥ tvam ahaṃ śṛṇomi varadaṃ kiñcin na me śāśvaram tan me kīrtaya dharmasāraśubhadam ācāramūlāśrayam
vaiśampāyana uvāca
nityaṃ namraśirodvijātiguruṣu śuśrūṣaṇaṃ daivatam tiṣṭhenācamanena cāśanakaraṃ vāmāsthimānādaram sūryāgniśaśibandhur āryapurataḥ kuryān na cāvaśyakam śasye bhasmani govrajedvijajalaṃ kuryān na cārkaṃ naraḥ
pādenāgnijalaṃ spṛśen na ca guruṃ pādena pādaṃ tathā śaucaṃ kārya jalādinā ca niyataṃ nādho jalaṃ kārayet kuryān nityabhivādanaṃ dvijaguror mātāpitṛr daivatam etācāravidhiḥ samāsaniyamas tubhyaṃ mayā kīrtitam
janamejaya uvāca
strīṇāṃ kiṃ priyam asti tad vada vibho saṃsārasārastriyām kiṃ sadbhāva na vedmi tasya viṣaye kiṃ dveṣya kiṃ tātpriyam paśyāmi na ca tasya garbhakalayā prāpnoti niḥsaṃśayam māyājālasahasragāpi yuvatī kurvanti bhartā priyam
vaiśampāyana uvāca
rājan kiṃ priyam asti arthaparataḥ paśyāmi nānyan nṛpe putrārthaikaprayojanaṃ yuvatayaḥ svāyambhuvoktāmaraiḥ kāntā nityakalā pravartanakarī dharmasakhāyā satī māyā vāpi karoti sadya manujātyaktānya vā sevate
strīsaṅgaṃ parivarjayen narapate āyāsadaṃ duḥkhadam mṛtyudvārabhayākaraṃ viṣagṛham āpat sughorālayam agnir mārutamattavāraṇasama tasyānugāmī sadā strīhetor hatarāvaṇastridaśapa indro 'pi visthāpitaḥ strīhetor api candramāstribhuvane dhiktāṃ gataś cāmaro daṇḍakṣo hatarāṣṭrapaurasahitaḥ kiṃ bhūya vakṣyāmy aham
janamejaya uvāca
vipro kīdṛśalakṣaṇaṃ bhavati bho kīdṛg muniś cocyate kenārthena bhaveta bhikṣu bhagavan nighnanti ko vā dvija kenārthena bhaved dvijendra bhagavān jñeyaḥ parivrājakaḥ ! jñeyāḥ kim ṛṣayaś ca lakṣaṇamuner icchāmi jñātuṃ punaḥ
vaiśampāyana uvāca
satyaṃ śaucam ahiṃsatā damaśamau bhūtānukampī sadā ātmā rāmajito svadharmanirataḥ sattvastha nityaṃ manaḥ kāmakrodhayamasvadāranirataḥ saṃtyajya lobhaḥ śanaiḥ evaṃ yaḥ kurute dvijātisuvaraḥ śūdro 'pi yaḥ saṃyamī
tasmāc chadmakavarjitaḥ sa bhagavān saṃsārabhībhidyakaḥ yat tat sthānaparaṃ vrajanti puruṣāḥ tasmāt parivrājakaḥ granthi dārasutaṃ dhanaṃś ca virati nirgranthika socyate ramyante ṛṣirāśrame dhṛtimanas tasmād ṛṣiḥ socyate
kāyavāṅmanadaṇḍatatparataras te daṇḍikarūcyate saddharmaśravaṇaṃ vadanti śravaṇaḥ saddharmabrahmākṣaraḥ pāśaprakṣipataṃ paśutvasakalaṃ pāśūpatās te smṛtāḥ vipre pāśupatādibhikṣusakalaṃ pṛṣṭo 'smy ahaṃ lakṣaṇam
sarvaṃ tat kathito 'si lakṣaṇa mayā sandhiśvanirnāśanam prajñāsaṃgrahaśītavardhanaparaṃ saṃsāranirmūlanam etaj jñānaparaṃ prabodham atulaṃ nityaṃ śivaṃ dhāryate
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe dvāviṃśatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ janamejaya uvāca
devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca uttarāraṇim eva ca
dānavānāṃ ca uttarāraṇim{ }eva ] dā×××××××ṇim{ }eva
vidviṣanti ca te 'nyonyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tasya kīrtaya
tasya ] ta
vaiśampāyana uvāca
pāpapuṇyasvabhāvābhyāṃ devadaityasya bhūpate dharmapakṣasmṛto devo dānavo 'dharmapakṣataḥ
devo ] devā
'dharma° ] darppa° darpa°
hetunā tena rājendra anyonyaṃ vidviṣanti te devadveṣṭāsurāḥ sarve vibudhāś cāsuradviṣaḥ
devadveṣṭāsurāḥ sarve ] devadveṣṭāsuraḥ sarve
vibudhāś ] ××dhāś
dharmādharmavipakṣatāṃ śṛṇu parāṃ bhūtānukampodayām
°kampodayām ] °kampādayām
satyaṃ śaucam ahiṃsatā damaśamo nirmānam īrṣyāruṣā
īrṣā° ] īrṣyā°
tṛṣṇālobharatasya kāmaviṣayaḥ sarvendriyāṇāṃ jayaḥ ādhyātmeṣu ratiḥ prasannamanaso nirdvandvasarvālayaḥ
prasannamanaso nirdvandva° ] prasanna×××××
pāpopekṣaṇaśaśvapuṇyamudito dīneṣu kāruṇyatā
°śaśva° ] °śaśca°
dānaṃ śīladhṛtikṣamājapatapaḥ svādhyāyamaune ratiḥ yogābhyāsaratir divaukasagaṇe jñāne ca sāṃkhye tathā
yogābhyāsaratir{ }divaukasa° ] yogābhyāsaratidivaukasa° yogabhyāsaratidivaikasa°
akrodhārjavatejayajñam abhayaṃ saṃtoṣa adrohatā
°bhayaṃ ] °bhayas °bhayaḥ
tyāgo mārdavahrīr acāpalaratir nyāsābhimāno grahāt
°hrīr{ }acāpalaratinyāsā° ]
maitrībhāvasadārapaiśunamatir brāhmaṇyaśraddhānvitaḥ
°nvitaḥ ] °nvitā
etācāra sadā narendra vibudhāḥ saṃkṣepataḥ kīrtitāḥ
kīrtitāḥ ] kīrtitaḥ
daityānāṃ śṛṇu kīrtaye svavahito 'sambhāvya teṣāṃ nijam
nijam ] nijaḥ
daityāḥ pāparatisvabhāvacapalā nirlajjadarpālasāḥ
daityāḥ ] daityā
kāmakrodhavaśāḥ suduṣṭamanasas tṛṣṇādhikā nirdayāḥ
kāmakrodhavaśāḥ ] *××××śās
śaucācāravivarjitā gurugirānnānitya kuryuḥ kriyāḥ jīvākarṣaṇajīvanaḥ pratidinaṃ mohāndharāgānvitāḥ
jīvākarṣaṇa° ] naivākarṣaṇa°
nidrā nitya divā prasaktam aśuciḥ sūryodaye supyate āśāpāśaśatair nibaddhahṛdayo hṛtvā parasvaṃ punaḥ
hṛtvā parasvaṃ punaḥ ]
mātsaryāt parapākabhedanirato mūlasya duṣpūratā
mātsaryā ] māṃsaryā°
! nāstīkatvaparāṅganāsvabhirata utkocakāmaḥ sadā
utkoca° ] uktā ca
devabrāhmaṇa vidviṣanti satataṃ lobhāc ca kāryakriyā dharmaṃ dūṣayate ca mūḍhamanasā āryaṃ ca tīrthaṃ tathā hantavyāny ahatāś ca manyabahavo visphūrjitam adruvan
visphūrjitam{ }adruvan ] visphurjjite nakravat vi××××druvan
daityānāṃ kathitaṃ ca cihna katicit sadbhāvataḥ kīrtitam
kathitaṃ ] kathitaś
martyeṣv eva narendra mānuṣam abhūd devāsurāṇāṃ nṛpaḥ yo yaṃ proktaḥ svabhāvatām ubhayato mānuṣyaloke tathā
°loke ] °lokan
yan me pṛcchitavān narendra kathitaṃ yat tvaṃ purā gopitam
pṛcchitavān ] pṛcchitavā
vidveṣobhayakāraṇaṃ narapate kiṃ bhūya vakṣyāmy aham
vidveṣobhayakāraṇaṃ narapate kiṃ ] vi
janamejaya uvāca
asti kautūhalaṃ cānyaṃ pṛcchāmi tvāṃ dvijottama
kautūhalaṃ ] kautuhalaṃś
kathaṃ nidrā samutpannā sarvabhūtavimohanī
°mohanī ] °mohinī
rātrau prajāyate kasmād divā kasmān na jāyate kasmāc ca kurute jantor nidrā netrapramīlanam
jantor ] janto
etan me saṃśayaṃ chindhi sarvajño 'si dvijottama
sarvajño 'si ] ××××
vaiśampāyana uvāca
devī hy eṣā mahābhāgā nidrā netrāśrayā nṛṇām
°śrayā ] °śrayo
tasyā vaśaṃ gataṃ sarvaṃ jagatsthāvarajaṅgamam
sadevadānavagaṇā gandharvoragarākṣasāḥ
°dānava° ] °dānavā°
yakṣabhūtapiśācāś ca paśupakṣisarīsṛpāḥ
°sarīsṛpāḥ ] °śarīsṛpaḥ
guhyakāś ca mṛgā nāgā kiṃnarā jalajoragāḥ
nāgāḥ ] nāgā
kiṃnarā jalajoragāḥ ] kinna×××××gāḥ
nidrāvaśagatāḥ sarve pāpmanā tv abhilaṅghitāḥ
devadānavakarmānte tasminn amṛtasambhave
°karmānte ] °karmāt{ }te
°mṛta° ] °nṛta°
mandarotthāpane viṣṇur devāsurasamāgame
°tthāpane ] °tpādane
jāyate vigrahe tv eṣā kṛte hy amṛtamanthane rajas tamaś cāsuraṃ vai sattvaṃ devakṛtaiḥ śubhaiḥ
tataḥ sattvamayī devī rajas tamanivāsinī
sattvamayī devī rajas{ }tamasi vāsinī ] sattvamayī sattvamayī devī rajas{ }tamanivāsinī
krodhajā vai sthitā madhye devadānavapakṣayoḥ
tām adbhutamayīṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitā devadānavāḥ
°bhuta° ] °bhūta°
tasyāḥ prabhāvābhihatā dudruvas te diśo daśa
daśa ] daśaḥ
tatra pītāmbaradharo viṣṇur ekas tu tiṣṭhati
pītā° ] pitā°
sābhigatvā viśālākṣī nārāyaṇam athābravīt
sābhi° ]
°bravīt ] °
devadānavanāthas tvaṃ tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
deva° ] ××
sarvaṃ ] sarva°
dehi deva mamāvāsaṃ yatrāhaṃ nivase sukham
tato nārāyaṇas tuṣṭas tāṃ devīṃ pratyabhāṣata śarīre mama vastavyaṃ viṣṇur enām athābravīt
vastavyaṃ ] vāstavyam
tatas tāṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tejaḥ pāpmanā samatiṣṭhata
vaiṣṇavaṃ ] viṣṇuvat
tataḥ śete sa vaikuṇṭhaḥ pāpmanā tv abhilaṅghitaḥ
pāpmanā tv{ }abhilaṅghitaḥ ] pāpmanā tv{ }abhilaṅghitāḥ pāpma××××ghitaḥ
tasmin śayāne vitrastā devāsuragaṇās tathā
tasmin ] tasmi
ūcus te paramodvignāḥ śayānaṃ viṣṇum acyutam
trātāraṃ nābhigacchāma uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha keśava tataḥ śaṅkhagadāpāṇir uttiṣṭhata mahābhujaḥ
utthitaś ca viśālākṣaḥ pāpmanā tasya pṛṣṭhataḥ
viśālākṣaḥ ] viśālākṣiḥ
tataḥ sā vigrahavatī sthitā nārāyaṇālaye
tataḥ sā vigrahavatī ] tata××××
viṣṇur devāsuragaṇān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
°gaṇān ] °gaṇā
asmākaṃ vai śarīreṣu iyaṃ pāpmā viniḥsṛtā
viniḥsṛtā ] vinisṛtā
eṣābhisattvārasatā satyena bhaginī mama
eṣābhisattvārasatā ] eṣātisatvānasatā eṣātisattvāmasatī
viśrutāṃ triṣu lokeṣu tāṃ pūjayatha māṃ yathā
°śrutāṃ ] °śrutā °śruto
tato devāsuragaṇāḥ saptalokāḥ samānuṣāḥ
°lokāḥ samānuṣāḥ ] °
vibhaktā vaiṣṇavī pāpmā teṣu sarveṣu devatā
parvateṣv atha vṛkṣeṣu sāgareṣu saritsu ca tato nidrāvaśagataṃ jagatsthāvarajaṅgamam
eṣotpattiś ca nidrāyā yathā vasati tac chṛṇu trīṇi sthānāni yasyā vai śarīreṣu śarīriṇām
śleṣmapittānilasthāne trīṇi pakṣāṇi vāsinaḥ
°nilasthāne trīṇi ] °nilasthāna trīṇi ni××××ṇi
pakṣāṇi ] pakṣā ni°
tamaḥ śleṣmāśrayā nidrā rajonidrā tu vātikā
tamaḥ ] tama°
nidrā tu ] nidrāti°
pittāśrayāṃ smṛtāṃ nidrāṃ sāttvikāṃ viddhi bhūpate
smṛtāṃ ] smṛtā
ādityaprabhavaṃ tejas tasmin sattvaṃ pratiṣṭhati
sattvaṃ pratiṣṭhati ] sarva pratiṣṭhitaṃ
nidrā divā na bhavati tasmāt sattvaguṇātmikā yasmāt somodbhavā nidrā tamāṃsi ca rajāṃsi ca
yasmā° ] tasmā°
tamāṃsi ca rajāṃsi ca ] ta
tasmād rātrau bhaven nidrā tāmasī harajātmikā
bhaven ] bhavan
yadā hi sarvāṅgagatau śrotāṃsi pratipadyate
sarvā° ] satvā°
rajas tamaś ca niyatas tadā nidrā pravartate
niyatas ] niyataṃs
tamasy ūrdhvagataśroto hy akṣipakṣmāsamāśritā
°gataśroto ] °gate śrotro
hy{ }akṣi° ] hy{ }ākṣi°
tamaḥ pravartate jantos tatas tv akṣnor nimīlanam
jantos{ }tata° ] janto tama°
tv{ }akṣṇor{ }ni° ] tv{ }akṣṇo ni°
nāsākṣikarṇaśrotāṃsi prayujyante kaphena tu
°śrotāṃsi ] śro
prayujyante kaphena ] ×××××phena
hṛdayaṃ muhyate cāpi tamasā cāvṛtaṃ manaḥ sparśaṃ na vedayaty eva na śṛṇoti na paśyati
nocchvāsayati nāsābhyāṃ vivṛtākṣimukho naraḥ
°mukho naraḥ ] °mukhena ca
eṣā nṛṇām antakarī nidrā vai tāmasī smṛtā
°ntakarī ] °nakarī
akarmaṇy apravṛttiś ca mṛtavat svapate kṣitau nidrotpattiṃ vikāraṃ ca kathito 'smi narādhipa
°tpattiṃ vikāraṃ ca ] °tpattiṃ vikāraś{ }ca °tpa
tasmān nidrāṃ na seveta tamomohapravardhanīm
°vardhanīm ] °vardhanī
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe nidrotpattis trayoviṃśatimo 'dhyāyaḥ
°viṃśatimo ] °viṃśatitamo
janamejaya uvāca
devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca vaiṣamyāni śrutāni me
me ] vai
nidrāsambhavam āścaryaṃ tvatprasādena veditam
tvatprasādena veditam ] tvatpra* tam
trailokyavistarāyāmaṃ śrotum icchāmi bho dvija
°lokya° ] °lokyā°
bho ] vai
kasmiṃścin narake jñeyaṃ pātālaṃ ca dvijottama
kasmiṃścin{ }narake ] kasmiścin{ }narakaṃ
saptadvīpaṃ samicchāmi saptasāgaram eva ca merumūrdhaṃ ca viprendra devālayaṃ nibodha mām
°mūrdhaṃ ] °mūrdhaś
devālayaṃ ] devālaya
vaiśampāyana uvāca
śṛṇu saṃkṣepato rājan trailokyāyāmavistaram
°vistaram ] ×××
kālāgniḥ prathamo jñeyaḥ sarvādhastān nareśvara
tasyopari nṛpaśreṣtha jñeyā narakakoṭayaḥ rauravādi avīcyantaṃ yātanāsthānam ucyate
upariṣṭāt tu vijñeyāḥ pātālāḥ sapta eva tu ābhāsatālaḥ prathamaḥ svatālaś ca tataḥ param
svatālaś ] svalālañ svatālañ
śītalaś ca gabhastiś ca śarkaraś ca śilātalam
śarkaraś{ }ca śilātalam ] ×××××lātalam śarkaraś{ }ca śilāvṛtam
saptamaṃ tu mahātālaṃ śeṣanāgakṛtālayaḥ
saptamaṃ ] saptamas
baliś ca daityarājendro rākṣasaś ca viśaṃkhaṇaḥ
viśaṃkhaṇaḥ ] visaṃśanaḥ
ity evam ādayas sarve nāgadānavarākṣasāḥ
sapta dvīpās tato jñeyāḥ saptasāgarasaṃvṛtāḥ priyavratasya putro 'bhūd daśarājaparākramaḥ
agninvraścāgnivā dhātithir vasuḥ
jyotismān dyutimān havyaḥ savanaḥ patra eva ca
agnibāhuś ca medhā ca patraś caiva trayo janāḥ saṃsārabhayabhītena mokṣamārgasamāśritāḥ
°mārga° ] °mārgaṃ
agnindhaṃ prathamadvīpe abhyaṣiñcan priyavrataḥ
prathama° ] prathamaṃ
abhyaṣiñcan ] abhyaṣiñcata
plakṣadvīpeśvaraṃ cakre nāmnā medhātithiṃ tathā
vasuṃ ca śālālī dvīpe abhiṣikto mahīpatiḥ
vasuṃ ca śālālī ] ××××××
jyotismantaṃ kuśadvīpe rājānam abhiṣecayet
krauñcadvīpeśvaraṃ cakre dyutimantaṃ nareśvara
nareśvara ] nareśvaraḥ
śākadvīpeśvaraṃ havyaṃ puṣkare savana smṛtaḥ
madhye puṣkaradvīpasya parvato mānasottaraḥ lokapālāḥ sthitās tatra caturbhiś caturo diśaḥ
caturo diśaḥ ] ×××××
mahāvītaḥ smṛto varṣo dhātakī ca narādhipa
mahāvītaḥ ] mahānītaḥ
tasya bāhyaḥ samudro 'bhūt svādūdaka iti smṛtaḥ catuṣaṣṭi smṛto loko yojanānāṃ narādhipa
puṣkaradvīpam antaś ca kṣīrodo nāma sāgaraḥ dvātriṃśallakṣavistāraḥ śākadvīpavahavṛṇaḥ
°vistāraḥ ] °vistāraiḥ
°vṛṇaḥ ] °vṛṇe
jaladaś ca kumāraś ca sukumāramaṇīcakaḥ
kumāraś{ }ca sukumāramaṇīcakaḥ ] kumā*××××**ṇīcakaḥ
kusumottaramodaś ca saptamaṃ ca mahādrumam
saptamaṃ ] saptamaś
havyaputrāḥ smṛtāḥ sapta varṣanāma tathā smṛtaḥ dvīpāntaṃ dadhimaṇḍādi kṣīrodārdhaṃ vinirdiśet
vinirdiśet ] nirdiśet
krauñcadvīpasamudrānte sapta varṣās tu te smṛtāḥ
°dvīpa° ] °dvīpe
varṣās ] varṣan
kuśalomnonugaś coṣṇaḥ yavanaś cāndhakārakaḥ
kuśalomnonugaś{ }coṣṇaḥ ] kuśalo manonugaś{ }co
yavanaś{ }cāndhakārakaḥ ]
muniś ca dundubhiś caiva sutādyutimatas tu vai
sutādyutimatas ] sutadyutimanas
dadhyardhe dhṛtamaṇḍodaḥ kuśadvīpaḥ samāvṛtaḥ
tatrāpi saptavarṣaṃ ca nāmataḥ śṛṇu bhārata
°varṣe ] °varṣaṃ
udbhimāndheṇumāś caiva svairannālambano dhṛtiḥ
°ṇumāś ] °nusāś
svaira° ] svairā°
ṣaṣṭaḥ prabhākaraś caiva kapilaḥ saptamaḥ smṛtaḥ ghṛtamaṇḍotadardhena tasyāntemadirodadhiḥ
°tadardhena ] °tardhena
tasyāntemadiro° ]
samantāc chālmalīdvīpo varṣāḥ saptaiva kīrtitāḥ
varṣāḥ ] varṣoḥ
śvetaś ca haritaś caiva jīmūto rohitas tathā
rohitas ] lohitas
vaidyuto mānasaś caiva suprabhaḥ saptamaḥ smṛtaḥ madirodadhito 'rdhena jñeyas tvikṣurasodadhiḥ
dadhito ] °dadhino
jñeyas ] jñeya
plakṣadvīpo vṛtas tena saptavarṣasamanvitaḥ śāntaś ca śiśiraś caiva sukhadānanda eva ca
śāntaś{ }ca śiśiraś ] ×××××raś
śivakṣemo dhruvaś caiva saptamedhātitheḥ sutāḥ
śiva° ] śivaśiva°
lavaṇodas tu tasyānte jambūdvīpasamāvṛtaḥ
°das{ }tu tasyānte ] °dadhisyānte
°dvīpa° ] °dvīpā°
lakṣayojanavistāra upadvīpasamanvitaḥ
°vistāra ] °vistāro
°dvīpa° ] °dvipa°
aṅgadvīpo yavadvīpo malayadvīpa eva ca
śaṅkhadvīpakamudvīpo varāhadvīpa eva ca siṃhabarhiṇadvīpaṃ ca padmacakras tathaiva ca
vajraratnākaradvīpo haṃsakaḥ kumudas tathā lāṅgalo vṛṣadvīpaś ca dvīpo bhadrākaras tathā
candradvīpaś ca sindhuś ca nandanadvīpa eva ca upadvīpasahasrāṇi evamādīni kīrtitam
agnīndho navavarṣeṣu navaputrān abhiṣiñcayat nābhiḥ kiṃpuruṣaś caiva harivarṣa ilāvṛtaḥ
atrāpi navabhedo 'bhūd bhāratātmajasambhavaḥ indradvīpakaśeruś ca tāmravarṇo gabhastimān
nāgadvīpas tathā saumyo gandharvaś cātha vāruṇaḥ ayaṃ ca navamo dvīpaḥ kumārīdvīpasaṃjñitaḥ
dakṣiṇe hemakūṭasya varṣaḥ kiṃpuruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ niṣadho dakṣiṇapārśve harivarṣa iti smṛtaḥ
merumūle tu rājendra jñeyo varṣa ilāvṛtaḥ uttaraṇeṇa (uttareṇa?) tu nīlasya varṣa ramyaka ucyate
śveta-uttarato jñeyo varṣaramyahiraṇmayaḥ tasya uttarato jñeyas triśṛṅgavaraparvataḥ
tasya cottarapārśve tu varṣaḥ kuruvale smṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ bhadrāśvato jñeyaḥ ketumālas tu paścime
himaṃvān hemakūṭaś ca niṣadho nīla eva ca śvetaś ca śṛṅgavantaś ca ṣaḍ ete varṣaparvatāḥ
aśītinavatīlakṣaḥ - varṣaparvatam āyatam himavān hemakūṭaś ca niṣadhaś ceti dakṣiṇa
śvetaś caivatriśṛṅgaś ca nīlaś caiva tathottare niṣadho nīlamadhye tu meruḥ śailamanoramaḥ
praviṣṭaṣoḍaśādhas tāṃ caturāśītim ucchṛtaḥ yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi dvātriṃśad ūrdha ! vistṛtaḥ
brahmāmanovatī nāma pureva satimadhyame devarājo 'marāvatyām agnis tejovatī pure
yamaḥ saṃyamanī nāma nityaṃ vasati bhūpate naiṛtir vasati nityaṃ ramye śuddhavatī pure
varuṇo bhogavatyāṃ tu vāyor gandhavatī purī mahodayāpurī ramyā somasyālayaraṃ smṛtam
yaśovatī purī ramyānnityam āste triśūlinaḥ tatragaṅgā catuḥbhinnā nipatantī mahītale
uttare paścime caiva pūrvadakṣiṇatas tathā pūrvaṃ gaṅgā sravatyāccālakānandā ca dakṣiṇe
śītā paścimagā gaṅgā bhadrasomā tathottare ṣaṣṭiyojanasāhasraṃ nirālambā nipatya ca
bhadrāśvaṃ plāvayitvā tu vanāny upavanāni ca droṇasthalī girīṇāṃ ca atikramyārṇavaṃ gatā
tathaivālakanandā ca gatāśailenanimnagā gaṅgā bhāratavarṣaṃ ca praviṣṭālavaṇo dadhim
plāvayitvā sthalīn sarvān mānuṣākaluṣāpahā paścimena gatāgaṅgā sītānāmā ca bhārataḥ
plāvayet ketumālāṃ ca kṣetraśaivavanasthalīm atikramyārṇavagatā sthalīdroṇī ca nimnagā
bhadrasomanadīty evaṃ plāvayitvottaraṃ kurun sthalī prasravaṇadroṇīm atikramyārṇavaṃ gatā
mero vai dakṣiṇe pārśve jambūvṛkṣaḥ sanātanaḥ tena nāmāṅkito rājan jambūdvīpa iti śrutam
koṭīṣoḍaśabhiś caiva ayutāni trayodaśa adhordhayāma rājendra kṣityāvaraṇam antataḥ
navalakṣādhikaṃ rājan pañcakoṭī mahī smṛtā yojanānāṃ tu vijñeyaḥ pṛthivyāyām avistarāt
svādūdakasya ca bahir lokāloko mahāgiriḥ kañcanidviguṇābhūmi tasmād giribahi smṛtaḥ
tasmād bāhyaḥ samudro bhūd garbhādeti samudrarāṭ aṣṭāviṃśatikaṃ lakṣaṃ śatalakṣāṇi vistaram
etad bhūrlokavistāro hy ata ūrdhvabhuvaḥ smṛtaḥ svarlokāsyapareṇaiva maharlokam ataḥ param
janalokas tapaḥ satyaṃ kramaśaḥ parikīrtitam brahmalokaḥ smṛtaḥ satyaṃ viṣṇulokam ataḥ param
tasmāt pareṇa bodhavyaṃ divyadhyānapuraṃ mahat sahasrabhaumaprāsādaṃ vaidūryamaṇitoraṇam
nānāratnavicitrāṇi nānābhūtagaṇākulam sarvakāmasamṛddhāni pūrṇaṃ tatra manoharaiḥ
tatra siṃhādane divye sarvaratnavibhūṣite tatrāste bhagavān rudraḥ somāṅkitajaṭādharaḥ
tryakṣatribhuvanaśreṣṭas triśūlī tridaśādhipaḥ devyā saha mahābhāgo gaṇaiś ca parivāritaḥ
skandanandipurogaś ca gaṇakoṭiśatākulaḥ anekarudrakanyābhirūpiṇībhir alaṅkitaḥ
°kanyābhi° ] °kanyabhi°
tatra puṇyanadī sapta sarvapāpāpanodanī suvarṇavālukādivyā ratnapāṣāṇaśobhitā
pāvanī ca vareṇyā ca varārhāvaradā varā vareśāvarabhadrā ca suprasannā jalāśivā
anekakusumārāmā ratnapuṣpaphaladrumāḥ anekaratnaprākārā yojanāyutam ucchritāḥ
ahiṃsāsatyaniratāḥ kāmakrodhavivarjitāḥ dhyānayogaratānityaṃ tatra modanti te narāḥ
tatra gomātaras sarvā nivasanti yatavratāḥ golokaḥ śivalokaś ca eka eva vidhīyate
tasmād ūrdhaṃ paraṃ jñeyaṃ sthānatrayam anuttamam kandagaurī maheśānaṃ nityaśuddhaṃ paraṃ śivam
dinakṛt koṭisaṅkāsam anopamyaṃ sanātanam ādityāda ! śivāntaś ca dvistheṇordhvakramaiḥ mṛstaḥ (smṛtaḥ)
abhyantare tat kathito 'dya sāraṃ
abhyantare tat{ }ka° ] atyantaretka°
kim anya rājan kathayāmi sāram jñānārṇavaṃ kīrtita dharmasāram
jñānārṇavaṃ kīrtita dharmasāram ] jñānārṇṇa
purāṇavedopaniṣatsusāram
yathā hi rājā parivāramadhye
°vāra° ] °cāra°
yathāntavartī bahivartin eva
°vartin{ }eva ] vartti
bhuñjanti bhogān satatāntavartī
bhuñjanti bhogān ]
kleśādhikaṃ nitya bahiḥsthitānām
yathaiva rājā kariṇo ntardantam
kariṇo ntardantam ] kariṇāntadantadattam
bhuñjanti bhogān satataṃ narendra
bhuñjanti ] bhujanti
yudhyeta rājā bahirdantabhogair
bahirdantabhogair ] bahidattabhogair
yadantare paśya samānajātam
yadantare paśya samānajātam ] yadanta
na dānatulyaṃ tv abhayapradasya na yajñatulyaṃ jita-indriyasya na cārthatulyaṃ jitakāminaś ca
°kāminaś{ }ca ] kāmina××
na dharmatulyaṃ damakāmitasya
kāmitasya ] kāminasya
bahvantaraṃ naiva hi dharmayoś ca kleśādhikaṃ bāhyaphalālpasāram yad atra dharmaṃ phalanaiṣṭhikasya na tulyakoṭī śatayājināpi
etat pavitraṃ paramaṃ sadharmam purā yathoktaṃ parameśvareṇa mayāpi tulyaṃ kathitaṃ yathāvat purāṇavedopaniṣatsusāram
sadojasaubhāgyam atīva medhā nirutsukaḥ saumyam anuttamaṃ ca suputrapautraṃ na vichinnagotram bhavanti vidyādharalokapūjyam
yaśaśriyaṃ kīrtir atīva tejo janapriyo dhānyadhanāyuvṛddhiḥ prabodhaprajñārujadharmavṛddhim bhavanti te śāstrasadābhiyogī
yaśasvinī āryasuvarṇaśṛṅgī vedāntavipradvijagāyaneṣu dattvā phalaṃ tīrtham anuttameṣu śṛṇvanti ye tasya bhavet sapuṇyam
daśādhikaṃ vā ca catuś ca puṇyam śatādhikaṃ yaḥ paṭhitaprabhāte sahasraśaḥ pustakṛtasya puṇyam paro 'bhyaste kīrtaya te yutāni
adhītya yasyoragataṃ suśāstram samastamadhyāyam anukramena daśāyutāṅgo dadatuś ca puṇyam labhaty asaṃdigdhayathādinaikaṃ
yenedaṃ śāstrasāram avikalamanasā yo 'bhyaseta prayatnāt
bhyaseta pra° ] bhyaset{ }tatpra°
vyakto 'sau siddhayogī bhavati ca niyataṃ yas tu cittaprasannaḥ
sau ] so
pitryaṃ yo gītapūrvaṃ pratidinaśataśo urddhi yante ca sarve
°dinaśataśo urddhi yante ca sarve ]
ātmānaṃ nirvikalpaṃ śivapadam asamaṃ prāpnuvantīha sarve
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe śāstravarṇanā nāma caturviṃśatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
dhyāyaḥ ] dhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ
vṛṣasārasaṃgrahaḥ samāpta iti
vṛṣasārasaṃgrahaḥ samāpta iti ] omitted
